_NI NA JAWA KAINA!!_ (SHAYE SHAYEN MAGANIN MATA)
BABI NA BIYAR
SHAFI NA UKU
Ango yacigaba dashan amarci da amaryarsa, yayinda Maman Zara'u aketa k'ara d'irkar kayan mata
Kwanaki bakwai nacika kuwa ranar data kasance zai dawo d'akin Maman Zara'u kenan
Aranardai kam ba'a cewa komai, Dan bak'aramin shiri Maman Zara'u tayima kantaba, dai-dai da kayan matsi tamatsa yafi kala biyar, banda wad'anda taitayi acikin kwanaki 9 dasuka shige,nasha kuwa aii ba'a cewa komai, ita kanta harta k'osa yadawo d'akinta, Dan bak'aramin matsuwa tayiba
Babban kuskurenta kuwa shine duk wannan shirin datakeyi na tarbar maigida babu muhimmin gyaran jiki datayi, irinsu kitso, k'unshi, yankan farce, dadai sauransu, sannan tsaftar d'akintama yanada rauni sosai, hakama 6angaren girki saidai ahankali kawai, dukda haryanzu ba muji na amaryaba, tunda bata faraba
Dawuri ta lalla6a Zara'u tayi barci kuwa, dantace yaud'in ranace tadaban
Baban Zara'u dai aka shigo ana 'Yar kunya irin wadda maza sukanyi bayan sunsha amarci sun dawo d'akin uwargida
Takuwa rungume kayanta, dukda ko kwalliya batayiba,hasalima tun wankan rana datayi bata sake waniba, duk da shige da ficen dataitayi yayin d'ora girki, amma bataji kunyar zama hakaba har mijin yashigo, hasalima ita hakan awajenta bawani kuskure baneba
To shima yarigada yasaba daganinta hakan, shiyyasa kokad'an baiwani damu kansaba, shidai yacire nasa kayan yace tazuba masa ruwan wanka
Kamar tayi kuka hakataji, Dan bawani son aikine da itaba, haka tatashi tana zun6ure-zun6ure tahad'a ruwan, sannan tasanar masa
Tashi yayi yaje yayo wankan yadawo, ta ajiye masa abinci,
Uhmm Nafisa! Inaga ki aika Zara'u takira Hafsat muci abinci,Dan tare zamu ringaci
Inama Zara'u tunda nashigo bangantaba?
Zara'u tafayi barci tuni
Abincin kuma bazamu iyaci mu biyuba sai'an kirata kuma? Itama lokacin dakana d'akinta naga ba kirana kukeyiba?
Hakane, amma kiyi hak'uri, wancan kwanakin anmata uzurine amatsayin bak'uwa, kinga daga yau kuma ai sai mu fara, inason takuma sanin matsayinki na babba agareta, shiyyasa nabari sai ranar girkinki ko?
Kanta tad'an jinjina, dantaji dad'in hakan, mijinta nasonta, tace,
To bara nakirata
A'a yizamanki, bara na kirata kawai awaya
Babu dad'ewa kuwa saiga Hafsat, saida tayi sallama, aka bata izinin shigowa sannan tashigo
Daga mijin nasu har Maman Zara'u saida suka bita da kallo, Dan cikin kwalliya take zani da riga na atamfa, batawani yi kwalliya mai yawaba, amma sai bulbula k'amshi takeyi na khumrah da turaren fesawa me sanyin kamshi
1
Baban Zara'u yalumshe idanu,yayinda k'amshin turarenta yanemi narkar dashi
Cikin ladabi Hafsat tagaishesu, sannan tace, 
Gani
"
uhm dama abinci zamuci,daga yau kuma tare zamu dinga ci gaba d'aya
Hafsat ta jinjinakai tana fad'in, 'to
Maman Zara'u kam tayi tsit,Dan dukta gama raina kanta, yanda taga Hafsat cikin kwalliya
Sunacin abinci amma hankalin mijinsu nakan Hafsat, sai satar kallonta yakeyi k'asa-k'asa, Maman Zara'u talura dashi,ita kanta Hafsat talura dashi tsaf
A haka dai aka kammala cin abincin wanda tun'a laumar farko da Hafsat tayi taraina girkin matar gidan, kokad'an abincin baimata d'and'anoba gaskiya, amma amamakinta daga mijin harmatar hankalinsu kwance sukecin abincin, hakan ya tabbatar mata sunrigada sun saba cin abincinsu haka, dantaga mijin nasu yaci sosai, itakam gaba d'aya batayi lauma 7 ba kwakwalwarta ta gwammace takwana da yunwa dadai cin wannan abincin
Daga Maman Zara'u har Baban Zara'u basu fahimci rashin dad'in abincinne yasaka Hafsat kasaciba,sund'auka kawai bak'untace dakuma kunya kawai
Bayan sun kammala akad'anyi hira, wadda Maman Zara'u da mijin nasune k'arfin hirar, amma Hafsat tayi tsit
Shikam Baban Zara'u ya k'irk'iri firarne domin yad'an k'ara morema kallon amaryarsa Hafsat,baisaba ganin matarsa da kwalliyaba irin wannan time d'in to,yanzukam yasamu aii bayaso tamatsaba
Ganin kamar ta takurane yace taje ta kwanta
Kamar jira Hafsat keyi tamik'e kuwa, tareda musu saida safe tafice
Maman Zara'u dad'i taji, dama itama hirar ta gundireta
Hafsat na tafiya kuwa itama tatashi tafara shirin barci, babu tunanin komai aranta tad'auki humra akad'an shafa, babu maganar wankan barci nan tsami nan kamshi, ahaka tahaye gado suka kwanta
Babu yanda Baban Zara'u ya iya kuwa, haka akasha soyayya, saidaifa tabbas yaji akwai banbanci,Dan shikam kokad'an baya gamsuwa da Nafisa, saidai yayita k'arajin yana kwad'ayinta, amma Hafsat sau d'aya kawai yaji yasami nutsuwa da gamsuwa, acikin kwanaki bakwai dayayi a d'akinta sai yakejin kansa fresh
komiyasa hakan ke faruwane?
Maman Zara'u kam dad'i tamkar yakasheta, Dan Baban Zara'u yamata sambatu,saitakejin kwanta on top
_________________
Wata sabuwa, Baban Zara'u fa hankalinsa yafara karkata akan Hafsat, Dan Hafsat macece mai tsafta,ga iya girki, uwa uba kuma tsaftar jikinta, ga ladabi, kokad'an batada son jiki, gidan kansa yafara canjawa, hakama Zara'u, kullum zakaga yarinyar fas, Hafsat takamata tamata k'itso da k'unshi, gakuma wanka safe da yamma, ita kanta Maman Zara'u tasan 'yarta tacanja sosai
Kuma tafara kula da take-taken mijin nasu, lamarin yafara damunta, danhaka tanemo hajjaju dillaliyar kayan mata, ta zayyane mata komai
Maimakon hajjaju tafad'a mata gaskiya akan tagyara mu'amullarta da mijinta da gidanta, a 6angaren tsafta da girki, danta gane cewar dawannan abubuwan Hafsat tajanye ra'ayin Baban Zara'u, amma saita kuma cusa mata wasu magungunan matan,masu yawa
Itakam babu tunani komai tacigaba dashan kayanta
Aikam tana samun yanda takeso, za'a yimata sambatu agado sosai, amma dagari yawaye hankalinsa nakan Hafsat, motsi kad'an Hafsat, data masa laifi Yakama fad'a yana fada mata tayi koyi da Hafsat, itakam tarasa da me Hafsat d'innan tafita?
Wad'annan abubuwanne ya tunzurata takwace Zara'u daga wajen Hafsat d'in, takuma gargad'eta akan karta sake ta6a mata yarinya
Hafsat tabata hak'uri sosai, Allah mai iko satin baishigeba Hafsat tafara ciwo, suna zuwa asibiti akace cikine,
Nan fa hankalin Maman Zara'u yafara tashi
Ganin yanda mijinsu da danginsa keta murna da cikin na Hafsat, gawani tattali na musamman datake samu awajen kowa
Kuma dukda halin laulayi da Hafsat keyi hakan baihana bama mijinta kulawaba kamar yanda tasaba ba, haka take daurewa tanayin komanta
Haka taita rainon ciki harta haihu d'a namiji aka saka masa Saifullahi
Tacigaba da rainon yaronta, kuma har zuwa lokacin komai bai canjaba, tsaftar da dukkan abu muhimmi dakasan matar kwarai nayi Hafsat nayi agidan mijinta,har lokacin kuma idonta bai bud'eba dashan maganin mata, babu ruwanta dasu,tanadai shan fruits dadai sauransu, shekarar Saifullahi 2 saiga wani cikin
Nanfa hankalinsa Nafisa yakai k'ololuwar tashi,dama gashi a kwanakin nan wani farin ruwa datake zubarwa daga gabanta mai masifar wari, tun tana d'aukar lamarin wasa harya fara bata tsoro, amma takasa gane illar abinda ya haddasa zubar ruwan, saima cigaba dashan magungunanta datayi
Tundai Baban Zara'u na daurewa damata alkunya harya gaza, ya zaunar da'ita ya tambayeta me ke faruwa? Shifa maganar gaskiya wari yakeji idan yana tare da ita,kuma yanzuma takai ko kusada ita kazauna saikaji wannan warin
Maimakon tanutsu tamasa bayani saitace babu komai
K'yaleta yayi yazuba mata idanu
Lamari yafara gawurta, Maman Zara'u kozama tayi saikiga gurin yajik'e da wannan farin ruwa mai warin tsiya, harma takai mutane basa son zama kusada ita, ciki harda mijinta da kishiyarta dake tajan tsohon cikinta
Lamarin ya ishi Baban Zara'u, yatasa k'eyarta gaba zuwa asibiti, nanfa likita kwararre na fannin mata wato (gynecologist) yafara duba matsalarta
Tashin farko yatambayeta shin mitake cusama gabanta haka?
Maman Zara'u bata 6oyeba awannan karon tabama likita labarin komai gameda maganin mata datake yawan sha, dakuma matsi datakeyi dasu
Likita ya girgiza kansa kawai yana cije le6ensa, yasa aka shigo da Baban Zara'u, shima yamasa bayanin musabbabbin matsalar matarsa, hankali tashe Baban Zara'u yake kallonta, yace, 
Nafisa dama bakida hankali ban saniba? Yanxu nan dama wannan masifarce kika sakama ranki? To amma likita yanzun me ke damunta?
Zama likita yagyara sosai, yacire biron dake bakinsa yana kallonsu, 
To maganar gaskiya matarka tagama cutar kanta,Dan sanadiyyar wad'annan cushe-cushen da shaye-shayen magunguna datayi takamu da kansar mahaifa, wadda ciwon yayi tsamari haryayi gyambo acikinta, shine yake fidda wannan ruwan mai wari, kuma matsalarcema tahanata sake haihuwa tuntuni, amma baku fargaba saida lokaci yak'ure muku
Innalillahi wa'inna ilaihirraji'un kawai Baban Zara'u ke ambata, yayinda zufa tagama wankesa tamkar wanda aka watsama ruwa
Maman Zara'u kuwa hannu tasaka aka tafashe da ihu tana fad'in 
Ni Nafisa _NI NA JAWA KAINA!!!!_, Nacuci kaina, nazalinci kaina, hajjaju kin cuceni, nashiga uku ni nafisa
Daga likita har Baban Zara'u babu Wanda yakulata, Dan shikansa Baban Zara'u yagama rikicewa, fad'i yake,
Nafisa lallai bakida hankali, nidai ban aikekiba, bance kuma kisha komai sabodaniba, shiyyasa kullum bana gamsuwa dake, saidai jaraba da kwad'ayi dakike k'aramin, 
Allah kad'ai yatsareni dana afka neman mata sabida halin dakike sakani, daurewa kawai nakeyi, har Allah yaji tausayina yasaka iyayena suka had'ani aure da Hafsat, amma Dana cigaba da zama dake kekad'ai wlhy dayanzu nafara aikata zina, Nafisa kin cutar dani wlhy, 
kema kin cucu kanki, harga Allah Ina matuk'ar k'aunarki, amma kika 6ata rayuwarki dashan MAGANIN MATA Baki iya kula daniba kokad'an amma kinsan kisaka mak'udan kud'i kisai maganin mata dankawai ki burgeni, wannan wace irin rayuwace?, iyayenki suna buk'atar taimako, shiyyasa nake baki kud'i, amma bakya basu saidai kisha abinda zai cutar dake, ai gashinan kinkashe rayuwarki, kin cuci kanki, wannan izinace gadukkan mata masu irin halinki, duk wadda ta d'auki maganin mata kamar yanda kikayi wlhy saitaga abindama yafi haka, karkuga kunasha babu wata damuwa, sai ahankali zakuga illar haka, kedai yau kinga k'arshenki aii
KEKIKA JAWA KANKI wlhy
haka suka koma gida Maman Zara'u Na rusar kuka tana k'ara fad'in,
NINA JAWA KAINA, kaicona da dukkan mata masu wannan d'abi'a, banbama mijina kulawar data daceba, saina d'auka maganin mata shine zaizama komaina, amma hakan baihana mijina k'ara aureba dukda d'umbin so da kulawar dayake nunamin, saigashi matar da'aka masa auren had'i da ita tafini daraja a idonsa, hankalinsa yakoma gabad'aya kanta, nikuma na illata kaina abanza awofi domin birge miji, 
Gashi nan nak'are acikin matsalar nikad'ai, babu mijin danayi dominsa, babu kud'in, babu lafiyar, dame zanji ni Nafisa?
,

Time flies rayuwa ta canjama Nafisa, tazama abin kwatance acikin mata, da itace mai siya cikin nishad'i, tana sha cikin farin ciki, tabada labari cikin Isa da nasarori, amma yau itace mai kuka danunama mata su daina shan maganin mata
Har zuwa kallonta akeyi, babu maison zama kusada ita, har Zara'u, Baban Zara'u nedai ked'an yin k'ok'arima yashiga kullum yadubata, saboda ransa yanason Nafisa
Iyayenta sunyi kuka da Allah wadarai akan wannan mummunan cigaba daya shigo duniyar mata, Wanda sungaza gane cigaban mai hak'ar rijiyane, yana k'ara k'asa, amma yanafad'in yasamu cigaba, '
yan uwa kowa Allah wadarai yakeyi

SHAWARA GAREKU YANUWA NA MATA
Mata ya kamata musan abinda yake yi mana ciwo, wallahi duk biyayyarki baki isa ki hana mijinki ara aure ba
Hakama duk kyawunki duk tsabtarki duk iya girkinki baki isa Kin hanasa ara aure ba bare kuma ace bakya yi, hehehe ai kinsan arya kike indai ba wani nufin Allah ba
Mata Mumuke janyowa kanmu wasu matsalolin, kayan Mata meye ke bazaki iya haawa ba wanda zai ara miki ni'ima? Gasu kan-kana da peak, Aya da dabino kwakwa da dabino, kanumfari da mazar kwaila (rawan Doki), rake duk abubuwane masu ara ni'ima kuma masu amfani ajikin an Adam
Amma kisa kui ari biyar dubu aya zuwa sama a baki an mitsitsin abu da baki san dame-dame aka yi sa ba kiyi amfani dashi why? Saboda namiji? Saboda karya yi miki kishiya? Toh bari kiji duk wannan baya hana namiji ara aure kedai yi k'ok'ari wajan ganin kinyi masa biyayya kin samu aljanna yadda ko bayan ranki zai yi alfahari dake
Dan Allah mata ku rage shaye-shayen kayan matan nan wallahi kina kashe kanki ne wanda kike yi don shi yana can da wata a hanya yana tsara mata zance da yadda idan ya aureta zataji dadi, please ku daure ku dena illata kanku akan maza kuyi amfani da damar da Allah ya baku kuyi tsabta, kwalliya, iya magana, kissa,,iya girki ,kwarkwasa k'amshi ya kama jikinki 'yar uwa, kiyi masa biyayya ki gyara cikinsa domin idan yana ci yana jin dai tofa bashi da damuwa zaki yi ta juyasa yadda kike so zai miki abinda kike so sannan kuma kina nan cikin zuciyarsa a duk inda zashi
Mata mu dena JAWA KANMU MATSALOLI a lafiyar mu, a lokacin da kika samu matsala a lokacin ne mijin da kika yi dominsa zai zo ya ce miki wani satin bikina kuma baki isa hanawa ba kunga dai Nafisa babu abinda ta jawowa kanta sai matsala
Kafafen 'yad'a labarai suka shiga nusar da mata illar wannan magunguna, labarin Nafisa Maman Zara'u kuwa babu inda bashigaba acikin social media, ko'ina labarinta akeyi, wasu su tausaya mata, wasu suce Allah yak'ara mata, sauran mata masusha suma
Kadan daga cikin Illolin da magungunan ke haifarwa sun kunshi;
Gusar da niimar mace ta asali da take da shi:
Duk macen duniya, akwai niimar da Allah ya mata wajen gamsar da namiji, amma irin niima da mata ke arawa kafin su yi aure ko bayan sunyi na haifar masu da illa wajen gusar da niimar da suke da shi na asali
Domin da zarar wannan hain magunguna da suka yi ya gushe, to niimarta na asali da take da shi ne zai dawo, amma kuma ba lallai ne miji ya gamsu da ita ba
Domin wanda aka yi kafin auren ko anyi da ma ba mai orewa ba ne kuma babu shi
Cire wa miji shaawar matarsaDa zarar wannan hain magunguna da aka yi wa mace kotayi kafin tashiga ko bayan ta shiga gidan mijinta ya gushe, to niimarta zai ragu da kashi 80% sai na asali da take da shi ya dawo, shi kuma miji ba zai taa jin tana gamsar da shi kamar da ba
Daganan shaawa da yake mata zai fara raguwa, idan aka yi rashin sa'a sai ma ya haifar masa da shaawan wasu mata a waje
Shawarwari zuwaga yammata domin yanzu ba matan aure kadai ne ke amfani da magungunan mata ba harda budurwa wadda aurenta ya kusa kai dama wacce ko mijin bata samu ba dirkawa cikin ta take ta goga wancen ta cusa wannan tai tsumi da wani,
A matsayin mace budurwa da ba ta taa aure ba, to ki guji duk wasu kayan da za su sanya miki niima in kin sha, domin tun asali irin wadannan magunguna an yi su ne don matan da suka an jima cikin aure kuma zuumar shaawarsu ta an fara sanyi sesu dukufa wajen cin kayan itatuwa da kayan magarya da sauransu
Amma a matsayinki na budurwa kina iya shan yayan itatuwa da yawa gab da bikin naki, inda hali ma, kina iya daina cin duk wani abinci illa yayan itatuwa da ganyayyaki kaai kamar ana sauran sati aya bikin naki
Haka ma magungunan Musulunci da aka samu ingancin warakarsu daga Manzon Allah SAW, irin su zuma, habbatus sauda, zaitun da sauransu
Waannan za su warkar da duk wani rauni ko cikas da ila mace ke da shi a lafiyar jiki da ta ruhi gaba aya wajen sanya niima

SHAFI NA D'AYA
TSOKACI  Assalamu alaikumTallace-Tallace yakasance d'abi'unmu nayauda kullum wanda ake d'aurawa y'ay'anmu, yayyyunmu dakuma qannenmu, 
Tallace-tallace bawai yakasance abu mafi muni bane Aa, Tallace-tallace wannan d'abi'une nayauda kullum wanda wasu daga cikinmu saidashi suke samu susanya abinci abakinsu, shine yake rufa masu asiri, shine kuma abun dogoro garesu, wannan tallace-tallace shine mutumci dakuma kimarsu, wannan tallace-tallace shine martabarsu, wannan tallace-tallace shine abunda yake rufa musu asiri sud'auke idanuwa daga roqon abun wasu, wannan tallace-tallace shine abunda yake hanasu kallon abun wani balle haryakaiga sunyisata, wannan tallace-tallace shine yake nuna dogoro dakai tafannoni dadama,Amma kuma bahakan yana nufin cewa domin zamu d'aurawa y'ay'anmu kokuma y'anuwanmu tallace-tallace bawai yana nufin musakesu kamar tuhmakiba, bawai yana nufin musakesu kamar bamasonsuba, bahakan yaana nufin mubarsu kara zube bbu karatuba, wasu zaka kallii wannan tallace-tallace kawai suka sani, yaro zaifita talle tunda safe sai rana da rana yana dawowa zainufi tallan yamma, bbu arabi bbu boko, Shinwai way'annan yarada Allah yabamu ba kiwo bane garemuba?"Shinwai muna nufin Allah bazai tambayemu akan kiowanda yabamu bane ranar alqiyama,Kadafa mumunta duk wani abunda muke aikatawa yananan arubuce, Allah yana gani kuma zai tambayemu akai,Meyasa idan yaranmu sund'auki talla sundawo bazamuyi qoqari wajan taimakawa rayuwarsuba?"Kamata yayi yaro idanya dawo atalla saimu turashi makaranta, kokuma idan yadawo daga makaranta muturashi talla, Wannan zamanin yazo mana dasauyi kala-kala, akwai makaranta ta safiya wacce yaro ko yarinya zasu iya zuwa da safe zuwa rana sundawo saisu d'auki talla sutafi, sannan sudawo sutafi zuwa makarantar islamiya,
Awannan zamanninne qatatuwar budurwa zata d'auki talla, Sannan kuma zata dawoda kud'i fiyeda kud'in tallan amma kuma bbu bincike uwa zata sanya hannu taqarbe, ita duk tunaninta y'arta ta'iya talla
"
Allah yasa mudace, Allah yabamu ikon kulada dakuma sanya idanuwa akan yaranmu
"
Yarinyace dabazatafi 13yrsba Tafe take tana d'an wake-wakenta kanta d'aukeda tire na talla, wani gida tashiga tana fad'in sallamadai ga tallan kayan miya, matar dake cikin gidan ne tace kawo, dasauri tashige tazube tiren tallan gaban matar, Gabaki d'aya abunda yarage tallan baikai 50naira ba haka kuwa matar tasiyeshi tass,
Tana fita dasauri-sauri tanufi gida tana shiga dasauri ta nufi band'aki domin dama ahannu take fitsari takeji, tundaga qofar band'aki bayan tafito da dukkan alamu ko tsarki batayiba domin bata shigada butaba, tundaga qofar band'akin take fad'in mama! mama! Fitowa mama tayi tana fad'in haba suwaiba irin wannan kira haka?" Hungo mama ina gyadar take?" ynzu saina fita, tafad'i maganar tana sosai cinyarta wanda ta'alamu fitsarinda tayi bbu tsarkine ya addabeta,Yawwaa d'iyar Albarka mama tafad'i tana sanya hannu domin kar6an kud'in, irge kud'in tayi tace aikuwa suncika y'ar albarka, soke kud'in tayi saman zaninta tana fad'in barina shiga d'aki na d'auko miki gyadar kinga kafin kidawo nad'aura abinci ynzu wannan kud'inda kika kawo saina tura ayi cefene,to mama niynzu bara natafi bangoma acikin kud'in, Aa suwaiba bbu wani gomanda zanbaki, idan kinyi ciniki kid'auka cikin kud'in, Turo baki tayi ayayinda take d'aukan tirenda gyada amarau take ciki, Kada kuma ki kuskura kid'auki fiyeda goma mama tafad'i, Saiki hana suwaiba tafad'i alokacinda take tafiya, Tana fita daga gidan tafara shiga wajan wajan tallanta, Lunguda sako take shiga wajan tallanta, ba ita tadawo daga tallan gyadan nanba sai wajan la'asara data dawo abimci kawai taci sannan tayi bacci bbu zancen sallan azahar kokuma la'asar dabatayiba domin bata muwa sukayida yintaba, Bata ita tatashiba saikusan magrib, dare kuwa yanayi tad'auki kunu tafice kasuwa dashi wajanda suke taruwa masu talla dayawa, 
Bata dad'e datafiyaba baba yashigo zama yayi rashe-rashe yana fad'in mamar suwaiba ina tuwona?"Tsaki taja cikin ranta wani haushi datakaicine yacikata mutum baya tsinana komai acikin gidansa saidai yaje yawo yadawo sannan yazo yanemi abinci kokad'an baisan cinta shanta dakuma suturarta koma yarantaba, saodai tanemi jari y'arta taje talla tadawo sannan susami abincinci shikuma yazo yawani zube yayi shame-shame yace" takawo masa abinci,Tskai taqaraja akaro nabiyu sannan tad'auko tuwon acikin tire tatura masa gabansa tashige d'aki,  Shikuwa zama yayi yanarki tuwaonsa sannan yawanke hannu yaqara ficewa,
Saida dare yaraba sosai sannan suwaiba tadawo gidan lokacin tasamu mamanta da babanta gabaki d'aya sunyi bacci itama kwanciya tayi
"
Washe gari dasafe
Humaira! Humaira! Fitowa Wacce aka kirada humaira tayi, cikin nutsuwarta tana fad'in na'am umma, Gashi nagama kidauka kikai zuwa jimawa kidawo domin zuwa makaranta koda baiqareba kidawo banaso kiyi latti amakaranta, Toh umma tafad'i lokacinda take d'aukan qatoton tire mai d'aukeda shimkafa da wake dakuma maida yaji akai, Sallama tayiwa mamanta cikin nutsuwa take tafiya, adai-daita tatsara yakaita harzuwa tasha anan tazauna da kayan tallanta,Cikin d'an qanqanin lokaci aka fara siya mata tallan domin nutsuwarta dakuma tsafta d'inta yasanya akeson siyan abun hannunta, Tana kallon shabiyu tayi dasauran tallanta wanda baiqareba tatattare takoma gida domin shirin tafiya makaranta, Ba'ita tadawo daga makarantarba sai 4:00pm bayan tahutane umma take fad'in kinga kinyi latti makarantar islamiya garakiyi sauri ki shrya,Bata dad'eba kuwa tataashi tanufi makaranta, tasami amfara tsaran lattiGatada tsoron duka sosai haka dole tajira akayi mata dukan latti bbu ynada ta'iya tashiga cikin ajii,Ba'ita tadawoba sai 6:00pm lokacin antashi amakaranta
"
Bayan isha'i kusan qarfe takwas tana zaune cikin gida, wani yarone yayi sallama ta amsa wai humaira tananan?"abunda yafara tambaya kenan, eh tananan umma amsa wacce take gefe tabada amsa,Malm yahuzane yake sallama da'ita, Jekace tana zuwa umma tafad'i, fita yaron yayi yafad'a masa abunda akace,
Bata 6ata lokaciba tafita, gaidashi tayi ya amsa yana fad'in dafatan bakiyi fushiba humaira, girgizakai tayi tana fad'in Aa kokad'an banyi fushiba aikinka kayifa, kuma laipy nane ninayi latti nasan dabanyiba bazaka ta6a niba, kuma idan baka yimun hukunciba hakan yana nufin bakayi adalciba,Murmushi yayi gana qarason humaira kodan hankali irinnata, yarinyar tanada sanin yakamata,Bata dad'eda fitaba yayi mata sallama ganin dare yayi sosai, Sannan yasanarda ita cewa tasanarda umma akan iyayensa zasu shiga zancen, Bayan takoma gida tasanarda umma, sosai umma tayi murna da wannan zancen domin dama burinta kenan ta aurarda humaira, In sha gobe zantashi naje nasanarda qanin mahaifinki, umma tafad'a cikin murna,Saisusan abunyi akai,Dake dama ita humaira mahafinta yarasu itada mahaifiyarta take zaune su biyu, yayunta guda uku duka mazane sunyi aure, basa taimakawa mahaifiyarsu da komai, Hakanne yasanya take qoqari wajan ganin ta kyauatata rayuwar yarinyarta, tallanda yarinyar takeyi shine rufin asirinsu, shine abunda yake taimakonsu, dashi sukeci sannan sukesha dakumashi suka dogara, shine yahana abun wani tsole musu idanuwa
"

Gidansu malam yahuza
Duk yanda malam yahuza yaso yiwa mahaifiyarsa magana abun yaci tura domin taqi sauraransa, Tagumi yayi jiya keyi kamar yayi kuka, baisan laifinda humaira tayiwa innarsaba kwata-kwata bata sonta, Shidai yasan duk wani qualitie na y'a mace humaira tanadashi uwa uba tarbiyada hankali, amma mahaifiyarsa taqi amincewa da'ita, 
Kamar mai shirin yin kuka yace" inna dan Allah kifad'amun laifinda Humaira tayi miki idan kika fad'a nida kaina zand'auki mataki akan abun,
Hararata wurga masa sannna tace' bbu wani laipy data yimun nidai kawai banaso ka auri y'ar macene,Tun yaushe mahaifinta yarasu wajan mahaifiyarta tatashi taqi yin aure balle tabarwa yarinyarta tarbiya,
Haba inna wallhy humaira tanada tarbiya kokad'an itaba irin yarannan bane, tarbiyarta daban take,
A'a yahuza wace tarbiya za'a samu wajan yarinyada tatashi daga itasai mahaifiyarta?"
Wace tarbiya za'a samu wajan y'ar mace?"
Ita uwar keda laipy Kamata yayi tayi aure sannan takulada y'arta tabata tarbiyya, kokuma tad'auketa takaita dangin mahaifinta akwai yayyu dakuma qannen mahaifinta, saita bada ita suyi mata tarbiyanda ya dace,
    1
Haba innna wallhy humaira tanada tarbiya kokad'an batada hali irinnta wasu daga cikin y'an matan yanzu,Innna idanke kina uwa mace zaki kyamaci tarbiyarda uwa mace zata bawa y'arta wakike tunanin zasu nuna amincewarsu awannan lamarin,
Inna danfa yarinya tagirma gaban maifiyarta bahakan yana nufin batada tarbiyaba, bakowace uwa bace zata bar d'iyarta ta ta6ar6are,Inna dan Allah kitaimaka wallhy humaira tanada tarbiya, Inna kafin lokacinma nayarda kisanya ayi miki bincike akan halayenta,
Ban jiba ban kuma aminceba yahuza kacanja matar aure kawai idan kanason farin cikina karabu da wannan yarinyar, 
Idan kanta uwarta aure yakamata tayi, tabar zama cikin gida ita kad'ai, tanemi mutumci idon jama'a domin aynzu ko mutuwa tayi darajarta bad'aya da wacce tayi aureba, 
Kanemi wata amma ba wannan yarinyarba,
Idankuma ba hakaba wallhy yahuza akan wannan yarinya zan'iya d'aga maka nono,
Cikin tashin hankali yace" aa inna kiyi hakuri abun baikaiga hakaba in sha Allahu zanrabuda ita,
Dadai yafi maka inna ta bashi amsa,
Toh inna yanzu yaya Za'ayida baba?" bayan nafad'a masa zancen kuma yasanya nasanarda ita cewa zasuje wajan neman auran,Bakada matsala da wannan nidai damuwata dama shine ka janye zancen auren tunda ka yarda ka janye komai yazo gidan sauki
"
Allah yamaka albarka, zaka samu wanda tafita mata nawa awannan zamanin?" gasunan sai wanda kaza6a,
Uhmm inna kenan nasam akwai mata dayawa wannnan zamani amma kuma abunda mutanen basu ganeba shine nagari acikinsu sunyi kad'an,
Yahuza kenan bazaka ta6a gane mai nake nufiba, amma kuma nan gaba zaka fahimta, domin ance ta yaro kyauta keyi bata ta6a qarko, amma nan gaba zaka gane, maika kanka zaka fahimci abunda naguda yasanyani kin wannan lamarin,

Idan wani abunne take buqata su zasuna mata zasuna siya mata sabulai abinci daduk wani abunda take buqata amma basu yarda tayi wani aurenba,
Batarai sosai umma tayi tana fad'in aure bbu fashi kuma bbu mai hanani cikinku, bankuma haifeku domin kusaya min sabuluba, tunda baya bakusanda basuluba sai ynzu, kada naji kada nagani nice na haifeku bakune kuka haifeniba, aure kuma bbu fashi don haka kutashi kubani, waje,
Jiki asanyaye suka miqe suka fice daga gidan,( wannan babban kuskurene da yara muke aikatawa yanzu domin iyayenmu maza sun rasu sai muce wai bazamubar iyayenmu mata suqara yin wani auranba, haba wannan da al'ada bace bakuma addini bane, aure bautace ta ubangijinmu bakuma haramun bane don mahifinmu yarasu munbar mahaifanmu mata sunqara yin wani aure, ba abun fad'uwa bane sannan kuma ba'abun kunya bane, bautar uabgijine fad'in Allah ne da manzonsa, sunnar Annabi muhammad S A W, danme bazamubar mahaifansu sucika sunnar Allah da manzonsaba?"Wasu iyayen kuma sunada babban laipy sune masu biyewa yaran, kamata yayi kinuna 6acin ranki sannan kima kigwada musu ko yaya zasuyi saikinyi auranki)
Washe gari, mlm yahya jira yakeyi kawai lokaci yayi yazo yaji amsa daga bakin umma, aikuwa lokaci yanayi ya shirya ya nufi gidan domin jin amsarsa

SHAFI NA BIYAR
Umma ma ta shirya zaf tana jiran isowarsa domin tasan a ko'ina yake ahalin yanzu yana shirin zuwa domin jin amsa daga bakinta, kuma akowani irin lokaci zai iya isowa

Da yamma lik'is umma tana zaune itada humaira a cikin gida, humaira tana qarawa mahaifiyarta wani littafi wanda yanzu shine sukeyi a islamiyya,
Sallama yaro yayi ta amsa masa tana fad'in shigo daga ciki,
Shigowa yayi ya tsugunna gaban umma ya gaidata sannan yadubi humaira yace" yaya humaira ina wuni?"
Lpy ta amsa da fara'arta,
Juyawa yayi ga umma yace" umma malam yahaya yana sallama dake awaje,
Toh! toh! Madallah ya'isone?"
Juya kace masa ina zuwa,
Miqewa yaron yayi yafice domin fad'in aikarda aka aikeshi,
Tsugunawa yayi gabansa yace" mlm tana zuwa yanzu,
Toh ngd Allah yayi albarka ameen yaron ya amsa had'eda miqewa yayi tafiyarsa abunsa,
Hijabi kawai umma tad'auka tasanya, 
Sannan tafita da tabarma a hannunta sanda ta shimfid'e tabarman sannan kuma ta tsaya bakin qofa tace bismillah ka shigo,
Da sallama yashigo ta amsa masa cikin fara'a tace" ga waje nan zauna,
Ganin fara'arda take fuskarsa yanuna masa cewa anyi nasara duk da kasancewar baiji wata kalma daga bakintaba,
Zama yayi can qarshen tabarman itama tazauna d'aya gefen,
Cikin girmamawa ta gaidashi ya amsa yana tambayarta yaya gida yaya yaran,
Lpy qlau Alhmdllhy tabashi amsa,
Toh dama yaune ranar jin amsa tacika toh shine nayi tattaki nazoni domin jin amsar abunda ya sauwaka,
Toh dafarko dai gaskiya kamar yanda kafad'a abayan muba yara bane, bakuma zamu tsaya wasa ba,
Nidai tanawa wajan na amince Allah ya sanya mana alkhairi,
Sannan kuma na sanarda magabatana suma sun amince yanzu komai yarage daga gareka,
Toh wannan haka yake ngd nakuma ji dad'i in sha Allah za'ayi duk wani abunda ya dace,
Amma fa sai dai banason abun yaja lokaci dan banki a kaishi nanda sati d'aya ba bawasa zamu tsayaba bakuma wani dogon nemaba tunda kin fahimceni nima na fahimceki komai sai ayishi akan lokaci,
Banki takaba mlm amma kuma sati d'ayakam ai yayi gaggawa inama ace sati biyu kafin lokacin aii nagama shiryawa,
Eh toh hakanma kinada gaskiya amma kuma zan bukaci ad'aura auren nanda sati d'ayan idan yaso saina baki ishesshen lokaci kafin tarewa,
Saiki gama shirye shiryenki ahankali,
Sannan maganar kayan d'aki kuma nad'auka zanyi miki komai, 
Aa mlm baza'ayi hakaba,
Ai wannan hakkinane nayi kayan d'akina dakaina,
Ai toh wannan al'adace ba addiniba, 
Nina d'auka zanyi, bawani yasanya niba nina saka kaina,
Toh ngd sosai Allah yasaka maka da mafificin alkhairinsa,
Toh magriba ta qarato sosai yanzu ga wannan ya fito da bunch na 500 yace wanan 50k ne ya ware talatin aciki yace" wannan sada kinkine wannan kuma yamiqa 20k yace wannan kiyi shirye shiryenda zakiyi dashi,
Mamakine da al'ajabi suka cika umma sadakinta dubu talatin 30k?"
Tana budurwarta sadakinta baikai dubu gomaba sai yanzu da giramanta 30k sadaki,
Yanzu shekarunta 42 tad'auka a 7k baza'a dauketaba domin yanzu shekarunta 28 da aure amma har 30k kuma da qarin 20k wai tayi sayayya sannan kuma ga kayan d'aki kyauta,
Lallai tasan zatayi aure ayanda akasam mutumcin mace, zatayi aure a yanda akasan mutumcin aure,
Tarasa nacewa gabaki d'aya itakam jikinta ma yayi sanyine,
Muryarsa ta tsinto yana fad'in inada mace d'aya da yara goma sha uku, matata d'aya Allah yayi mata rasuwa, 
Wanda ynzu take gidana kuma itace farkon aurena wato ina nufin matata tafarko, sunanta Aisha yaranta tara, surayya itace wacce Allah yayiwa rasuwa,
Itakuma yaranta hud'u, ina fatan idan kin shiga gidana zaki bani gudumawa wajan yin adalci sannan kuma Ku had'a kanki ku zauna lpy,
In sha Allah baza'a samu matsalaba, 
Allah yajikan surayyya yasanya aljanna makomarta, ameen ya Allah malam ya amsa, 
Sallama yayi mata yatafi saboda lokacin sallah yakusa
"
GIDAN MALAM YAHAYA,
Saurayine da bazaifi 17yrsa ba yana zaune d'akin babansa, 
Salihu tashi kacewa mahaifyarka inason magana da ita, 
Dasauri saurayin ya miqe don isarda saqon mahaifinsa,
Da sallama ya shiga d'akin mama baba yana kiranki,
Kace masa ina zuwa toh, juyawa yaron yayi domin kaiwa mahaifinsa amsa,
Bata d'auki lokaciba tanufi tuarkar mijinta domin jin dalilin kiran,
Bayan tazauna yadubeta cikin kulawa yafara"
Aisha! Na'am ta amsa tana kallonsa kokad'an fuskarsa babu wasa hakan ya nuna mata maganace mai muhimmanci,
Aisha dafarko dai kinsan shi aure nufine na Allah kuma aure bautar ubangijine sannan kuma sunnar manzone, 
Allah ya umarcemu da muyi mace d'aya, biyu, uku, kokuma hudu, amma fa idan zamu iya adalci tsakani kenan, idan kuwa baza muyi adalciba d'ayan ma and'auke mana, baizama lallaiba,
Aisha aure zan qara cikin satinanan inason dabbaqa sunnar manzo,
Dama nasani tafad'a cikin ranta tun lokacinda taji yafara yimata nasiha akan aure tasan cewa aure zai qara,
Aikuwa ranta ya sosu sosai amma saita dake domin batason yin kishi irinna jahilan mata,
Naji batunka malam amma akwai wani abunda narageka dashine?"
Ina nufin akwai abunda banayi maka shine kota fuskar auratayya?"
A'a kokad'an babu aisha kawai dai inason cika sunnar manzone,
Amma malam sunnoni nawane na manzo?"
Aiya kamata acikasu ba lallai sai ka qara aureba,
Aisha banda abinki akwai wata sunnace da kika gani nasamu tawaya ta wajan,
Ina nufin akwai sunnar manzonda kikaga bama cikata?"
Idan kina gani kifad'amun in sha Allahu zan gyara, domin shi d'an adama tara yake bai cika gomaba,
Sunkuyarda kanta tayi kunya tagama kamata girgizakai tayi tace" babu wani abunda kakeyi wanda zan iya cewa bakayin dai-dai,
Idan akwai kifad'a Aisha kada kiji kunyar idanuwana, 
Bbu kawai ina kishine akan zaka yimun kishiya, inajin zafi araina, badan komaiba bakuma domin banaso kazama mai cika sunnaba sai dai don ina kishinka, 
Kuma kishi halittace ban isa ince banida itaba,
Dariya yayi yace banda abunkiba Aisha bafa yanzu kika fara zamada abokiyar zamaba,
Nasani mlm haqiqa nazauna da surayya amma ita kuma halinta daban yake batada hayaniya, 
Wallhy alokacinda Allah yakar6i rayuwarta naji zafi sosai, 
Cikin danginta bazance da wanda yafini jin zafiba,
Domin munyi zaman kirki da ita,
Wanann kuma bansanda wani hali zata zoba,
Kada ki damu in sha Allahu bazaku samu matsala da itaba, bazan d'auki abunda zai cucekiba,
Allah yayarda amma wacece ita?" tajefo masa tambaya, 
Cikin zuciyarsa yake zullumi yasan dole idan yafad'a mata gaskiya sai an samu tangard'a domin zata iya tada rikici,

TAREDA AL-KALAMINZaynab bawa (zeeyybawa)       TALLACE-TALLACE(Sanya idanuwa akan tarbiyar yarnmu)
BABI NA BAKWAI
SHAFI NA SHIDA
Murmushi mai kyau mlm yahya yayi irinnasu na manya wanda sukasan mesukeyi shiru yayu baice komaiba yazuba mata idanuwa kawai tana magana, 
Sanda yabari tagama duk wani abunda zatayi sannan yadubeta cikin nutsuwa yace" banda abunkiba aisha menene aibu danna auri macenda mijinta yarasu?"
Menene aibun danna auri macenda akaki auren d'iyarta domin batada aure?"
Menene aibuna wajan gyaran 6arna?"
Menene aibuna dan inason toshe baraka?"Menene aibu danna nemi zamawa yarinyarda mahaifinta yarasu uba?"Menene aibu akan neman zamawa marainiyar yarinya jigo?"
Aisha idan mutum zaiga 6arna baiyi qoqarin gyarata ya gujeta inaso kisani wannan ba koyarwar annabinmu bane,Annabi muhammad tsairada amincin Allah su tabbata agareshi yana cewa, idan kaga 6arna kayi qoqarin gyarata tukunna da hannunka da kalamanka iya gwargwadon iyawarka idan wannan 6arna taki gyarsuwa shine yace kai ka gujeta har zuciyarka,
Aisha idan za' samu malamai cikin al'umma sannan kuma suga wata baraka batareda sun nemi toshetaba mai hakan yake nufi kenan?"
Idan za'aki auren d'iya mace domin batada mahaifi mahaifinta yarasu waye sukeda laipy awannan al'umma?"Malamai Aisha yabata amsa cikin nutsuwa, 
Har indai maza zasu rage yawan matanda suke zaune da y'ay'ansu da wannan abu bai kai hakaba, 
Da babu wata wacce zata fito kokuma wanda zai fito yace shi y'arsa bazata auri y'ar mace kokuma d'an maceba,
Inaso kisani dukanmu nan da kika ganmu y'ay'an matane, domin matane suka haifemu, meyasa mutane zasu ringa amfani da wannan kalma suna 6ata sunan iyayenmu mata?"Mai yasa za'ana qauntatawa mahaifanku mata da wannan kalma?" maiyasa wannan kalma tazama abunki cikin al'umma?"Mai yasa za'ana fad'in y'ar mace ko d'an mace bayan kowama y'ar macence kuma d'an macenne domin sune suka kawomu duniya,
Anan amfani da kalmar y'ay'an mace ne wajan macenda mahaifin yaranta yarasu sannan kuma tarsaya tsayin daka wajan ganin rayuwar yaranta sun inganta,
Kisani cewa mafi yawanci matanda ake kiransu da haka mazajensu rasuwa sukayi,Mutuwafa tanakan kowa, watakil nima da kike gani na mutu nabarki da yaran, 
Shikenan kuma sai'ace baza'a auri d'iyarkiba domin y'ay'an matane?"Habawa Aisha,
Niyanzu zan auri khadija domin Allah,
Zan auretane domin inaso y'ay'anta sudawo y'ay'an mace dana miji,
Wasu matan mafi yawancinsu suna qinyin aurene saboda y'ay'ansu,
Ahalin ynzu bakowani namiju bane zau aureki sannan kuma yariqe miki yaranki marayuba, dalilin wannan yasa mata dayawa suke gujewa yin aure bayan mutuwar mazajensu saboda tunanin halinda yaranzu zasu shiga,
Sun kwammaci su zauna suyi fad'i tashi wajan ganin sun nemawa yaransu rayuwa mai yauki,
Ayanzu ba'a taimakawa marayu taimakon marayu yayi qaranci, kina tunanin idan uwa batayi fad'i tashi wajan nemawa yarnta abuba yaya zasuyi?"
Wannna fad'i tashin shine aka d'aukeshi matsayin rashin tarbiya,
Allah yagyara mana al'umma,
Amma Aisha banyi zatonjin wannna kalma daga bakinkiba,Atunanina lokacinda yahuza yazo mikida zancen wannan aure matsayinki na mar'atul saliha sannan kuma uwa tagari wa y'ay'anta nayi zaton abunda zakice shine, yahuza wannan yarinya agaban mahaifiyarta tatashi batada mahaifi, domin mahaifinta yarasu tun taba qarama, daga 6ari d'aya kawai tasamu tarbiya, zan amincew Auranku amma idan batada wani halin banza, zan amince ka auretane akan sharad'i d'aya sharad'in bawanu mai tsauri bane,  Abundai shine Sainayi bincike akan halayan yarinyar dakuma na mahaifiyarta,
Idan kikayi bincike kika samu tanada halin kirki abun farin cikine ace d'anki ya auri d'iya mai mutumci tarbiya da kamun kai,
Idan kuma kika samu halayanta akasain hakanne saiki yanke hukunci matsayinki na mahaifiya,
Aisha abu nagaba shine zancen cewa da kikayi zan auri macenda take zaune ita kad'ai, inaso kisani karuwai masu zaman kansu ya halatta a auresu bayan sun tuba, tuba ingantacciya irin tubanda ubangiji yakeso sannan suyi istibra'i, balle kuma macenda mijinta yarasu,
Babu aibu cikin wannan lamari,Kamar yanda kika sanni nayi alqawari zanyi qoqari wajan ganin na kyautatawa kowacce daga cikinku, sannan kuma zanyi qoqari wajan yin adalci,
Don nace zanyi aure bahakan yana nufin akwai wani abunda kika rageni dashiba, Aa saidai kawai akwai abunda nakeson cimmawane,
Kinkasance mace wacce nake alfahari da ita dakuma halayyanta, Allah yayi miki albarka, 
Mama jikinta yayi mugun sanyi saitakejin kunyar maganganunda suka fito daga bakinta,
Cikin sarqewar murya tace" Allah ya sanya alkhairi yasa ayi cikin sa'a,
Ameen ya Allah ngd sosoi Aysha Allah yayi miki albarka, 
Ameen ta amsa masa
"
Bayan sati ya zagayo aka d'aura auren mlm yahaya da umma,
Dubban al'umma sun sami hakattar wannan taro domin kasancewar mijinta babban malamine, su umma suma nasu wajan akwai mutane dayawa daga abokanan mutumci haka,
Anbari sai bayan 2weeks zata tare,Domin y'an shirye- shiryenda baza'a rasaba,
Tun ana saura 3days umma tatare y'an uwan mahaifin humaira suka zo suka d'auketa,
Gidan mlm yahuza Gidane babba yanada girma domin akwai al'umma dayawa cikinsa ba iyakacin iyalansa bane kawai kama daga marayu zuwa y'ay'an wasu daga cikin y'an uwansa masu qaramin qarfi, maza yayi musu 6arinsu daban domin basa shiga masa cikin gida kai tsaya batareda wani babban daliliba,Akwai wata qatuwar islamiya had'eda wani babban masallaci wanda shi bai gama had'ewa da gidanba amma ana kiransa masallacin malam yahuza,
6arinsa dana matansa dana yara mata ahad'e yake, domin su saika sjiga tawata qofama tacikin gidan zai sadaka da wajansu, babu ynda zai had'asu da samarin gidan, Gidan mlm yahuza bawani ginine kerarre nazamaniba amma kuma komin kushewar mutum bazai kushe gidanba,
D'akin matarsa Aisha uwar gida d'aki biyune aciki dakuma band'aki da palour sai d'akin umma wacce zata zauna shima haka yake d'aki biyu band'aki da palour kowacce d'aki daya dayake ciki shine d'akin y'ay'anta mata, ita umma d'akin surayya ne zata zauna aciki,
Shikuma nasa d'akin d'aki dayane kacal palournsa kuma ba'a had'a da d'akin yakeba domin yana ganawa da jama'ane aciki,Sai babban gate wanda yarufe gidan baki d'aya
"
Ranarda tacika 2weeks da d'aura aure umma tatare agidanta, ranarda umma taga gidanda aka kaita sanda ta zubda hawaye domin tun tana yarinya agidan qasa tatashi tazo tayi aure duka agida ginin qasa tatashi, 
Gashi ynzu tayi aure tasamu gida hadda d'aki biyu da band'aki aciki, tabbas yauta tabbatar ba'a cire raida rahamar ubangiji,
Mlm yahya ya tarasu yayi musu nasiha, kowacce tabada had'in kai wajan yin biyayya,
Zama suke lpy, zaman tsakani da Allah babu wacce takejin haushin wata cikin umma dakuma mama, domin kowa ta fahimci halin kowa,
Ynzu mama take dana sanin Qin had'a jinida umma datayi wanda hausawa suka kirada cewa dana sani kyeyace anrigada anbarta abaya, domin zamanta da umma talurada kyawawan halinta, ynzu kuwa ai abu yarigada yawuce domin tun lokacin ta nema masa wata yarinyar qanwarta, 
Ynzuma haka ana shirin fara shirye shiryen bikinne,
Itakuwa humaira bata ta6a zuwa gidan mahaifiyartaba domin tafara WAEC kuma dama ita idanba talla datake fitaba itaba gwanar yawo bace
"

BABI NA BAKWAI
SHAFI NA BAKWAI
Gidansu suwaiba
Mama! mama! Shine abunda suwaiba take fad'i lokacinda tashigo cikin gidansu, daga d'aki mama taji kiranda suwaiba takeyi mata, tanajin kiran ta tabbatar ta siyarda tallantane, fitowa mama tayi cikin murna tana fad'in suwaiba! Badai harkin dawoba?"
Nadawo mama kuma na siyarma duka d'agowa tiren tayi tana fad'in kingani ko d'aya babu, kuma Kud'inki bai 6ataba suwaiba tafad'a tana washe baki, Mama itama dariyar takeyi tace" Ahh lallai y'an matana anyi qoqari, ynzu nazuba miki wanine kokuma zaki huta?"
Suwaiba tana gyara d'aurin zaninta wanda yake qoqarin sincewa tace" Aa mama kibari ni yanzu hakama bacci zanyi zuwa rana saina d'auka na kayi,
Toh naji kishiga ki huta kiyi baccinki kafinnan nima zanyi qoqari nahad'a abincin rana, wucewa suwaiba tayi d'akinta, juyowa tayi tana fad'in laah ungo wannan mama kinga na mancema kuma ban baki kud'inba,
Sanya hannu mama tayi takar6i kud'in tana fad'in y'annan babu abunda zance dai dai Allah yayi miki albarka, maza shiga kiyi baccinki,
Suwaiba tana shiga mama tasoke kud'in jikin zaninta, cikin azama tafara kici kicin had'a abincin rana, 
Ba suwaiba tatashiba sai qarfe 2na raba hakanma kashine ya tasheta tana tashi tanufi band'aki da saurinta,
Sanda tagama sannan takwala mamanta kira, mama! Mama! Na'am mama ta amsa tana qoqarin fitowa daga cikin d'aki,
Mama kawomin buta, toh mama tafad'i had'eda d'ura ruwa cikin butar takai mata,
Bayan tayi tsarki tafito tana fad'in mama ina abincina?"Yana kitchen mama tafad'a tana komawa d'aki d'auko abincin tayi tafaraci, shinkaface da wake da mai dakuma yaji tanaci abunta cikin kwanciyar hankali,
Fitowa mama tayi tad'auki kujera y'ar tsugunno tazauna tana duban suwaiba tace" suwaiba kiyi-kiyi mana, ranafa tayi sosai yanzu zakiji yamma tayi ynzu idan kika d'auka kafin kidawo dare yayi bazakiyi wani ciniki ba,
Suwaiba tanacin abincin tace" mama aikoda yaushe nafita dashi zan siyar nikam ki rabu dani kada na kware,
Shiru maman tayi mata, ita kuma tacigaba da d'urawa cikinta abincin,

Koda tafara qoqarin guduwa ya cafketa yayi d'akida ita subhanallah (wannan al'umma tamu ta lalace dayawa inna lillahi wa'inna ilaihi raj'iun wannan duniya ina zaki damu munsanya san zuciya yafi qarfin tunaninmu, kana tsoho wanda kakeda yara da jikoki katsaya kana lalata da yara qananu mai kake nema cikin wannan duniya?" wani irin rud'in duniyace haka yake damunmu?" shin wai muna mantawa cewa akwai mtuwa kuma lahira zamuje sannan akwai hisabi, Allah maji roqon bawansane balle bawanda aka zalinta, wannan wace irin ta6arace karasa yaranda zaka lalata sai sa'ar jikarka, inama kaje kasamu wacce take dai-dai dakai y'ar iska irinka idan Allah yatashi kamawa saiya kamaku tare, zaka nemi yarinya qarama ka lalata mata rayuwa, Allah yananan kuma baya bacci Allah zai sakawa duk wani wanda aka zalinta)  Ita furera duk tunanin tad'auka irin abunda sukeyi da big boy kawai zasuyi yabata kud'i tatafi abunta amma kuma saita samu akasin haka domin abun yafara fin qarfin tunaninta domin tana ganin yafara neman yin babban abun tafara kuka tana qoqarin kwacewa,Amma ina qarfi ba d'aya dukda kasancewarsa tsoho sanda yasamu yaci galaba akanta, 
Itama suwaiba anata wajan hakane domin yarigada yacika burinsa yayi mata fyad'e, ihu kawai sukeyi duka su biyun amma dayake nugayen mutanene basu kyale suba,(Duk wanda ya rabaki da budurcinki bata hanyar aureba wallhy yaci mutumcinki yarabaki da abu mai tsada da daraja wanda bazai ta6a dawowaba yarabaki da kimarki dakuma dajarki ta d'iya mace bbau wanda zai aureki yayi miki kallon mutumci)
Kamar daga sama y'an shaye shayenda suke uncompleted building d'inda yake bayan gidan sukejin ihu dafarko sunso su share amma kuma sai sukaji ihun qara yawa yakeyi,
Zaga yawa sukayi ta gaban gidan yayinda suka sami wasu mutane baza'a kirasu da yaraba domin zasu iya kaiwa 40yrs suma ihun sukaji sukazo gaban gidan amma arufe kirif da sakata taciki,
D'aya daga cikine yadubi d'aya yace wannan ihu yawa yakeyi gara musan abunyi, y'an shaye shayenne sukace wani yahau yagani mana, 
Wani saurayine ya haura sakata ya cire suka shigo abunda suka gani yayu matuqar d'aga hankalinsu,
Kamosu sukayu suka fito waje dasu yayinda sukabar su suwaiba cikin gidan,
Tun kafin afara taruwa suke roqonsu su barsu zasu basu duk wani abunda sukeso amma kuma basu barsuba abu yahad'a da y'an shaye-shaye, jibgan way'annan tsofi suka hauyi babu Kakkautawa, suna ihuw sukuwa sauran mutanen basu hanesuba saima samub y'an tayasu dukan da sukayi,
Domin duk wanda yazo wajan idan aka fad'a masa abunda suka aikata sai yaji babu dad'i, aqanqanin lokaci wajan ya ebi d'arurrukan mutane,

Girgizakai sukayi suna fad'in wallhy wannanne kawai shid'inma sharrin shad'anne, wani wawan mari wani daga cikin y'an shaye-shayen yakai musu hannu bibbiyu yana fad'in shegu y'an iska kaji zasuyiwa oga(shaid'an) sharri, kowani shege yakwaso tsiyarsa sai jibgewa oga,d'ayane daga ciki yace baba ogafa d'an iskane shima kabari kawai, auzubillah Allah yatsaremu ameen
"

KUNDIN HASKE

K'UNGIYAR:- HASKE WRITTERS ASSOCIATION
(Home of expert and perfect writters)
TAREDA AL-KALAMINZaynab bawa (zeeyybawa)       TALLACE-TALLACE(Sanya idanuwa akan tarbiyar yarnmu)
BABI NA BAKWAI
SHAFI NA TARA
Humaira bata leqa gidan ummanta ba sanda tagama WAEC nata dake WAEC kadai zatayi, bazatayi NECO ba, Hutu tajewa ummanta da niyyar tayi mata d'an kwana biyu dake ynzu ba makaranta zatana zuwaba, Tunda humaira taje gidan kowa yake yaba irin tarbiyarda tasamu dominA kullum da safe humaira tatashi takan share d'akin mahaifiyarta tayi mata duk wasu ayyukanda yakamata sannan takoma d'akin mama(maman mlm yahuza) itama tayi mata ayyuka,A kullum itace take share mata d'aki ta mopping d'insa, ranarda mama tazauna sanda kwalla yafito mata domin tana tunanin irin kyawawan halayya na umma da d'iyarta takaicin rasa iri irinna umma takeyi akullum kwanan duniya,
Shikuwa mlm yahuza baisan wanda mahaifinsa ya auraba shidai kawai yasan cewa mahaifinsa yayi aure sannan kuma duk ranarda yashigo gidan bayan yagaida mahaifiyarsa itama yakan shiga ya gaidata,
Yauma kamar yanda yasaba yashigo gaida mahaifiyarsa zai fita makaranta,Da sallama ya shiga humaira wacce take shara ta amsa sallamar kunnuwansa suka jiye masa kamar muryar humaira amma kuma sai yake gani muryarce kawai tayi kama idan kuma bahakaba mai zai kawo humaira gidansu?"
Amma yana shiga idanuwasa sukayi tozali da humaira tana shara mamakine yakamashi sosai harya gaza boyuwa,
D'agowarda humaira zatayi kenan suka had'a idanuwa da mlm yahuza, d'an rusunawa tayi tagaidashi, batareda wani alamun birkicewa kokuma akasin haka afuskartaba, domin tana cikin shigarta ta kamala kamar yanda tasaba,
Amsawa yayi sannan yace mama tana cikine?"Gyadakai humaira tayi had'eda fad'in eh tana ciki,Zama yayi d'aga daga cikin kujerun palourn sannan yace" d'an kiramun ira dan Allah, toh humaira tafad'i, had'edaAjiye tsinstiyar hannunta tashiga ta sanarwa mama zuwan mlm yahuza sannan tadawo taqarasa sharan,
Fitowa mama tayi tana fad'in sannu y'ar albarka d'iyata nagode sosai, Allah yayi miki albarka,
murmushi humaira tayi had'eda fad'in ameen sannan fice daga d'akin,
Rusunawa mlm yahuza yayi ya gaida mahaifiyarsa sannan yadubeta cikin mamaki dakuma al'ajabi yace" mama naikuma humaira takeyi anan gidan?"Aiki take muku?" yayi maganar cikin alamun tambaya da qin gaskatawa,
Girgizakai mama tayi sannan tace" Aa yahuza ba aiki takeyiba mahaifiyarta itace matar babanku aii,
Jijjigakai yahuza yayi yana tuno maganar mahaifinsa dayake fad'in yasan abinyi wato abinyin kenan shine ya auro mahaifiyar yarinya,
Allah yakyauta yafad'i afili sannan yadubi mahaifiyarsa yace" mama nizan wuce makaranta, cikin tausayawa mama ta dubeshi sannan tace" yahuza idan bazakayi lattiba ina bukatar yin magana dakai,
Komawa yayi yazauna yana fad'in mama kefa mahaifiyace ko umartata kikayi da kada naje makarantar bazaniba, balle kuma kinason magana dani,
Gani kiyi duk wata maganarki babu wani lattinda zanyi,
Murmushi tayi sannan tace" toh Allah yayi maka albarka,
Dama zan baka hakurine gameda maganar humaira, dan Allah kayi hakuri nasan nayi maka ba dai-dai ba matsayina na mahaifiya kamata yayi ace nayi bincike akan yarinyar, batareda nayi hakanba na yanke hukunci, kasancewar yarinyar tana zaune gaban mahaifiyarta,
Abunda bansaniba shine muda yaranmu suke gabanmu nida mahaifinka muke ikirarin sun sami tarbiyar uwa data uba, babu abunda zasu nuna mata wajan tarbiya, nayi dana sanin wannan kalma tawa ta y'ar mace, nagane cewa bawai don mace ta goyi yarinya shine hakan yake nufin yarinyar batada tarbiyaba,
Tunda mama tafara magana kan mlm yahuza yana qasa bai iya furta komaiba,
Sanda yaji tayi shiru saiya d'ago yace" mama dan Allah kidaina bani hakuri kefa mahaifiya tace kuma kinada iko akaina, banga laify donkin hanani wani abun kin za6amin waniba,
Girgizakai mama tayi sannan tace" hakane yahuza amma kuma kaika kasance yaro mai biyayya gareni, domin baka yimun musu kokad'an sannan kuma aiyazama dole nidakai muyi jimamin rashin wannan yarinya mai tarbiya, amma matar mutum kabarinsa bancirerab cewa zata zama matarkaba, amma ynzu muyi addu'a Allah yayi mana za6i mafi alkhairi,
Ameen mlm yahuza ya amsa mama tace tashi kaje yahuza Allah yayi maka albarka,Nanma ameen d'in yasake amsa sannan yayi mata sallama yafice,
Koda yafita bai fice kai tsayeba sanda ya shiga d'akin umma itada humaira yasamesu apalour suna shirin karyawa gaida umma yayi yatashi zai fice umma tadubi humaira tace" humaira haka akeyi?" babu gaisuwa, murmushi mlm yahuza yayi sannan yace" ai umma mun gaisa ad'akin mama, Eyyer toh aina d'auka baku gaisaba umma tafad'a cikin dariya, dawonan ka karya kullum kazo d'akinnan saina yimaka maganar karyawa amma sai kaqi, murmushi yayi baita6ajin yana sha'awar karyawa ad'akinba sai yau don haka yadawo yazauna umma tadubi humaira tace zuba masa abincin, cikin nutsuwa ta qaraso tazuba masa, yadubeta yanda take komai cikin nutsuwa, lallai zancen mahaifiyarsa gaskiyane dole suyi jimamin rasa yarinya mai tarbiya irinta,
D'aki humaira takoma tazauna tabarsu awajan harsuka gama sai bayan yatafi sannan tafito itama takarya sannan takwashe kayan takaisu wajan wanke-wanke
"
Tafiya takeyi kamar zata tsinke sai wani karai raya takeyi kamar zata kamar wata karuwa haushi ta takaici suna gama cika mlm yahuza wai arasa wace yarinya za'a had'ashi da ita sai wannan marar tarbiyar, hanya yake qoqarin canjawa domin kokad'an baiso suhad'u takaici yakeji idanya ganta,
Ganin yana neman kaucewa yasanya qara sauri harta cimmasa, tana zuwa ko sannu babu tace yaya yahuza guduwa zakayi?" tayi maganar tana qass ta chewing gum, kallonta yayi cikin takaici duk fuskarta tayu wani farii fauu hannayenta baqaqe qirin da qafafunta gawtaa babbar waya a hannunta wanda zai iya rantsewa idan za'a saida duk wani abunda yake cikin gidansu bazaikai kud'intaba sannan kuma yasan kud'in tallanta bai isa yakai kud'in wannan wayaba, koda yake yasan ynzu tadaina talle tunda yafara nemanta yahanta yin tallan tunda idan tafita banda sheqe ayarta babu abunda takeyi awajan, tayi shigar banza tatafi wajan talle shago-shago babu wanda bata saniba, tunda yahanata talla sai shegen tambayarsa kud'i datakeyi har dana sanin hanata yayi,
Maiya fito dake dasafe haka?" yafad'a yana 6atarai, kame-kame tafara tana fad'in yaya gidansu qawata naje nakwana shine ynzu zan koma gida,
Tsaki yaqaraja domin yasan qarya takeyi babu wani gidan qawarta dataketa,Baisan cewa gidan saurayinta taje takwana ad'akinsaba, subhanllahi wannan wace irin rayuwace, wani haukane zaikaiki matsayinki na uwa kibar d'iyarki tatafi gidan kawarta takwana?" kinbita kinga gidan qawartan takwana?" shinwai idanma kawartarce kinmanta meyake faruwa yanzu tsakanin mata da mata, wannan cuta tafi zina illa, illolin mad'igo yawa suke dashi, wallhy jarabar wannan abun tafi jarabar zina, jarabar wannan abu tasanya mana al'umma agaba,Wallhy iyaye saimun tashi tsaye wajan tarbiyar yaranmu, ba mu'amalar d'iyarki da maza kawai zaki dubaba wallhy harda matanma domin suma yanzu sun zama tashin hankali ga al'umma, idan y'ar mad'igo d'aya tashiga cikin al'umma zatayita 6atata, Allah ka karemu, sukuma masuyi susan cewa illar wannna abun wallhy bayanzu abun yakeba saikinyi dana sani marar amfani cikin rayuwarki,Gara tun wuri ku shiryu wallhy, wai tayayama za'ace jarabawa kala-kala baza suna sauko manaba?" bayan irin sa6o kala-kala damukeyi yiwa ubangijinmu, wallhy Allah yana hakuri damu, domin irin abubuwanda akeyi awannan zamani yawuce tunani, ya Allah, Allah, ya arrahman ya al-rahim ya al-mulk ya al-quddsu ya al-salam, ya zuljalal wal ikram, Allah muna tawassali da sunayenka kyawawa Allah ka kare mana al'umma, Allah kakaremu da kariyarka, Allah kakare al'ummar musulmi daga fad'awa halaka ameen ya Allah
"
Cikin kyankyami mlm yahuza yake dubanta yace kibari zanzo da daddare, domin shikam idanba hancinsaba wallhy wani irin warin gardawa takeyi tun tsayuwarsa yakeji kuma yadameshi,
Murmushi tayi tace toh saikazo gyadakai kawai yayi yawuce yabar wajan
"
To be continued
Ur's zaynab Alabura
"

BABI NA BAKWAI
SHAFI NA GOMA
END
SHARHIWannan littafi namu nasan mutane dayawa zai 6ata musurai yayinda wasu zasuga dai-dai tuwar rubutashi mutane dayawa dasuga wannan labari yashafi rayuwarsu,Tabbas munsan da hakan kuma munsan dacewa rayuwar mutane dayawane cikin wannan al'umma domin Wasu abubuwane dayake faruwa cikin rayuwarmu na ynzu mutane dayawa sun 6aci basu d'auki wannan duniya bakin komaifa face wurin shaqatawa, wallhy Allah muna tunasar daku kusani cewa akwai mutuwa kuma duk daran dad'ewa zamu mutu zamu koma ga mahaliccinmu sannan akwai hisabi domin duk abunda ka shuka cikin wannan duniya yana rubuce sannan zakaje ka tardashi
"
Mun rubuta wannna littafi badan komaiba saidan muna neman gyara cikin al'aumma, mafi amfanin abunda akeso marubuci ya rubuta shine abunda zai kawo taimako cikin al'umma, abunda zai kawo gyara cikin al'umma, anaso marubuci ya nemi abunda yake faruwa cikin al'umma sannan ya nemo mafitarsa, yarubuta wannan abunda yake faruwa cikin al'umma yarubuta illarsa sannan kuma da mafitarsa
"Allah yabamu ladan abunda muka rubutashi dai-dai shikuma wanda mukayi mishkila akansa Allah yayafe mana, domin d'an adam tara yake bai cika gomaba bbu wanda yawuci aikata kuskure cikin rayuwarsa,Sai dai akullum muna roqon Allah ubangiji yasanyamu ahanya madaidaiciya, Allah kakaremu da karewarka Ameen ya Allah
"
Godiya ta tabbata ga Allah ubanjigin talikai wanda ya hakicci duk wani abunda yake cikin wannan duniya tamu, Allah mungode maka daka had'amu da masoyanmu tako'ina kukad'ai abun alfaharine garemu HASKE WRITERS ASSO, babu abunda zamuce sai fatan Alkhairi, Allah ya had'e kawunanmu cikin aljanna, Ameen,
Jinjina gareku HASKE WRITERS ASSO,Allah yaqara had'e kawunanmu yabamu ikon rubuta abu mai amfani, Allah yaqara mana himma wajan fad'akarda al'umma, Ameen ya Allah
"
Malam yahuza
Mlm yahuza yana tafiya yana taraddadi domin tunanin fall cikin ransa tambayar kansa yakeyi shin ya hallatta ya auri wannan yarinyar bayan yasan halinta?"
Tabbas yasan idanya aureta bai za6awa y'ay'ansa uwa tagariba domin kokad'an batada halin mata nagari, sannan kuma bai sanda wani irin hali yaransa zasu tasoba, shidai yasan shiba fasiki bane, bazai zuba ido yana kallo yaransa su taso shed'anuba, 
Haka harya isa makaranta yakasa tsaida ransa waje d'aya koda yashiga aji bai iya yiwa d'alibai wani abun kirkiba saida yaga abun yana neman takura masa sannna yacire cikin ransa yace zaici gabada addu'ar za6in alkhairi wajan ubangiji domin yasan duk abunda ubangiji yayi mai kyaune,
Idan kuma aurennan ya yiwu yasan jarabawace ta ubangiji zaiyi qoqari wajan ganin yaci tasa jarabawar sannan ya riqe qaddararsa hannu bibbiyu
"
Da daddare kuwa ya shirya domin cika alqawari yasan girman alqawari so bazai yarda ya sa6aba,
Wani yaro yagani yasanya yakira masa ita, bata dad'eba tafito kamar dama tana jiran zuwan nasane, tasha poundation jagira ancika baqi anbita da concealer sai kuma eyeshadow duk wannan kwalliyar washi akayiwa,
Tana zuwa ya kawarda kansa saiji yayi tana qoqarin matsowa jikinsa juyowa yayi yace wallhy idan baki matsaba saina 6allaki,
Babu shiri ta matsa domin ba qarya tana tsoronsa, 
Tsaki yaqaraja shikam yarasa ita wace irin yarinyace marar tarbiya,
Kallonsa tafarayi tana soshe soshen kayi tunda yaga haka yasan wani abun take buqata,
Idanuwa yazuba mata yana jira yaji abunda zata fad'a, ganin tayi shiru yasanya yace fad'i ina jinki, aikuwa dama jira take tafara fad'in dama yaya yahuza ankon kawatane zanyi kuma banda kud'i,
Uhmm dama haka kika sani ynzu namu auren saura sati biyu kike tambayar kud'in anko?"
Meyake damunkine haka?"Murgud'a baki tayi tana fad'in shikenan dan aurena sati biyu sai bazanyi ankon kawataba?"
Jijjjiga kai kawai yayi cikin takaicu yaciro dubu biyu yabata,Jujjuyasu tayi tana fad'in mai zanyi da dubu biyu?"Kallonta yakeyi da mamaki yace ba ynzu kika tambayeni kud'in ankoba?"
Kud'in anko d'in shine dubu biyu?" tafad'a tana kallonsa yanzu aiko kud'in atamfar yafi dubu biyu balle kud'in dinki gana gyale da takalmi,
Bazan iyaba wannan kad'ai ke gareni idan bakiso dawominda kayana,
Riqewa tayi tana fad'in nifa nagaji dakasan baza kana biyamun buqataba dabaka hanani fita talla taba, akanme zaka hanani fita samu kaikuma kaki bani,
Aiba abun arziki kike kullawa wajan tallarba shiyasa na hanaki, nifa aurennan idan kinga da takuri gara afasa,
Jin yayi zancen fasa aure yasa tashiga taitayinta domin kuwa tasan irin halayyarta zaiyi wuya ta auru domin babu irin tambatsewarda batayi,
Ai abun baikai hakaba, kai badama afad'i gaskiya saika fara zancen fasa aure, nikam saida safema tafad'a tanayin ciki, shikam yaji dad'in tafiyarta don haka yaja kafarsa yayi gaba yana cikin tafiya yaji sallama abayansa juyawa yayi yana kallon mai sallamar kamar yawayi fuskar saidai bai isa sanin yanda yasantaba,
Amsa sallamar yayi had'eda miqa masa hannu suka gaisa, mlm yahuza yace naga kamar ban wayi fuskarkaba, mutum yace eh baka wayeniba amma naga kana shirin dafka babban kuskurene, wannan yarinya da kake zuwa wajanta ba y'ar mutumci bace kokad'an bata dace dakaiba wallhy idan kasan halayyarta bazaka qara yarda kazo wajentaba nasanka nasan babanka babban malamine bazanga abunda zai cuceka nayi shiru wallhy wannan ba mace tagari bace, 
Bakayiwa y'ay'anka za6en uwa tagariba, ynzu idan ban takurekaba muje can muzauna nabaka 5minute zuwa 10miute a idanuwanka zakaga mai zai faru,(nasan wasu zasuyi tunanin wannan mutumin munafurci yazoyi Aa kokad'anba munafurci bane gaskiya yazo fad'a yana neman fidda d'an uwansa daga halakane, dayaga d'an uwanta d'an isakane babu abunda zai sanya yanufeshi don gaya masa gaskiya, wani abunda baku saniba shine idanke ba mace tagari bane wallhy kona miji yazo neman auranki zai fasa, kinsan daga ina kike fara samun matsala?" idan baki saniba kisani daga anguwarku za'a bishi afada masa kaf halayyarki wasuma harda qari makwabtanki wanda kike musu kallon raini da rashin mutumci ke adole y'ar iska, wallhy sune zasu fara yimiki cikas wajan samarinki, idan Allah ya taimaka kinada rabon yin aure sannan kishiryu sai kiga ko'an fada masa halayyarki zai aureki haka, ammafa yana mugun wahala samun hakan, domin bbu wanda zaiso auren y'ar iska, idanke matar aurece kinacin amanar mijinki kina tuanin bazai saniba wallhy akwai ranar qin dillanci, Allah yakaremu)
Itakuwa tana komawa gida tad'aga waya takira domin azo ad'aujeta ita kud'in anko takeso wa'iyazu billah, 
Aikuwa mlm yahuza yana wajan wata tafito wata mota wacce ko kyan fasali bata dashi yazo tashiga ciki suka tafi,
Shikuwa mlm yahuza dakyar yatafi gida aranar bacci gagararsa yayi,
Itakuwa bayan sungama shed'anancinsu yadawo da ita da safe tacewa mamanta gidan qawarta takwana kuma batayi mata fad'aba
"
Mamace tatashi domin tafiya gidan qanwarta suji abunda ake shiryawa ba biki,
Suna zaune sunad'an tad'awa akan lamarin bikin, tafito da gudu sai makwarari amai kawai takeyi kamar zata amaye abun cikinta, 
Maman tatashi tayi kanta bayan tagama tazuba mata ruwa tad'agota tana fad'in eyyer sannu dama batada lpyneh?"
Cakk tatsaya lokacinda suka had'a idanuwada ita, juyawa tayi takalli qanwarta tana fad'in ke kinga maina gani kuwa?"Yarinyar nanfa kici gareta,
Tasowa uwar tayi tana fad'in ahh haba yaya ciki kuma?"
Baki yardaba kenan?" zoki duba da kanki, mamanta tana zuwa tasanya salati tana tafa hannu, 
Mari mama takaiwa yarinyar tana fad'in fad'amun waye yamiki ciki?" kona takaki anan,
Dasauri mamarta ta matso tana fad'in yaya kiyi mata ahankali zata fad'a, 
Saketa mama tayi tana fad'in duk yanda akayi kinsanda wannan ciki kuma da d'aurin gindinki, ke ga dukkan alamuma wannan bashine na farkoba sai domin bai dameki ba abun, yaya dan Allah kiyi shiru kiyi ahankali kada makwafta suji,Ki rufa mana asiri,
Asiri daya dazan rufa mikk shine nayi shiru da bakina amma zancen d'ana ya aureta kam wannan babushi, dama rufa-rufa kikaso yimun?"Y'arki tagama tanbad'ewa zaki cuceni kije keda Allahn ki zakiga sakayya wajan sanya yarki tana wannan mummnan aikin, sannan kuma kiji tsoron Allah, idan kinguji idon mutane bazaki gujewa Allah ba,
Mama tana fad'in haka yajuya tafice,
Makwabta kuwa ashe sunji zancen duka dama sunsha jin tanada ciki daga nan sai zance yasha ruwa baza'a qarajin zancen cikinba, aikuwa wannan tunda d'umi d'uminsa aka nemo y'an hisba, suna zuwa aka tafida ita, sanda tafad'i waye yamata cikin,
Lokacinda yazo firr yaci musu bashin bane aiba shine kad'ai manemintaba sunada yawa ba lallai cikinsa bane, ya nunata yana fad'in wannan y'ar iskar har zata gane waye yayi mata ciki, kamar karya haka take kowa takebi,
Aikuwa sukace wannna ruwansa tunda yayarda yana nemanta ciki yadawo nasa dole sujira lokaci yayi ta haihu sannan ya aureta, sannan kuma akayi musu bulala kamar yanda addini ya umarta domin duk cikinsu babu wanda yata6a aure, dasun ta6a aure sukayi zina hukuncin kisa ta hanyar jefewane,
mahafinta da mahaifiyarta suna sun sani nasu hukuncin dai-dai gwagwado,Sannan ita kuma da mahaifiyarta aka sanya koda sau d'aya sikayi qoqarin zubda cikin sai an kamasu
"
Ikon Allah wallhy cikin wannan rayuqa ina mugum mamakin wad'anda zasu d'auki budurcinsu suyi kyauta dashi wa wani qato wanda ba mijinsuba sannan kuma ba ganin mutumcinsu zainayibi domin daga lokacinda kika bawa namiji wanda ba mijinkiba kanki wallhy koda yana kallonki da mutumci yadaina kenan, althrough akwai wanda qaddara take fad'a musu sannna kuma babu wanda yafi qarfin qaddara awannan duniyar, amma kuma kisani budurcinki shine mutumcinki shine kimarki shine duk wani taqamarki gidan miji, walhy duk wani sonda namiji yake miji bayan ya aureki yazo ya tarardake fanko wallhy Allah dole saiya tsaneki wannan soyayya saita ragu, dazaran kinkaiwa mijinkk budurcinki alokacin zaki zama mai kima da daraja idonsa, while wancan banzanda kikaje kika bashi kanki batareda sadaki da shafa fatihaba wallhy babu banza irinki kuma daga wannan lokaci ya manceda kashinki domin kyautarda kikayi masa batada amfani agareshi baisan darajarta mutumcinta dakuma tsadartaba,
Sannan kuma wasu ba daga wanna shikenanba daga zaran sun rasa budurcinsu zasu d'auka cewa shikenan mai ya rage sai afara sheqe aya, abunda yarage shine kikama mutumcin ance mutumci madara idan yazube ba'a kwashewa ina againsig wannan magana tabbas idan yazube bakwasuwane bazaiyiva dukane bazai kwasuba maizai hana kigyara halayyarki ayanzu kifara tattaro mutumcinki,Hmm y'ar uwa daza ki gane da kimbar halayyan banza domin sukansu maza sunason mace tagari, su kansu maza suna alfahari su sami mace tagari, zasu gana lalataki suje sunemi kintsattsiya, dazaki gane dakema kinzama tagari
" namijinda kika bawa kanki shine zai fara yawo dake matsayin y'ar iska, idan baki saniba har kalan pant dinda kike yawan sawa saiya fad'awa abokanansa
"
Wai ana fad'in iskanci wajan maza adone hhh dan uwa bazaka gane iskanci ado bane awajanka sai lokacinda akayiwa d'iyarka gwargwadon abunda kayiwa y'ay'an wasu, aranar zakaji zafinda mahaifin yarinyarda ka lalata yaji, hmm dazaka gane daka daina lalata y'ar wasu domin nemawa d'iyarka sauki cikin wannan rayuwa, Allah yasa mudace ameen
"
Allah yakare mana y'ay'anmu qannenmu y'an uwanmu zuri'armu baki d'aya da al'ummar musulmai daga fad'awa wannan hanya domin uwa tafi kowa jin zafi idan aka 6ata mata d'iyarta, Allah yakaremu da ganin wannna rana, ameen
Koda mama takoma gida abun duniya ya dameta dan haka tashiga d'akin umma bayan sund'an tad'a mama tadubi umma tace" dama da wata magana nazoni bansan wani irin kallo zakiyi mataba,
Murmushi umma tayi tana fad'in kada kiji komai kifad'a kawai,
Dama humairace nace koza'a had'ata da yayanta yahuza, cikin murna umma take dubanta tace haba humaira aii y'arkice babu komai Allah yasanya alkhairi,
Ameen! ameen! Mama ta amsa mlm yahuza yatafi gasar karatu na qasa bayanan akayi zancen, aikuwa dayawo da murna domin shi yayi nad'aya, mama tatareshi da zancen aikuwa yayi murna sosai, 
Amma saiyace mama amma yaya akayi kika canja ra'ayi lokaci d'aya haka?"
Labarin abunda yafaru tabashi sannan tadubeshi tace kagani ina wacce take zaune gaban mahaifinta da mahaifiyarta ta lallace wacce take wajan mahaifiyarta bata lalaceba,
Gydaakai yayi yana jinjina wannan lamari,
Ba'adauki lokaciba akayi auren mlm yahuza da humaira, inda suke zaune lpy ba'a dad'e dayin aurenba aka d'aukeshi zuwa gasar karatu na duniya baki d'aya, nanma shine yaci na d'aya,
Anan suka bashi admission a jami'atul madina, yanda yafara karatun likita duk bayan shekara yake dawowa, yanda humaira ta haifi d'anta,
Bayan yagama karatu suka d'aukeshi aiki acan, yadawo yad'auki matarda suka tafi dud bayan 1yrs suke zuwa hutu gida,
Haka rayuwa taci gaba da tafiya musu, wannan labari yasanyani tunanin duk wani mai ilimin qur'ani ba wukantacce bane, sannan wanda ya d'auki wannan duniya wajan shaqatawa kawai ba tabbacecce bane dazamu gane damun gyara rayuwarmu, da munyi amfani da lokacinmu damun nemi lahirarmu tun kafin mutuwarmu ta riskemu damun bar duniya tun kafin duniya ta barmu, Allah yasa mudace ameen
"
Anan nakawo qarshe wannan gajeren labarin nawa, Allah yabamu ladan abunda muka rubuta mai amfani abunda mukayi kuskure Allah yayafe mana ameen
"

Da sand'a ta nufi wajen da ya ajiye wayar tana murmushi, "Yau zan ga me kake aikatawa, yadda kake kaffa-kaffa da wayar nan
"Da azama ta d'au wayar, cikin sa'a kuwa ta samu wayar a bud'e ba wani samaki, ba bata lokaci ta danna kan shud'in application me nuni da Facebook
Gaban ta ne ya fad'i ganin sunan Linda da koren rubutu a saman ak'watin sirri, hannu na rawa ta danna ta shiga kan sunan, ta fara yin sama tana son kamo farkon hirar
"Innalillahi wa inna ilaihi raji'un
" Shine abinda Ta furta tana k'ok'arin gasgata abinda idon ta yake gane mata, runtse idon tayi da sauri ta bud'e tana son tabbatar da abunda take gani k'wance akan screen d'in wayar Idris
Wani irin jiri ne ya d'ebe ta a take ta zube a wajen, cikin muryar kuka ta shiga furta wa kamar wata tababbiya,
"Haba Idris! haba Idris!! kar kayi mun haka mana, wayyo Allah nah, na shiga uku
" Bubbuga kanta ta farayi a jikin kujera tana kiran sunan Allah, tana furta kalmar"Why! Why!! (Mesa! Mesa!!)

Tarairaya da kulawa babu irin wadda bata samu a wajen sa, farincikin samun cikin ya sanya sun manta tashin hankalin da suka shiga a baya, sun dinke tsaf sun koma kamar da, lokaci zuwa lokaci takan tuna har sai yanayin da take ciki ya chanja daka farin ciki zuwa bakin ciki, amma duk da haka tana kokarin yakicewa tana farantawa mijinta had'e da tunatar dashi hakkok'in Allah lokaci zuwa lokaci
Ta lura maza a wannan zamanin suna da karancin ilmin islama, sun fi bada hankalinsu kachokam wajen ganin sun sami ilimin boko, sai anyi auren sai ka ga wani ko sallah da k'yar yake tashi yayi
Kullum burinsu su d'au waya suga me duniya take ciki, yau wanda abu ne ya faru a majalisar dokoki, ko a fad'a shugaban kasa
Daka nan kuma sai chatting da yanmata
A wannan bigiren dole a matsayinmu na mata sai munyi hubbasa wajen saita su, amma ba ta hanyar nuna iko da bacin rai ba, ta hanyar lallami da soyayya da tausasa harshe
Misali;"Ummm Baban Hanan, ni kuwa sai nake ganin kamar mun d'anyi sanya wajen bauta wa Allah, musamman sallar asuba k'wana biyu bama iya yinta akan lokacinta saboda rashin kwanciya da wuri da muke, kasan fa wayoyin nan babu abinda suke mana sai dai su kaimu su baromu, gashi sun shiga ranmu sosai, ya kake ganin zamu magance wannan matsalar?" Ba sai Baban wance ba, ko Abban wance, ko swthrt ko ma dai mene ke kika san mijinki
Ke kikasan yadda zaki yi magana ya fuskance ki, wani a lokacin sai yace toh mu tsara lokacin da zamu dinga kashe waya muna ajiyeta
Wani mijin ma in kikayi masa haka sai ya hau zagi da cin mutunci yace kin maidashi kafuri kince baya sallah
Kowa ita tasan halin kayanta
Wata kuma sai kaga taxo mijin na xaune yana tsaka da dannan wayarsa, dama ta gama k'umewa da bacin rai tana ganin ya fi bawa wayar tasa muhimmanci akan ta, sai kuji tace;
"Abun da ake a gidan nan ba'a kyautawa, mutum in ya kama waya kamar ba gobe, sallah ma mutum be damu yayi ta ba saboda waya
" Cikin fushi da kumbura fuska, anan shi kuma gogan zai hau dokin zuciya sai kuma rigima ta barke
Allah ya kyauta
Bangaren uwar gayyar Khairat ta tsomale ta zama kamar wadda tayi jinyar shekara guda, babu wani jituwa tsakaninta da Jabir, k'wata-k'wata ya kauracewa zaman gidan ma baki d'aya
Rabon sa da ya zauna yaci abinci a gidan ta manta, barci ne ke kawo shi kawai, anan ya k'ara sumun damar barje hirarsa da yanmatan sa, dama saboda Khairat d'in yake d'an saukakawa, amma yanzu tunda komai ya fashe sai ya bada kaimi cikin rashin tsoro
Tayi bala'in tayi kukan tayi tashin hankali amma duk a banza, tana farawa yake toshe kunnensa da earpiece
A cikin haka mashkoor ya fara kashin hakori, kafin kace me ya galabaita matuka, babu irin kiran da batayi wa Jabir ba amma fafur yak'i d'agawa
Tana kuka ta sungume shi sukayi asibiti, kafin suje har ya fara amai idanunsa sunyi fari ya matukar galabaita
Kati ta k'arba tabi layi tana kuka kasa-kasa, mutane wajen 10 ne a gabanta gashi likitan ya fita yana tsaka da duba wani yaro, babu wanda yasan in da yayi har aka ci wajen mintuna goma, wai kuma da sunan emergency unit kenan
Ta kusa da ita ce ta lura da yadda Mashkoor din yake suma, cikin tausaya wa tace ta shiga wajen likitan lokacin da layi yazo kanta
Data shiga ma sai da matar dake kai files wajen likita taso yi mata wulakanci ganin ba sunan ta ne a jikin file d'in da yake gabanta ba
Sai data fita ta kira matar data bar mata layin nata sannan ta yarda

Shafi na shida
Kukan ta ya karad'e baki d'aya harabar wajen, cike da tausaya wa kowa ke kallon, tsaye take a kofar wajen bayan likita yace ta d'an jirasu a waje, bata san in da zata sa kanta ba, sai kawai ta hango Jabeer yana takowa kan barandar da alamun ita yake nema
Ganin kiran nata yayi yawa yasa yayi tunanin komawa gida ko akwai wani abu, be sameta ba sai matar Malam Hassan ce ta aiko yaranta ya gaya masa bata nan ta tafi kai Mashkoor asibiti, kafin ta tafi asibitin dama sai data shiga gidan anan ma ta ari kudin kati da d'an sahun da zai kaita
Sai ya juya da azama ya nufi asibitin, direct Emergency Unit yayi don yasan dole a chan zai tarar da ita
Da sauri ta isa gabansa ta ruk'unkume shi tana kuka, 
"Kiyi shiru ki fad'a min me yake faruwa, me ya sami Mashkoor
" Ya tambaye ta cikin rud'ani da tashin hankali
"Mashkoor ya mutu Jabeer
"
"Innalillahi wa inna ilaihi raji'un
Ya shiga furta wa yana ja da baya hannunsa cikin nata har ya dangana dasu jikin karfen dake kan barandar

Cikin d'akin ta koma suka rufa mata baya, akan dan karamin gado suka hangi Mashkoor
" Yaronku be mutu ba
" Muryar Dr ta daki kunnensu
"Alhamdulillah
" Suka hada baki cikin madaukakin farin ciki
"Kawai dai dogon suma yayi, wanda tsananin galabaitar da yayi ne ya jawo hakan, yanzu dai an baku gado zuwa a ga jikin nashi
Sai a kiyaye gaba da zarar yaro ya nuna yar alama ta rashin lafiya ayi kokarin kawo shi asibiti
"
"In sha Allah Dr, mun gode
" 
Fita sukayi Jabeer ya wuce ya biya kudin d'akin da magunguna
Jinyar Mashkoor shine ya k'ara ladabtar da Khairat, tayi laushi tubus har ta shiga neman shiri da Jabeer ganin yadda yake shash-shareta, hankalinsa kachokam yana kan kula da d'ansa
Tayi nadamar irin tijarar da tayi wa mijinta, a yanzu kam ta saduda ta tattara duk wasu makaman yak'in data d'auka tayi watsi dasu
Ana haka Mashkoor ya warware sosai, aka sallame su sukayo gida, sai Jabeer ya tsiri cin magani da fuskewa, duk don ya riga yayi wa kansa alkawarin daina sakar mata fuska tun da dai ita bata san mutunci ba, abu ya hadu yayi wa Khairat yawa, ido rufe take neman shiri da mijinta ko ta wacce hanya
Gashi d'an mutuncin nata da yake gani ya gama zubewa tatas
Duk yadda taso ta shawo kansa abu ya faskara, hausawa sunce "Icce tun yana d'anye ake tank'wara ce
" Kuma shi Yak'i d'an zamba ne" Ganin wankin hula na neman kaita dare ya sata lalub'o number Anty Maijidda don ta d'ora ta a hanya
Bayan ta gama karanta mata duk abinda ya faru da irin cin kashin da tayi masa, sai ta rufe ta da fad'a cikin fushi
"Wannan sam ba tarbiyyar da muka baki bace Khairat, bansan in da kika koyo wannan bak'in kishin naki ba, banda kema dai ina ke ina duba wayar sa? Wanna tsautsayi ne ya kaiki? Kullum fadan da ake yiwa mata kenan amma na rasa gane wannan musibar, ki barshi yaje chan ya karata da wayar sa, tun da ko kin hanashi na hanuwa zai ba
Sannan ni haka kika ga muna zaune da abokiyar zamana? Ko kuma haka kika ga su Innani da Yakolo suna yi? Mene ne a ciki don mijinki na neman kara aure, kibi ki tada masa hankali, toh wallahi in zaki nutsu ki dawo kan turba ta gaskiya ki dawo
Ki gode wa Allah ma mijinki aure yake son k'arawa be je waje yana binsu ba, ki nutsu ki jawo mijinki a jiki kafin ki gama fitar masa a rai
Yazo a gabanki yana yin abubuwa don ya kona miki rai
Kinji na gaya miki
"
Ba ta da bakin magana don duk abinda Anty Maijidda ta gaya mata gaskia ne
Godiya tayi mata suka ajiye wayar kowannen su da abinda yake sakawa a ransa
Sake-saken yadda xata shawo kansa ta shiga yi, har ta kusan cinye kafatanin lokacin ranar bata samo mafita ba
Bayan ta idar ta sallar magrib Mashkoor na goye a bayanta sai wani tunani ya fad'o mata
Tunanin fara zama ta tsara masa text message me nuna ban hakuri
Sai ta samu kanta da gamsuwa da shawarar da zuciyarta ta ta kimtsa mata

Sai ta ajiye wayar ta fad'a kitchen cikin farin ciki
Lokacin da ya dawo ya ga chanji sosai, abubuwan da rabonsa dasu tun suna shekarar farko ta aurensu, sai gashi yau Khairat ta sake dawo dasu a karo na biyu, cikin karramawa, mutuntawa da girmama juna
Yaso ya ja abin yayi nisa, amma ganin yadda ta saduda yasa shima ya bada kai bori ya hau
Sai ta k'ara kaimi wajen kyautata ma mijinta da kuma kauda kai akan duk wani abu da ya zama ba haramun bane ga aikata shi
Hira ce dai da yanmatan sa bata isa tace zata hanashi ba dama, sai kawai ta zama kurma, bebiya, makauniya a wannan bangaren
Shima da ya lura da haka sai ya ja baya sosai ya rage musamman in ya dawo gida
Ya kan ware wasu sa'o'i su zauna su tattauna matsalolin su
Bangaren Idris da Naima ma komai ya zama tarihi, sun bada himma k'warai wajen ganin sun raini cikin nata
Komai da yasan zai b'ata mata rai ko ya sata cikin shakku ya daina yin shi
Na'ima nada wani babban matsayi a zuciyarsa da wani irin k'warjini da girmanta da yake gani
A haka cikin ta ya shiga wata tara, sai ya tattarata ya mik'a ta gida saboda samun gamsashshiyar kulawa
Kullum yana kan hanyar gida har zuwa gidan har ranar da ta santalo masu yarinyar su kyakkyawar gaske
Murna wajen Malam Idirisa ba'a magana, bakin nan kamar konar auduga, a take yayi mata khud'ub'a da sunan da Na'ima ke nacin soHAFSAT
K'wanci tashi ba wuya a wajen mai duka, Baby Hafsat tayi wayo abunta a cikin k'wanaki Arba'in d'insu na wankan gida, dak'yar da sud'in goshi ya barsu suka cika arba'in din ma yana ta mitar ya gaji da gauronci
Aikuwa a ranar ya duro suka tattara kayansu suka tafi
Sai kulawar Hafsat ta koma kachokam wajen babanta, in har ka ganta wajen Mamanta toh yunwa ce
Rayuwa tayiwa ahlin biyu dadi tsawon shekaru biyar da suka shud'e, abubuwa da dama sun faru ciki har da karuwar zuri'a in da Khairat take da Uku, Na'ima ke da biyu

Ire-iren wad'an nan maganganun sun sabayi da Na'ima, matsaalar da take kira shi sam be d'auke ta a matsayin dalilin da zai sa yayi ba kishiya ba, shikenan don baya samun cikakkiyar gamsuwa daga wajenta saboda wani dalili wanda ba ita ta dora ma kanta ba, kuma shima be fi karfin Allah ya d'ora masa ba

Matsalar ciwon sanyi da yayi mata mugun kamu ke addabar ta wanda taji mata da yawa suna fama da wannan masifar, babu irin maganin da bata yi ba, tana kuma kanyin wasu, kama daka kan na asibitin har zuwa na gargajiyar
Sai dai har yanzu babu sauki
Matsalar babba ita ce, su mazan basa son shan magani, gashi likita tace lallai su sha maganin tare dashi sannan za'a sami sauki
Sai ta hakura ta kama harkokinta tana cigaba da tunanin mafita tun da ta gama saddakar wa dole watarana Idris zai gaji ya fara neman aure duk kuwa da hakurin sa
Tana lura dashi cizewa yake kawai yana dannewa amma dole tasan babu dadi
Da daddare ma da ya dawo sai ta so k'ara yi masa zancen ganin babu fuska yasa ta watsar da cigaba da yin maganinta in da ta had'a saiwar zogale, Tafarnuwa da kanumfari ta dakesu tsaf bayan ta tsaftace saiwar da ruwa
Sannan ta sasu tukunya ta tafasa su sosai
Ya zama mata ruwan shan ta, da wayo ta dinga ribatarsa shima yana sha, sai ya gama mita sannan yake karba yasha da kyar
Ita dai lallabawa kawai take ta samu dai yasha
K'warai taji dadin had'in, sai ta bada kaimi da himma wajen shansa ba tare da kosawa ba
Dama shi ciwo lokaci d'aya yake shiga amma saukinsa sai a hankali
Da taimakon Allah ta samu komai ya zama tarihi
Rayuwa tayi musu dadi ainun
Kowanne bangare suna mutunta junansu
Khairat da Jabeer sun d'inke tsaf, tayi kokari ta danne zuciyarta, ta d'auki tarihin wayarsa ta zuba a bayan k'wakwalwarta
Ko da wasa bata taba gigin zuwa wajen wayar ta sa ko da zata karachi ife-ifenta
Sai dai in har shi da kansa ya nemi ta mik'o masa
Bikin yar gidan Anty MaiJidda, Ummu Ramlat ya taso, gadan-gadan suka shiga shagali ba kama hannun yaro
Khairat anyi mota honda civic yar karama ana ta fasa kai, anan bayan an had'u da yanuwa hira ta barke duk akan illolin wayar miji
Na'ima da Khairat sun fi kowa zagewa wajen nuna illar duba wayar tunda su ganau ne ba jiyau ba, kowa yayi na'am da bayaninsu, kowacce tayi alk'awarin danne zuciyarta
In dai da ci, sha, sutura, mutuntawa, kyautata wa, uwa uba ana ganin girmanka, babu amfanin da mutum zai kwallafa rai akan ganin me mijinsa ke aikatawa a wayar sa
Anan na kawo karshen wannan d'an karamin littafin nawa na wayar miji, hak'ikanin gaskiya naso k'warai na fad'a d'ashi sosai yadda abubuwa zasu fito
Sai dai rashin isashen lokaci da abubuwa da suke sako kai cikin uzurorin yau da kullum
Ina fatan mata da yawa dalilin wannan rubutun nawa zasu gane su hankalta su daina damuwa da wayar mazajen su wanda har dani a ciki
