KUNDIN HASKE - Na goma - Wattpad
KUNDIN HASKE
ALKA'LUMAN MARUBUTAN HASKE
KUNGIYAR:    HASKE WRITERS ASSOCIATION ( home of expert and perfect writers) 
AL'KALAMIN   SLIMZY 
RASHIN IYA ZAMA DA SURUKA
BABI NA GOMA shafi na goma
KASHE
Koda sadiya ta dawo batabi takan mama ba da kannen Abubakar daki ta shiga saboda Tana cikin tsananin zumudi da murnar gobe tayi bintu tazo gidan ta kawo Mata makamin yaki,
Gab da kiran sallah Abubakar ya shigo gidan hannunsa rike da Leda na Kaya da ya canjowa sadiya gudun fitina lokacin sadiya na kofar dakinta Tana yankan salad,
Da sallamarsa ya shigo be Lura da sadiya dake kofar dakiba hankalinsa ya maida kofar daki mama,har ya wuce ya dawo ya daga labule ya yi sallama ya shige,sadiya tsayawa tayi galala Tana kallonsa kamar ta Mike ta shakosa,
"Mama barka da yamma ya ibadah?"
Mama cikeda faraa tace "ibadah alhamdulullahi ya kasuwar?"
"Alhamdulullahi mama"
ya maida kallonsa ga waazin da mama ke kallo a TV
Sadiya kuwa minti minti take maida kallonta ga kofar dakin ko zai fito taji shiru,a zuciye ta Mike ta nufi kofar dakin babu ko sallama ta bankade labule ta shiga ledar hannun Abubakar ta fincike ta fice tace "saika taho"tayi waje abunta ko a jikinta,galala sukayi Baki bude suna kallonta cike da mamaki,shiko Abubakar kunya CE ta lullubesa ya kasa ko motsin kirki ji yakeyi tamkar kasa ta bude ya shiga,shin yaushe sadiya zatayi hankali?
yafi minti biyar a zaune kamar an dasashi sanan ya Mike jiki a sanyaye yace "mama asha ruwa lafiya"
Mama tace"Allah yasa"
ya fice ,
Shukra ta kalli mama tace"Allah ya kawo karshen wanan matar mama,bakin cikine saboda taga Yaya yafara dawowa hankalinsa"
Murmushi mama tayi tace"tsakanin da' da mahaifi Sai Allah kullum inayi mata adduar shiriya Allah ya shiryeta"
Shukra ta tabe Baki tace"idan me shiryuwa CE"
Koda ya shiga daki bece da ita komiba itama batace dashi komiba Sai wani haushinsa da takeji shi kuwa yasa Mata Ido yagani ko zatayi magana Akan abinda ta aikata?
batace komiba har akasha ruwa dare yayi kowa ya nemi wajen kwanciyarsa,juya Masa baya tayi ya kyaleta ,
Babban burinta da tunaninta be wuce Allah ya kaimu safiya ba takosa gari ya waye Dan ta dokanta da abinda bintu tace Mata,
Shi kuwa tunani yakeyi kala kala Akan halayen sadiya besan ranan da zata shiryuba ga wani irin sonta da yakeyi
Mama kuwa kwana tayi Tana fadawa Allah damuwarta Akan surukarta Allah ya karkato Mata hankalin danta ita Kuma Allah ya shiryeta
Washe gari tunda safe Abubakar ya shirya yayi ficewarsa bayan ya Bata kudin cefane yanayi Mata magana Tana kyaleshi
Karfe Sha dayan Rana bintu ta diro gidan,tun daga kofar shigowa gidan take shewa "assalamualaikum masu gida kawata sadiya don gida nakine komi dadewa Sai gida ya Zama naki ranan da Kika haife abinda ke cikinki Dole ya gaji ubansa"
A guje sadiya ta fito daki ta amsa "barka da zuwa kawata masoyiyata nakosa kizo inji Dadi Dan kece kawai Zaki kawomin karshen wanan ciwo dake damuna a zuciya"
"A hayye aibazaki taba daina ciwon zuciyaba matukar kina zaune da ulcer,kina tare da ciwo "
Dik maganganun da sukeyi mama na daki Tana jinsu shukra na makaranta balle ta tanka,
Kujerar tsakar gida sadiya ta fito dashi suka zazzauna suka cigaba da zazzaga rashin kunya ,
Bintu tace cikin daga murya"Wai nikam sadiya ya kike Zama da ulcer ne?"
"Ai kawata bazaki ganeba wanan munafukar tsohuwar ta kanainaye komi konaja raayin danta saita shiga ta fita taje wajen malaminta ya dawo Mata dashi,yau ma saboda uwarsa tun safe yabar gidan Nan ko sallama babu"
"Kada kiga laifinsa sadiya laifin asirine ai dik Wanda zai zauna da uwar miji Sai yayi hakuri"
Tunda Abubakar ya doso hanyar shiga gidan ya farajin hayaniya don Yana tsayawa da mashin bintu na shigowa Sai ya nemi bayan kofa ya tsaya Yana sauraron dibar albarkar da akewa uwarsa,ya tsaya yaji karshensu Amma jikinsa rawa yakeyi ya kasa jurewa a guje ya fada gidan
Sadiya na ganinsa ta Mike tsaye da sauri,

RAYUWAR NI 'YA SU
1)   Zaune nake bayan d'akin kaka rabi ina gunjin kuka me had'e da sheshshe'ka shin me nayi wa mahaifiyata da tayi ko oho da rayuwa ta anya kuwa ni din d'iyar halal ce ko de tsuntoni tayi ta badani ga baba malam wanda nake yiwa kallon mahaifi, magana nake cikin zuci ba tare da nasan ta fito fili ba kawai se jin tafi nayi a kaina d'ago luhum luhum d'in idanuna nayi karaf cikin na haule aikuwa ta fyalla cikin d'akin Inna rahila tana fad'in  "Inna Inna zo kiji abinda aunty yaya ke fad'a"Dattijuwar mace tafito baki a ta'be "ya akayi haul
"Katseta tayi dacewa cewa take wai baba malam bashine ya haifeta ba kuma ita tsintarta akayi
"
"Ke da Allah ki magana a nutse" cewar sagir daya shigo, hararar gefen Ido ta watsa mai tashiga basu labarin abinda nace kaf,  Inna rahila taja gud'a tare da doka zani "cass yarinya maganarki hakkun"Galala yaran suka zuba mata na mujiya fadime da ta shigo tun lokacin da haule ta fara zuba tace  "Inna bangane hakkun ba?" "Kwarai duk abinda ta fad'a' ba 'karya ciki"Ta banka labule ta fad'a uwar d'aka
Guntun tsaki sagir yayi ya juya zuwa waje dan jin kiraye kirayen sallah fad'ime ma d'akinsu ta fad'a yayin da haule ta mara wa Inna baya
 "Baba malam nikuwa Idan babu damuwa inaso na had'a yarinyar ka rahinatu data wajena su zana jarabawar shiga jami'a wacce za'ayi nan da watanni biyu masu zuwa"
Murmushin jindadi baba malam yayi ya dora da cewa"To Alhamdulillah, Alhaji wannan magana taka ta faranta min kwarai babu abinda zance se fatan Allah ya jikan mahaifa Allah kuma ya biya bukatu, Alhaji ni mutum ne me son karatu sosai bare karatun d'iya mace dake dede da karantar da al'umma"
"Hakane, amin nagode kwarai Allah ya raya zuri'a, d'azu kuwa naga sirikinka wannan
" "Wanne kenan?""Yaron medala" "Af yaje ta wajenku kenan""Eh sunzo siyan kayan gini""Allah sarki hakane dake kasan mahaifin nasa ke ginin estate""Oh Allah sarki, to ni Bari na koma a gaida su Inna, na barka lafiya, ga wannan kasa kati""Alhaji baka gajiya, to madallah Allah yayi albarka" bin bayan alhaji kabiru yayi da ido yana me jinjinawa karamci irin na mutumin kafin ya zira kudin cikin aljihun wando ya shiga gida da sallama dede lokacin Abdullahi ya shigo hannunsa rike da takalman ball kallonsa baba malam yayi had'e da girgiza kai a zuciyarsa yana mamakin matasan yacce suke kwasar kafafu su tafi ball tun bayan la'asar ba za su dawo ba kuma se ana sallah wanda da kunnensa yasha jin ana magana a unguwa kan hakan gashi ko masallacin kofar gidan nasu se su kwashi kwanaki kan su shiga
Bandaki na shiga na wanke fuskata na dauro alwala bayan na fito na bude lokar kayana na zari hijab nayi sallah ko da na idar se na shiga karatun qur'ani kamar ko yaushe sallamar Ahmad naji Yana cewa aunty yaya wai kizo inji babanmu
Se da nakai aya na maida qur'anin mazauninshi na linke sallayar na nufi falon babanmu dake kwayayen fitulun sun mutu saura guda daya se yazamana falon da duhu sallama nayi a nutse bayan an bani izini na shiga tsugunnawa nayi "barka da dare babanmu" Bece dani tatafar ba se ma daukar remote yayi ya rage karar labaran NTA da yake kallo, jikina yayi sanyi inaji ya shiga kwalawa Abdullahi kira aikuwa se gashi ya leko ta dakinsu baba malam gani dauko bulala kazo yanzu" Tuni jikina ya shiga rawa har bansan lokacin da hawaye ya ballemin ba saukar duka a jikina shi ya dawo dani cikin hankali na, hankali tashe na bud'e baki zanyi magana naji fau fau fau tuni jikina ya saki na fad'i daga can nesa Ina iya jiyo muryar kaka rabi tana cewa "kai Abdullahi uwaka Ibrahim ashe baka hankali bansani ba kasheta zakuyi
" Duff naji komai ya daukemin
Ruwan dake kwarara cikin jikina yasa ni tashi a firgice Ina sakin atishawa hakwarana nata harhaduwa da junansu ga wani zugi da jikina kemin a hankali na d'ago kaina karaf na hangoni jikin mirror jikina ko ina shatin bulala ne kwace daga can Ina jiyo hayaniya a falon baba malam muryarsa a sama yana cewa "Banda ita yar iska ce dan ta tambayeni kudi nace mezatayi dashi shine zatace wai bana sonta kuma ko tsintarta akayi
" "To baka ganin yarinya ce dududu rahinatu tafi shekara ashirin"
"Aa fa kaka ashirin fa aikuwa da da rabon aure da har haihuwa tayi shine take yarinya Kawai iskanci ne da samun wuri" cewar Abdullahi
"Kai da Allah sakarai ficemun da gani daka yanzu rahinatu zata koma d'akin dake daura da nawa dan bazan yarda ku illata min ita ba"
"Kaka itakadai kenan ko?" Inji Inna
"To ko zaki had'ata da haule"
"Me? Ah ah ah ah tarbiyyar 'yata nakeji"
"Nima banaso Inna"
"Hm kwaji dashi de"tasa kai ta fice
D'akin ta ta nufa inda nake kwance ganin fuskarta kicin kicin yasa nayi tsuru tsuru kwa'be baki nayi hawaye na ambaliya a fuskata ganin ta d'aga min hannu yasa na had'iye kukan ba shiri "Rahinatu ki bud'e kunnenki dakyau kiji abinda zan fad'a miki, kinga rashin jin nan naki babu inda ze kaiki kina ganin yanda ake libgar ki de kamar jaka to billahillazi ki nutsu kiyiwa kanki fad'a banda shirme irin naki kawai dan kin tambayi mahaifinki kudi ya tambayi amfanin da zakiyi dasu se ki dau zafin zuciya kije kina maganganu oh ni adawiyya yaran zamani se a barku daAllah ni bar kallona idanu kamar na mage"
Raurau nayi ina mutsitstsike idanu nace  "Kaka rabi insha'Allah na dena"
"Allah yasa, maza tashi ki kintsa min d'akin bari nasa arniyar can ta tattare miki wancan d'akin" Dariya nayi wai arniya, tattare d'akin nashiga yi zuwa can na bi bayan kaka rabi inda na sameta can tana bawa Grace order dan tsifiri na kaka rabi ruk da rashin dattin d'akin be hanata cewa a wanke d'akin har bango ba ko dake baba rabi ko daga kallo d'aya da zaka yi mata kasan macece me tsafta ga uwa uba gayu
"Raheenah" jin yanda aka 'kan'kameni ta baya nasan bakowa bane face aminiyata Khadija Kabir, Juyowa nay muka rungume juna muna farincikin yaushe gamo
"Wow gskya khady nayi missing dinki, ni nayi fushi dake ma tunda kika tafi baki nemeni ba"
"Ayya mana kawas kiyi hakuri wlh wayata ce ta fad'i kinkuma sanni uncle rabs ne ya sani a computer school shiyasa naki ri'ke wayarma gudun karta daukemin hankali amma yanzu haka maganar da nake miki gashican daddy ya sa ya Umar ya samo min"
Murmushi nayi "kin kwaci kanki, bari na kawo miki drink to",riko hannuna tayi a rud'e "raheenah meya samu jikinki haka?" Murmushin takaici nayi "bari na dawo my khady abubuwa da dama sun faru" a sanyaye tabi bayana da ido har na fice, fridge din d'akin kaka rabi ba'a jima da kunnawa ba hakan yasa na nufi corridor kici'bus mukayi da fadila hannuna me d'auke da ruwa ta Kalla "Ke rahinatu wannan ruwan me bala'in sanyi zaki sha bayan kinsan situation dinki?""Ni nasha wannan fadila rufan asiri, my khady zan kaiwa""Laaah ta dawo?""Eh bata jima da dawowa ba, ko zaki le'ka ku gaisa? ""Bari naje kuwa dama Ina zaune a d'aki ni kad'ai am so bored dariya nayi muka jera zuwa d'akin, kallon da ta watsomin yasa nayi dariya 'kasa 'kasa kan tace "fadila manyan 'kasa ta alhaji uba bada kanki a sare"Tafawa sukayi suna dariya"nifa shiyasa nakesonki kin iya wasa mutum da akwai canji jikina da na watsamiki" "Cau hajiyata girmanki ne" gaisawa suka yi suka shiga hira kad'an kad'an nake sa baki dan fadila akwai surutu ba lefi kwala Kiran da Inna tayi mata ne yasa ta mi'ke ta fita aikuwa my khady harda saurin bankawa kofar key ta d'an harareni "Dalla kin kama kin jawo mana ita, kinsan sarai akwai abinda zamu tattauna" zama tayi tare da riki hannuna cikin sanyin murya tace "bani labarin bayan rabuwa 'kawata"Tiryan tiryan nashiga bata labari wani abin kuka abin takaici wani kuma abin farin ciki wani tayi dariya wani ta matsi kwalla knocking da akayi bisa kofa shi ya katsemu bud'ewa nayi Inna na tarar tsaye har 'kasa na tsugunna "Inna barka da rana" "barka Dai, kede kullum kina d'aka kamar aljana tayi 'kwafa da Allah
" Muryar my khady ta katseta "barka da rana Inna""Ah ah ahh wanake gani kamar mutan Abuja?""Nice Inna""Sannu ko andawo lafiya ashe tare kuke bari na barku rahinatu zuwa anjima zaki dora mana abincin dare yau baba twohuwa batajin dadi ni zan le'ke gidan hafiza yan biyu basuji dadi ba" "To subhanallahi Ayi musu sannu" "zasuji insha'Allahu"Ranar wuni mukayi nida khady tun bare datayi min maganar jamb da daddy ya biya mana zamuyi har girki tare mukayi se kusan tara na rakata har 'kofar gida dake ma'kota muke dasu mukayi sallama kan cewar gobe ni zan shigar mata dan haka muke tun muna yara
Nasan masu karatu zakuso jin labarin gidanmu
Malam ibrahim daura shine cikekken sunan mahaifina wanda muke kira da babanmu ko muce baba malam kamar yanda fiye da rabin jama'a ke kiranshi, dattijo ne cikakkiyar kamala wanda yake da ilimin addini sosai 'bangaren boko ma ba lefi duk da matakin sakandiri ya tsaya wanda yake dede dana gaba da sakandirin wannan zamani dan kuwa su turawane suka koyar dasu a wancan lokacin
Nice d'iya ta bakwai gurin babanmu cikin mu Goma sha uku Maza biyar Mata takwas Abdulbasid wanda muke kira da ABBA shine babba wanda yake controller custom me bi mishi aunty rakiya, aunty farida, aunty hajara(karama), Abdullahi, hauwa, fadila, ni, fad'ime (wacce muke sa'anni na bata kwana shida),Aliyu, sagir, haulatu, Ahmad karamin mu
Kaf yaran babanmu Yan cikin Inna ne Idan ka cire ni da Aliyu wanda yake wurin kakata tagurin mahaifiya, ban ta'ba sakashi a idona ba kamar yanda ban ta'ba ganin mahaifiya ta ba Sede nasan cewar Aliyu bashi da lafiya Hakan yasa kullum addu'a ta cikin sallah Allah ya bashi lafiya Allah kuma ya gama fuskokinmu har da mahaifiya ta da kullum nake kwana I cikin mafarkin ta
Inada 16yrs na gama secondary, yanzu haka kuma banjima da kammala NCE dina ba, duk Yan uwana sunyi aure harda albarkar yara Idan ka cire ni da fadila wacce muke da ran nan da wasu watanni zamu Sha shagalin nata se aunty farida da aurenta ya mutu watanni bakwai da suka wuce
Tafiya muke a gajiye nida khady mun dawo daga zana jamb, wata ba'kar motar GLK har ta wuce ta dawo da baya tun kallon farko da nayi mata naja guntun tsaki khady dake dariya 'kasa 'kasa tace "Ga mutumin naki fa" "Naganshi wlh yanzu ze isheni da surutu, kinsan ya tsani ya ganni Ina tafiyar 'kasa ko yaganni a napep" "Tabb lallai ya daukota da zafi se ya zama drivernki duk inda zaki se yarin'ka kaiki" "Lallaikam, gashinan ya fito muyi kamar bamu ganshi ba"Gaba mukayi abinmu dede lokacin wayata tashiga ringing Sunan Aminu college nagani nayi smiling kan na d'auka da sallama bisa bakina "Wslm raheenah dan Allah kuntsaya inda kuke bari na 'karaso" "Ka 'karaso Ina? Kasan kuwa Ina nake?" "Gaki kuwa Ina hangoki dede MSK, dan Allah jirani kad'an""To bari na samu inuwa"  "Tom gimbiya duk yanda kikace haka za'ayi"Na datse wayar Ina kallon khady namini dariya da cewa  "Shegiya yi mana bakin ciki mu da'ba har gida sanin kanki ne yau wahalar abin hawa ake" Kan nace wani abu naji horn nufar motar nayi tare da bud'e back door Ina dariya nace salam alaikum dariyar ya maida min da cewa "ranki ya dad'e ayi hakuri a dawo gaban dai" a d'an shagwa'be nace "Ni Ni wlh" Murmushi yayi ya bude min kofar "Bismillah" cikin yau'ki na shiga khady ta zauna a baya ya ja motar bayan sun gaisa ya shiga jana da hira tare da fad'an meyasa ban kirashi ya d'auke muba, bud'ar bakina se cewa nayi "Nasani ko kana tare da madam"Wani kallo yayi min kan yace "uhmm" dede lokacin yayi parking a bakin yahuza suya spot, be wani jima ba ya dawo rike da fararen ledoji uku yana shigowa ya mi'ka wa khady "Gashi nasan kuna tare da yinwa dan watakil tun safe kuke nan""Ayya mungode Allah ya biya bu'katu Allah ya baka raheena"Aikuwa harda saurin cewa Amen yana wani dashe baki har muka 'karaso gidansu khady yayi parking sallama mukayi masa had'e da alkawarin anjima zan ji shi
Gidan su khady muka shige mummy dake zaune kan d'aya daga cikin luntsuma luntsuma kujerun falon tace 'yan halak yanzu nake zancenku a raina gaisheta mukayi tana tambayar mu exam "Alhamdulillah" muka ansata tare da shigewa d'akin khady dan kintsawa, sallah nayi bayan munci abinci na nufi gida
A falo na tarar da Inna tana harhad'a turarukan wutar fadila kasancewar da wuri take had'awa ta ajiye saboda wai su tsumu  "Barka da gida Inna, ya aiki" "Yawwa an dawo aiki gashinan kun had'ani dashi"
dariya nayi na wuce cikin d'aki, 'kofar d'akin baba dana gani a bud'e yasa na le'ka fadila da aunty farida na hango zaune suna hira da fara'a ta na karasa ciki "Kaga amarsu ikon Allah" "Hahahha ya ranki" "Tass" na bata ansa, dede lokacin da aunty jummai 'kanwar babanmu ta shigo aunty farida ke cewa "oh yanzu aiki ze karu Idan fadila ta tafi"
"Wlh kau Allah yasa makaranta zan fara"Mukayi dariya duka aunty jummai tace"Kwaji dashi de" ta d'auki abinda zata d'auka ta fita nima na gudu d'akina bayan na le'ka nayi ma kaka rabi sannu da gida
Bayan kwana biyu na dawo daga gidan su khady wurin shiga part din babanmu mukayi karo da haule Cikin tsawa nace "ke mahaukaciyar inane da bazaki kauce ba kina ganin na taho"
Cike da rashin kunya ta turo baki"Aunty Yaya kidena cemin mayaukaciya gaskiya"
"Idan na'ki fa?""Ah to Inna de tace Idan mu rin'ka rama duk abinda kika yi mana"
Baki, hanci, Ido na saki Ina kallon kanwar kanwata tana maida min magana dan takaici sam sena kasa magana ido na suka cicciko na fad'a falo inda na tarar da Inna na gaisheta tare da ba'kinta wani ikon Allah ko kallon gurin da nake bata yi ba cikin sagewar gwiwa na nufi cikin d'akin baba na gaisheshi ya ansa har da tsokanata bayan na fito na le'ka d'akin fadila kamar ko yaushe yauma hira suke da aunty farida se de fa gum sukayi ganina "Raheena shige muje" waiwayo wa nayi dan naga me maganar aunty jummai ce, d'akin na shiga ta biyo bayana inda ta kallesu d'ai d'aya kan ta kada baki tace  "Cikinku wane yace da Inna raheena tace shikenan ta shiga uku da fadila ta tafi aiki ze dad'u Allah yaso makaranta zata fara???"
Daram!!! Gabana yayi wani irin bugu jin maganar tamkar saukar aradu dede lokacin da aka kwad'a sallama a 'kofar falo

Duk da halin da nake ciki be hanani ansa sallamar ba tare da kallon ba'kin fuskokin inna fad'ad'a fara'arta tare da cewa "Ah ah su hajiya ummi ne yau a gidan namu?" "Ashe zaki shedani rahila" "Me ko ze hana bismillah ga waje ku zauna" "To madallah bismillahi" wacce aka kira da hajiya ummi tace tare da zaunar da yaron fake ri'ke da hannunta a gabanta
Tsam nakoma cikin d'akin dana fito ba tare da nace uffan ba suna nan zaune yanda na barsu se aunty jummai dake musu fad'a, sakai nayi na wuce dan har yanzu raina zafi yake min
ta gefen ba'kin na ra'ba zan wuce naji Inna na fad'in "Ke baki iya gaisuwa bane?"A duburburce na waiwayo har 'kasa na tsugunna Ina gaishesu da fara'ar su suka ansa min, nan d'aya cikinsu tace "Hajiya a'i kin shaidata kuwa?" " Haba ummi ai ko ba'a fad'a ba Ina kallon idonta nasan Raheena ce abinda yake Iri d'aya ai ni tanan kad'ai zan iya gane family d'in ki, questionable look nabita dashi kan ta katseni da zancen makaranta ina bata ansa kan ta Shimin albarka nan take fad'a min ita d'in mahaifiyar uwata ce , a guje na fad'a kanta na fashe da wani irin kukan dad'i, itama rungumeni tayi gam tana shafa bayana tare da ban baki nan aka barni dasu kowa ya watse bayan sunci abinci sunyi sallah baba malam ya shigo inda ta shaida masa ma'kasudin zuwan ta wato ta dawo da Aliyu gida dan yashiga cikin 'yanuwansa, bud'an bakin baba malam se cewa yayi "Bisa wani dalili zaki dawo dashi?"A razane na kalleshi Kula da haka yasa yace "ke tashi ki bamu wuri" a sanyaye na shiga d'akina jikin 'kofa na jingina na kuma fashewa da marayan kuka wannan shine ga samu ga kuma rashi yanzu baba malam yana nufin su ko da shi kenan jin magana nayi ta bayan d'akina na d'age labulen dan ganin su waye Inna na hango tare da su farida da fad'ima tana cewa "Ai zasu ga iya shege wlh se de ya zauna can d'akin guga dake BQ bade cikin gida ba yaron da bashi da hankali haka kawai tsautsayi yasa wataran ya fad'awa yarana Ni me 'ya'ya mata" Farida ta amshe"Ni kuwa Inna da zaki d'auki shawarata da karkice komai ki jira kiji abinda baba malam zece" "Hakane kuma fa kar ace dan ba d'anki bane" cewar fad'ime  "To ayi ta fad'a mana ai
" "Inna kizo inji baba malam" "To ganinan" ta kalle "Inazuma" ta shigo ciki ni da nake bakin window 'kirjina ya shiga duka tun 'karfi kai jama'a wai shin meke faruwa danine?

Tsaye take a madaidaicin garejin gidan nata tana fuskantar motar qirar matrix wanda maigidanta ke zaune a ciki yana yunqurin kunna motar,baki daya a qage take,Allah Allah take ya kammala kunna motar ya rufe ta ya fice daga gidan,tsayawar da yayi yana jiran motar ta dauki zafi ma gani take kamar da gayya yayi hakan,kamar ta tunkudashi ya fice haka take ji,saidai dole ta saki jikinta ta lallabashi har ya fice,don bata manta gargadin da ya sake yi mata kwana uku da suka gabata ba
Sai daya kammala komai sannan yaja murfin motar ya rufe,a dawo lafiya ta masa ya amsa sannan yace"Ina fatan baki mance da abinda na gaya miki ba"
Kai ta gyada cikin zaquwa "eh in sha Allahu""Kifin nan na jiya,inaso kimin farfesunsa shi zan fara ci idan na dawo bayan an sha ruwa" kasancewar yana azumin litinin da alhamis"Babu damuwa" ta fada tana boye k'aguwar da tayi ya ficeDaga haka bai sake cewa komai ba yaja motar da baya ya fice daga gidan
Da hanzarinta ta koma cikin gida a sukwane idanunta kan agogo,qarfe tara ta gani da minti biyar,ta dan bude baki alamun mamaki,cikin hanzari ta shige uwar dakinta tana magana ita kadai cikin ranta"Nasan yanzu kowa ya fito ni kadai ce na makara" ta qarashe zancan tana yunqurin daukar 'yarta dake kwance tana bacci kan gado,sai data goyata a bayanta sannan ta dauki zaninta dakw gefe ta daura saman doguwar rigar baccin dake jikinta,ta dauki hijabi ta zura tana laluben maqullin gidan"Mama
kashi nake ji"waiwayowa tayi,sai sannan ta tuna da daya yarin yar tata data baro a kitchen lokacin da take mai gidan rakiya,fuskarta ta bata don ta lura yarinyar na shirin sake bata mata lokaci ne kawai duk saurin da take yi"kinga,maida wandonki idan munje gidan anty rakiya kyayi" diddira qafafunta yarinyar ta soma tana gaya mata ya matseta amma sai ta daka mata tsawa,tilas yarinyar ta maida wandon nata tana kwabe fuska,ta dauki muqullan gidan taja hannun yarinyar suka fice ba tare data damu da kauda ko tsinke daga gidan nata da niyyar gyara ba
Gida na hudu dake bayan layin nasu ta shiga,tun daga soron gidan zaka fuskanci gidan cike yake da mata,duk da a lokacin duka duka baxai wuce qarfe tara da kwata na safe ba,sallamarta ya sanya sauran matan da aqalla sun kusa goma sakin shewa tare da yi mata maraba da zuwa,wasu na fadin ga badariyyan nan,fuskarta dauke da fara'a kamar wadda aka yiwa wani albishir da shige cikinsu suka soma gaisuwa,zaman dirshan tayi gefan tabarmar data taddasu kai tana kwance goyonta,baki daya matan kamar yadda take su dinma haka suke,dai daikun cikinsu ne kadai shigarsu zata nuna maka sunyi wanka,ko daidaita a zaman nata bata yi ba wata mace wadda tadan fisu a shekaru tace"Hajiyata ke muketa jira fa,muna nan muna musu da maman kubra,yi musu bayani don Allah ya kijaji maganin""Ah ai jiya ansha shagali in gaya miki hajiya
maganin nan kam babu gaibu a ciki" shewa suka saki baki daya kowacce na bada kunne da hankalinta ga badariyya tare da tofa albarkacin bakinta"Ku saurara,magani fa duk maiso kawai ta karba,kunsan yau sai da baban khairat ya tafemin dubu biyar cash da safiyar nan?" Take suka sake hautsine,muryar hajajju wadda ita ta kawo maganin muryarta tafi ta kowa fita cikin farinciki tace"Ahto,ai na gaya miki,matuqar zaki dimanci amfani da magunguna na ba fada ba ko kallon banza yabar miki,kuma ko zaki kwana kiba zagaye unguwar nan da sunan yawo yabar ganin laifinki bare ya miki fada,balle ma mu zaman qaruwa da juna muke""Ai bari kuji
" Badariyya tayi wani zillo tana gyara zama,nan ta soma fayyace musu duk wani abu daya faru tsakaninta da abban khairat a daren jiya ba tare da tayi duba da yaran da suke wajen wadanda iyayensu suka taho dasu ba,dududu yaran daga shekara takwas ne zuwa qasa
Hira tayi hira,sam baki daya ta mance da husna 'yarta wadda suka shigo da ita tanajin bayan gida,sai wajejen shabiyu da mintina na rana sannan yarinyar ta sake kwasowa a guje ta iso gefan uwar ta tsaya tana cewa"Mama
nayi kashin" waiwayowa tayi tana duban yarinyar kamae zata maketa saboda ta katse mata hirarsu da take ci gaba da daukan dadi,ba tare da daya daga cikinsu tayi niyyar waiwayar gida ba,duk kuwa da cewa a kwai masu qananun yara a cikinsu"Don ubanki shine kika yimin kashi a wando?,wallahi sai naci ubanki kuwa tunda na hanaki bakya jin
", kafin ta qarasa maganar tata wani matashin almajiri da aqalla zaiyi shekara sha hudu zuwa sha biyar yayi sallama riqe da hannu wata yarinya da ba zata wuce shekara takwas ba sanye da unifoarm goye da jakar makaranta,hannunsa riqe da lunch boxs din yarinyar,cike da farincikin ganinsa tace"Yauwa auwalu sun taso,ungo don Allah" ta fada tana miqa masa muqullin gidan"Ka tafi da husna ma baki daya don Allah tayi kashi ka wanke mata,kayi mata wanka don ban samu dama ba,ka gyara kitchen ka wanken tsakar gida kayi wanke wanke,idan ka gama sai kazo ka yikin cefanen,kada ka bar khairat da unifoam ka shiga dakinsu don Allah ka dauko mata wasu kayan ta canza,gani nan zuwa""To anty" ya fada yana karbar muqullin"Nikam yau sha'awar romon kifi nake wallahi,koshi zamu dafa ne?" Lariya matar gidan ta fada tana kallon sauran matan dake zazzaune"Eh wallahi,saidai yanzu da qyar idan za'a samu danye,saboda rana ta soma yi qila sun fara soyawa
saidai ko wajen maman khairat ba za'a rasa ba,jiya kaman ledar kifi na gani gun maigidanki da magariba yana dawowa" cewar maimuna daya daga cikinsu,"Ai baban khairat badai cin dadi ba,kullum ba'a rasa gidanshi da kifi ko nama"murmushin jin dadi badariyya ta saki,saboda ko banza an fasa mata kai an kankarota cikin mutane"Kifi ne kuwa,yana nan a cikin fridge na cilla shege ko gyarashi banyi ba,bari nasaka auwalu ya taho mana da shi""Yauwa hajjaju,amma fa ban da kalanzir""Ba matsala sai ya hado mana da qaramin gas dina mu dafa a nan""Na bayar da mai da maggi" cewar habiba wadda ke zaune gefe tana sauraronsu,a duniya tana kishin yadda ake fasawa maman khairat kai a cikinsu,shi yasa itama take yunqurin wani abu don a yabeta itama duk da mijinta baida qarfin mijin maman khairat din
1
Shewar dadi suka sa kowacce na nuna farincikinta,ko banza yau zasu murqushi dadi,qwalawa auwalu kira tayi kafin ya kai ga fita ta gaya masa abinda zai dauko din,ya amsa da to yaja hannun yaran ya fice da su

KUNDIN HASKE
_Al 'kaluman Marubata_
KUNGIYAR:-
HASKE WRITERS ASSOCIATION (home of expert and perfect writers)
MUTUNCIN MACE
TARE DA ALQALAMIN
SAFIYYA ABDULLAHI MUSA HUGUMA
02
Cikin qanqanin lokaci aka kammala farfesun kifin kowacce ta dibi rabonta bisa jagorancin daya daga cikin matan wato lariya,wadda take kaman itake bada order da control na dukkan macen dake kai kawo a gidan,nan suka baje kowacce na kaiwa baka hira ta sake daukan sabon salo
Duk da yadda wasu daga cikin matan ficewa zuwa gidansu da d'ai da d'ai da d'ai d'ai hakan bai ankarar da badariyya ba har sai misalin biyar da rabi na yammaci sannan ta farga,cikin hanzari ta miqe taba saba yarinyarta a baya,sai a sannan ta tuna da ko abinci bata girkawa abban khairat ba,gwara yaranta sunci a nan gidan lariyar,sauqinta d'aya ma tasan auwal ya gyara mata gidan dakin maigidan da abinci kawai zata dora,sallama ta yiwa sauran matan da sukayi shigowar yamma cikin gaggawa ta fice
Saidai me?,Kaca kaca ta tadda tsakar gida zuwa kitchen din,wanda tuni auwalu ya gama abinda zaiyi ya fice ya bar yaran,wanda hakan ya basu daman shan shagalinsu abinsu,kayan wasansu ko ina kaca kaca,sam ta mance ma da yau suna da islamiyya bare tayi tunanin turasu,hannu ta sanya ta dafe kanta tana dubansu tamkar zata saki kuka,sannan ta sauke hannun ta qaraso cikin hargagi ta soma qunduma musu zagi cikin bacin rai,sai data gama zaginta mai isarta sannan ta soma tattare tsakar gidan da kitchen din wanda hakan ya dauketa a qalla mintuna talatin duk da cewa ba wani fita fes yayi ba,sai shida da rabi sannan ta tsaya a kitchen din da niyyar dora girki,ta tuna ashe gas din nata na gidan lariya,cikin hanzari ta figi mayafinta tana salati ganin duka duka mintuna goma zuwa a shirin suka rage kiran sallar magariba dama dawowar abban khairat baki daya
A hanzarce ta dora dafa dukan taliya saboda rashin isashshen lokaci dama gas din data fuskanci ya kusa qarewa,da sauri ta janyo zobon data jiqa shigowarta ta zuba masa tiara ta tace ta saka a jug sannan ta nufi fridge da shi,sai data bude fridge dinma sannan ta tuna mitre din gidan a kashe take kasancewar bata wuni a gidan ba,sam babu wani sanyi a fridge din haka ta cusa jug din ta koma kitchen
Qarar horn da bude garejin gidan ya sanyata rugawa zuwa dakin girkin ta sauke ruwan dafa dukar ta dora ruwan zafin da zai sha shayi,ganyan shayi kawai ta jefa a ruwan saboda sauran citta da kanunfarin nata da ita suka dafa kifin dazu,hanjin cikinta ya kada sanda taji baban nasu na tambayarsu"A'ah
husna
ya haka?
ke khairat ban hanaku fita wasan qasa ba?,ko a qasa kuke zama a islamiyyar?,dubi jikinki kaman wadda baki wanka ba""Laaaa Allah abba munyi waka,auwalu ne ma yayi mana", cak ya tsaya da abinda yake yi yana duban yarinyar,wani zallar bacin rai na shigarsa,baisan sau nawa ba zai maimaitawa badariyya ba,baisan sau nawa takeso ya gaya mata ba,don me zata dinga sanya almajirinta namiji yaron da ya kusa shekara sha biyar yana kama yaransa mata yana musu wanka?,hannun khairat kawai ya kama husna na riqe a hannunsa suka bulla tsakar gidan ta wata qaramar qofa
Kallo d'aya tayi masa ta karanci zallar bacin rai daga fuskarsa,sai ta kasa samun qwarin gwiwar yi masa sannu da zuwa ta bige da duba ruwan zafin dake kan gask,yayin da shi kuma ya isa ga qaramar diyarshi dake rarrafe zuwa wajensa ganin shigowarsa tana bangale masa baki,sauke husna yayi ya isa gareta ya dagata yana dan cilla ta sama tana sakin dariya,yana matuqar son yaransa saboda yasan bashi da wani abu mafi kusanci da zuciya da gangar jikinsa irinsu,sai a sannan ta samu qarfin halin yi masa sannu da zuwa,ya amsa ciki ciki wanda ba don ta kasa kunne ba mawuyaci ne taji amsawar tasa,sauke meenal yayi sanda yaji an soma kiran sallah,ya jawo ledar daya shigo da ita ya fiddo lemon zaqi ayaba da kankanar daya shigo da su ya mimmiqa musu sannan yayi addu'ar buda baki ya soma sha shima,addu'a take Allah yasa kafin ya gama sha ya daura alwala ruwan zafin ya juya ta miqa masa,don tasan qa'idarsa tea yake fara sha sannan yayi alwalar ya fice,saidai har ya kammala alwalarsa ruwai bai juya ba
A gaggauce ta dure ruwan cikin flask din ba tare daya kammala tafasa ba kaman yadda yake so,ta kai falon ta ta ajjiye hade da cup da sauran kayan tean,sannan ta koma a gurguje ta maida ruwan dafa dukan,sanda ya dawo daga sallar da ruwan shayinsa ya shigo,haka ya ja cup ya juye abinsa ciki ya dauki bread din dake aje gefe ya hada da shi ba tare da yace mata kanzil ba,sai kai kawo kawai take tana satar kallonshi,shirunsa ko rashin shan naga shayin bai dameta wani can ba,fatanta d'aya shine kada yayi mata fad'a,buqatarta ta biya kuwa,don har ya gama ya sake ficewa sallar isha'i bai tanka mata ba,bai sake shigowa ba har ta samu ta gama dafa dukan taliyar ta shiga bayi tayi wankan da tun safe bata samu yi ba,sam ta mance ma cewa kayan jiya ne a jikinta
Yana zaune ta gabatar masa da abincin yayin da yake binta da kallo cikin takaici,ko wani bai gaya masa ba yasan cewa ta sake komawa 'yar gidan jiya,yawon gidan maqwabta,ya rasa uban me take samowa a can din?,wanne d'ad'i yawon yake mata,bayan bai rage ta da komai ba,dukkan wani haqqi da Allah ya dora kanshi nata dana yaranshi ya sauke mata,zai iya dukan qirji ya kuma yi alfaharin kaf layin babu wanda gidansa ke da rufin asirin da shi yake da shi,ya maida idanunsa kan khairat da husna da qaramar qanwarsu islam dake yashe gefe bacci ya d'aukesu cikin rashin gyara,zuciyarsa ta sake quntata,ance mara gaskiya ko a ruwa gumi yake,cikin kaffa kaffa tace da shi"Abban khairat bismillah" abincin yabi da kallo cikin takaici,ta riga data sani cewa babu abincin da yaqi jini irin dafa duka,dafa dukan ma ta taliya,ko a sanda yake saurayi yakan haqura da abinci indai dafa dukan taliya ce bare yanzu da yake da 'yancin cin gashin kansa"Ina kifin?" Ya tambayeta kai tsaye
"Wanne kifi kuma?" Ta tambayeshi tana dubanshi,kasancewar har ga Allah ta mance yace mata farfesun kifin yakeso yaci kafin ya fita"Kifin dana ce a dafamin kafin na fita" ya tunasar da ita ranshi na suya,sau ta hau kame kame"Kifin?
kifin na soya,na barshi a kitchen khairat da husna suka cinye"
ranshi ya kai maqura wajen 6aci,ya tabbatar da cewa qarya ce kawai take shirya masa,kifin yafi qarfin cikin khairat husna dama mamarsu"wato duk abinda zan gaya miki badariyya ba zaki ji ba kenan?,mutumin banza kika d'aukeni ko kuma wanda baisan ciwon kansa ba?",zuciyarta ta soma raurawa taso karyewa,sai kuma ta samu qwarin gwiwa tashin farko data tuna kalaman rakiya na yau"baka taba nunawa namiji ka gano laifinka koda kaike da laifi,idan ba haka ba zaita amfani da wannan raunin naka ne yana mulkarka yadda yaga dama,gaba koda kece keda gaskiya baki da bakin magana,ki tsaya kawai kuyi fito na fito,to koda ace kece da laifi zaiji shakkar tararki a gaba"
Tuna wannan yasa ta qanqance idanu tana dubanshi"me kuma akayi?""Ke zan tambaya,jiya jiya na miki iyaka da shiga maqota barkatai,bama ni ba hatta malam wannan karon ya shiga maganar amma ya tashi a banza kenan?
""Kaga abban khairat dakata don Allah,haka kuma zaka koma mai zargi?,ina akace maka naje?,kazo gida baka sameni bane ballantana kace na fita?,ko zaka iya rantsewa da Allah kan cewa na fita?" Cikin wani matsanancin bacin rai ganin tana neman maidashi wani sauna yace da ita cikin kausasa murya"Yimin shiru badariyya tun kafin na qarasa tunzura,shin ni din qaramin yaro ne?,ko mahaukaci ne ni,koko makaho da bani da ido?""To wallahi saidai idan hasashenka ne bai gaya maka gaskiya ba amma ni cikin gida na wuni ehe" ta fada tana gyara zamanta sosai kan kujera tare da juya masa baya,duk da tana d'ari d'ari amma ta dake zuciyarta hudubar rakiya na mata amsa kuwwa shed'an na kada mata gangarsa
mrs muhammad ce

Shafi na uku 03
Assalamu alaikum warahmatullah
ga masu tambayar farkon kundin haske MUTUNCIN MACE,wato littafi ne wanda yake kaman yadda film episode episode yake,idan wannan marubuciya ta gama nata episode din wata zata kama nata,ga yadda dai abun yake a tsare
Babi na d'ayanana d'iso ce ta rubuta shi wanda taken labarinta shine 'YAN ZAMANI
Babi na biyu
Pherty Xahra ce ta rubuta taken labarinta HANGEN NESA
Babi na uku
labarin na asmy B aliyu ne mai suna RUWAN DARE(fyade)
Babi na hud'u
maman khady ce ta rubuta,sunan labarin ABOKIYAR ZAMA(kishiya)
Babi na biyar
labarin miss xoxo ne mai suna NI NA JAWA KAINA(shaye shayen magungunan mata)
Babi na shida
marubuciyarsa itace nuceeyluv,sunan labarin nata shine KULA DA MIJI

SAI NI YANZU DA NAKE RUBUTA BABI NA SHA BIYU DA LABARINA MAI TAKEN MUTUNCIN MACE
ina fatan kun fahimta 
Sauran marubutan haske ma nasu na xuwa xaku same shi daki daki kuma a tsare, ga me buqatar sauran da bai karanta ba ya duba KUNDIN HASKE a wattpad duka xai samu insha Allah
KUNDI NE DA BABU KAMARSA,KOWANNE CIKIN LABARAN DAUKE YAKE DA DARUSSA SOYAYYA DA NISHADANTARWA MAI TARIN YAWA
Washe gari babu inda taje saboda b'acin rai qarara data gani tattare da abban khairat,baki d'aya ya fita a sabgarta,harkarshi kawai yake shi da yaranshi,saidai shirunsa batasan me yake nufi ba,duk da tasan shi sarai,mutum ne wanda baida gaggawar yanke hukunci,yana da baiwa mutum lokaci kafin ya kamashi,saidai kuma kamun nashi bai cika zuwa da d'adi ba,bugu da qari kuma tana tsoron kada ya sake kai qararta wajen malam karo na biyu,don ta tabbatar abin bazai mata da kyau ba,tunda ya mata gargad'i mai matuqar qarfi wancan satin,itakam baki d'aya mamaki suke bata,meye illar ko aibu don ta fita maqota?,ita ba sata ba ba bara ba ba roqo ba ba sane ba,haka kawai a hana mutum sakewa a qunsheka cikin gida,baka da katabus?
Wunin ranar gaba d'aya jinta take tamkar a kurki,saidai hakan ya bata damar yin aikin gidanta sosai wanda ta jima batai irinsa ba sakamakon bata samun zama bare da tsaftace lungu da saqo na gidan kamar yadda ya kamata,iyakar abinda auwalu ya samu ya kintsa mata shikenan ya wadatar
Washe gari matan suka dinga leqowa jin jiya basuji duriyarta ba,wanda hakan ya dinga azalzala mata son fita,baki d'aya ranta a bace yake,a nan suka had'a 'yar dabar tasu ta awanni kafin su watse,kasancewar sunsan halin baban khairat din baida fuskar da za'a zaune mishi gida,don da fari gidan suka so maidawa mahadarsu
Tana kwamce inda suka fita suka barta bacin ran rashin fita har kwana biyu na damunta ta jiyo sautin kukan husna,cikin fushi ta miqe ta nufi falonta inda ta barsu ita da auwalu zai sauya mata kayan makaranta zuwa na islamiyya tana dubansu"Meye kuma?" Ta tambayi yarinyar a fusace"Wai bazan canza mata kayan ba" auwalu ya fada yana duban badariyya"Ubanki da uwarki nace,idan bai sauya miki ba uban wa kike so ya sauya miki,nida na wuni ina aiki ko kuwa?" Kafada ta maqe tana sake sakin kuka tare da dagewa kan saidai ya bata ta saka da kanta,haushi ya turnuqe badariyyan,gani take babansu keson koya musu iskanci,tunda ta lura ko rakiyar makaranta ya tsani tasa auwalu yayi musu,a fusace tayo kan husnar ta zuba mata dundu cikin tsawa tawa auwalu umarnin ya sauya mata kayan su wuce tun basu makara ba shegen malaminsu ya kira babansu ya gaya masa yau basuje da wuri ba,tana kuka haka ya gama saka mata ta kada su suka fice ta dawo ta sake kwanciya tana d'acin rai
La'asar sakaliya tana yunqurin d'ora girki ta jiyo hayaniya na mata ana qwala mata kira daga qofar gidanta,hijabinta ta figa ta zura a baibai tayi qofar gidan don ta dauki muryar mai kiran,zugarsu ce guda,wasu da yara a hannu wasu a goye"A'ah,ku shigo mana" ta fada tana washe baki"A'ah barmu daga nan ma" cewar bashira d'aya daga cikinsu tana yaye hijabinta zuwa wuya gami da zama kan dakalin qofar gidan""A'ah nikam wallahi sai na shiga" inji wata mata dake riqe da qaramar yarinya a guqunta,zanin goyonsu dake nannade kaman maciji na biye da su kaman igiya"Nima fa sai na shiga" inji rakiya,ganin haka ya sanya saura binsu a baya duu suka shige
Daga shigarsu kowacce da abinda hankalinta yakai kai,bashira zama tayi kan kujerar tsuguno dake qofar kitchen tana hangen kitchen din wanda badariyya ta fito da kayan girki zata soma aiki"Yau me ake dafawa ne mmn khairat,jiya da yau kin gujemu""Hala abban khairat ya murd'a kambunsa ko?" Inji lariya,dariya ta dan saki tana cewa"Fried rice zan masa naga yana so kwana biyu ban samu na masa ba,murda kambu kuma ai bazai taba rabamu ba,mutun ai rahama ne bare maqoci da yake kaman d'an uwa""Maqoci kam ta wani fanni ai har yafi d'an uwa ma" inji sahura d'aya daga cikin matan wadda ta cika bakinta da karas din da za'ayi fried rice din da shi,hakan yasa sauran suka zari suma nasu suna taunawa ana hira
Rakiya ce ta fito daga falon badariyya wanda ta shiga da zummar d'auko ruwa a fridge hannunta riqe da wani voile wanda jiya abban khairat din ya kawo mata shi,tasan nata ne duk da bai mata magana ba,saboda ita ta ganshi jikin maqociyarta da suke katanga d'aya wato maman rahma ta kafa masa qahon zuqar tana sonshi"Lallai hajiya ta,kice an kawo miki boyel din naki,kina sha'aninki fa" murmushi tayi kanta na fasuwa ganin yadda kowa ke yaba kyansa"Nidai a ragewa 'yata ko doguwar riga ayi mata" cewar habiba wadda bata tanka ba tunda aka soma hirar sai yanzu,ranta fal baqinciki,saboda taso ace kafin badariyya ta mallaki voile din ita ta soma sawa,to ta buga ta buga baban rafi'ah yace baida halin saya mata,ta fadi hakan ne don ta samu qyallen don tayi alqawarin koda q'aq'a saita sayi irinsa sak"Kin fa burgeni wlh badariyya,gwara ki d'inka ki saka ta gani,don kallon banzan da matar nan ke mana ya isa,gani take cikinmu babu mai iya saka kamarshi,bayan babu abinda mijinta yafi naki" tab'e baki badariyya tayi,don har ga Allah haushin maman rahma take ji sosai,duk da cewa da farko itace qawar data fara yi farkon zuwanta unguwar kafin ta hadu da 'yan qungiyar su rakiya,saidai sam ita bata shiga sabgar 'yan unguwar,kuma ta gayawa badariyyan gaskiya tun da fari,haduwarta dasu rakiya ya sanya ta janye jiki da maman rahama,suka sa mata aqidar ita din 'yar girman kai ce,sarkin iyayi da son iyawa,dama kuma sai hali yazo d'aya ake abota,tun badariyya na gida kusan tana da wannan dabi'ar,a haka ma bata samu mahaifi mai sauqi ba,mahaifiyarta ce ba ruwanta,wani sa'in ma daga wajenta take samun d'aurin gindin shige shige,da sunan da tayi aurw ai zata daina ko don yaranta
Ta taso cikin unguwar bakin kasuwa dake garin kano,unguwa ce dake cikin badala wanda indai unguwa na tsakiyar badala akancewa mutum d'an cikin gari ne,unguwa ce dake dinke da jama'a,badariyya tayi primary ta soma secondry school dinta iyajarta juniour ta tsaya,duk da babanta yana da dattako cikin unguwa wanda hakan ya sanya ake ce masa malam amma sam bata damu da karatu ba,babban abinda tafi ganewa shige shigen maqota,walau gidan amare ko gidan qawaye,idan ta fita tun sha d'aya na safe wani lokaci sai yammaci ko bayan azahar take dawowa gidansu,bata damu da taya innarta komai ba saidai ko wanke wanke idan anci sa'a,data daqo idan da yunwa ta dawo ta samu an gama abinci taci abinta,idan babu yunwa kuma ta hau wata zaman hirar,dake qanwarta nayin sana'ar qunshi,sai yamma lia take wanka kullum,ba zaka taba ganin kwalliyarta ba ko tsaftarta sai da yamma,idan ta cakare sai ka rantse ba ita ke yawo d'azu da warin rana ba
Duk sanda innarta ta aiko tazo malam ya dawo,nan zaka ga tsere tsakaninta da d'an aiken,don tasan malam bai da d'ad'i sam,sautari qanwarta dake zaune a gida tana sana'arta tare da ci gaba da karatunta na secondry idan tayi mata fada kan yawan fice ficenta takan ce"Ke qyaleni,haka kawai ni ba matar liman ba ni ba ta na'ibi ba na zaune a gida,gwara fa na wasa qafata kafin nayi aure,daga kayi aure fa shikenan,fita ma sai an maka izini" murmushi kawai take yi sannan tace"MUTUNCIN MACE ai dama gidan mijinta,kawai ina jiye miki ne badariyya,kinsan sabo mugun abu ne,kada ya zamemiki jiki har gidan aure" takan harareta tace"To sai me?,sata ko maita?""Allah ya baki haquri" sai taci gaba da sabgarta,sai gashi abun ya zame mata jiki har zuwa gidan miji,dabi'ar da mijinta yaqi jini tun yana saurayi,USMAN tun a gidansu ya tsani fice fice koda wajen qannensa,daya ganki zai koraki gida,duk da shima cikin gari ya tashi yayi rayuwarsa,saidai yana da kamun kai da nutsuwa,bugu da qari ya samu ilimin boko dana addini dai dai gwargwado
Toh yanayin tsarin rayuwarsu dana maman rahama ba d'aya bane,idan kin ganta gidanki to abun murna ko jaje ne ya samu,idan an had'u za'ayi gaisuwar mutunci,haka tana qoqarin kyautatawa maqotanta dai dai gwargwado,saidai bata lamunci fita barkatai mara ma'ana ba,hasalima bata da wannan lokacin,tana had'a NCE dinta a kwalejin shari'ar musulunci wato legal,sannan tana sana'ar dinki wanda sana'arta bata sanya ta maida gidanta dandali ko majalisa ba,ita dinma haka suka so yi mata suke fakewa da kawo d'inki,to ita tun can bata saba da wannan rayuwar ba,tun a gida daga makaranta sai gida,takanyi sati biyu ko sama da haka ma maqota basu gansu ba bare ayi batun zuwa unguwa idan ba ta kama ba,da sun shigo aka gama gaisawa taga zasu d'auki hirar wani ko wata zata tashi tabarsu wajen ta shiga aikace aikacenta,nan zasu gaji su tashi su fita,sai suka sanya mata sunan mai wulaqanci ce ita suka aske ta a unguwar,ita dinma hakan yafi mata,don shigowar tasu bata amfanarta da komai face b'ata mata lokaci da hanata sabgoginta yadda ta saba,kaf d'insu babu mai wata sana'ar kirki sai kame kame,rakiya ce kawai da taga suna taruwa gidanta take saro gwanjo da uban maganin mata tayita had'asu da shi,badariyya kam na d'aya daga cikin manyan custumers,don gwana ce wajen wannan d'in
Tabe baki badariyya tayi"Uhmmmm,ita fa wannan d'an karatun da take shi yasa take ganin tafi kowa take wani girman kai,kamar wadda ke karance takardun duniya baki d'aya" dariya suka sanya,daga nan aka dasa fefan hirar maman rahama,sai kusan shida na yammaci sannan suka soma haramar ficewa saboda wasu zasu su dora abincin dare,rakiya ce tace"Nan bayan gidana nefa ake kawo kayan jeran wata amarya,mukaje kallo daga can muka biya gidan adashin nan da za'a fara""Kice kallo ya barni""Wallahi kuwa,amma gobe ai inaga zamuje yi mata jere zan miki alama idan zamu wuce in zaki sai ki biyo mu,kusa da gidan ladiyo mai gasara ne""To Allah ya kaimu" ta fada daga haka sukai sallama suka fice,cikin ranta tana qissima dabarar da zatayi don ta samu ta fice taje din hankali kwance
Ganin an cinye karas din baki d'aya,koren waken ma kad'an yayi saura saboda wasu aun diddiba da zummar zasu watsa a abinci,hatta dan naman data tafasa saida aka tsintsinta aka cinye sai saura,sai kawai ta yanke shawarar yin dafa dukar shinkafa,take ta hade komai da komai da yayi saura waje d'aya ta sakar mata wuta don tayi saurin gamawa
~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bayan wata d'aya
Tuni badariyya ta koma ruwa tsundum,saidai a yanzu ta sauya taku,idan ta fita takanyi qoqarin dawowa da la'asar,duk da cewa a yanzu fitar ke sake dad'i saboda an sake samun sababbin mutane masu zaman majalissae tasu sun sake yawa,gashi likkafa taci gaba har adashi aka bud'e d'auka dubu d'ari,hakan ya sanya komai na badariyya a lalace yake,itace kan gaba wajen rage kud'in cefane,kayan sawa masu kyau da yake siya mata idam bata samu kudin zubi ba takan iya saidasu tayi zubi da shi saura ta yi burga da su,yaranta baki daya sun sake komawa hannun almajiri don shima ba ko yaushe yake shiga makaranta ba,nan gidan uwar d'akin nasa yake wuni har girkin rana ya musu shi da yaran,ita kuwa haka yayi mata d'adi,har ihsani take bashi don ganinta yana taimakonta sosai,bata da matsalar yara yanzu tana da mai kula mata dasu,hakan ya sanya hankalin usman baikai can ba,saboda duk sanda zai dawo gidan zai tadda shi yadda ya kamata haka ma yaran
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Bari dai naje naga me auwalu yake tun d'azu da nace masa ya dawo bai dawo ba,'yan qwal uba daga shi har khairat din basu ba labarinsu" cewar badariyya tana sab'a yarinyarta a baya ta sanya zani tana goye ta"Wallahi nikam har na k'agu,ko dama baki da madarar ne,kika sa bakina yanata tsami tsamin kwadayi?" Cike da alfahari ta tafa hannu"Haba wuce nan wallahi,madara saidai ai bamu so sha ba""Hehehehe,gaskiya ne hajiyata" inji zubaida wadda ke sake tunzura badariyya"Bari kiga naje na dawo kada wannan cafta ta wuceni" ta fada tana sanya takalminta tare da tsallake yaran dake wasa tsakar gidan cikin hanzari,don batason hirar maganin matan da suke ta wuceta,don tana son yau ta siya ta gwadawa abban khairat
Qofar farko data tsakiya duka an turota saidai ba'a rufe ba,ta tura qofar tana mitar ita d'aya,ba kowa a tsakar gidan haka falonta,sai ta soma jiyo muryar auwalu shi da khairat daga can d'akin yaran,hakanan taji gabanta na faduwa,ta taka a hankali ta isa bakin qofar d'akin,shima an turo qyauren,qwalalo idanunta tayi gabanta na tsananta fad'uwa,kalaman da taji khairat nayi,sai kace na 'yar shekara sha biyar ba shekara shida ba,hirar da sukayi jiya a gidan rakiya ita rake bawa auwalu,irin hirarsu da suka saba a gaban yaran wadda basu d'auketa a bakin komai ba,auwalun nata kwasar dariya kamar shashasha"Zo kiga
zo in miki irin abun rannan sanda nazo yi miki tsarki kin tuna kina so aiko?shigen na labarin nan zan siya miki alewa" Abinda taji auwalun ya fad'a kenan,batasan sanda ta banka d'akin ba sai tsintar kanta tayi a tsakiyar d'akin,khairat na tsaye gaban auwalun yana d'orata saman cinyarsa,zumbur ya miqe yaba raba idanu jikinsa na kad'awa ganin maman khairat din tsaye kansu,cikin zafin nama da hanzari irin na mai jin qarfi ya shammaceta ya bangajeta ya wuce,ta rufa masa baya cikin tashin hankali,saidai kafin ta kai ga wani yunquri tuni har ya fice daga gidan ya banko mata qofarta,kuka ta fashe da shi tun a soron ta aza hannu aka sannan ta sauke tana yunqurin sauke goyon dake bayanta
A tsaye ta tadda yarinyar tayi tsuru tsuru tana raba idanu,aje yarinyar hannunta tayi sannan ta finciko khairat ta soma zabga mata mari tana fad'in"Me yayi miki?,me yake miki don ubanki?,gaya min ko na yankaki" cikin tsanyara kuka yarinyar ke cewa zata gaya mata,sakinta tayi cikin huci tana ritsata da idanu tana jiran ke zata ce,cikin kuka khairat din ta shiga nuna mata inda auwalun ke taba mata,duddubata ta shiga yi yanayin yarinyar bai nuna wani abu mai muni ba,saidai duk da haka hankalinta bai kwanta ba,tana sharce hawaye ta maida mata wandonta ta saka hijabinta ta tasata gaba
Tana niyyar ficewa daga gidan habiba ta biyo sahu ganin sun jima,tambayarta ta hau yi ganin tana sharce hawaye,kukan takaici badariyya ta saki sannan ta soma zayyanewa habiba,a zahiri salati ta saki fuskarta cike da alhini saidai zuciyarta fes"Amma don Allah habiba bana so kowa yasan da wannan zancan tunda ba wani abu bane ya samera,zan dai kaita clinic d'incan na tsallake a sake duba min ita,ko rakiya bazan gayawa va,kema na gaya miki ne saboda naga dui ciki kinfi kowa rashin surutu""Haba ke kuwa maman khairat wa zaiji wannan magana kara d'adi" haka ta rakata har bakin layinsu sannan tayo kwana ta dawo ita kuma ta wuce
Hankalinta bai kwanta ba sai da aka tabbatar mata bai mata wani lahani ba,d'an abinda ya mata bai kai ya kawo ba,duk da haka sun d'an bata magunguna ta dawo tana godewa Allah tare da saukewa auwalu kwandon tsinuwa,ba shakka da tasan makarantarsu yau babu abinda zai hanashi kwanan bayan kanta
Bayan dawowar husna gida wadda taba gidan kakanninta ta sata gaba tana tambayarta ko auwalun ya taba yi mata wani abu?,da yake tafi khairat wayo ta nuna mata inda ya tab'a tab'a mata,hakan shi yasa ta tubure ta daina yarda ya saka mata kaya,amma a sannan ita duk badariyya bata ankara kan abinda yasa husnan taqi jinin auwalu ba duk da quruciyarta sai yanzu data zauba ta tambayeta
(Hattara gareku iyaye masu tafka kuskure shigen na badariyya,sai kiga uwa wai ta baiwa almajirinta qaramar d'iyarta wai ya fitar mata da ita waje ta dameta da kuka tana son yin aiki,ko ya riqe miki ita,ko ya saka mata wando tayi fitsari da sauransu,d'iya mace dai tafi gold daraja,sannan gareku iyaye da yaranku zaku ga sunqi jinin mutum ko sunqi jinin mu'amala da shi,ba tare da kun tsananta binciken ba'asi ba sai ku hau fad'a,duka ko zagi kuna ganin kaman tsabar rashin mutunci ne kawai ba tare da kunsan dalili ba,Allah ya tsare mana yaran musulmi baki d'aya amin)
_wannan kenan_~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Tun wannan abu da ya faru bata sake d'aukar almajiri ba,hakanan bata sake zuwa dasu gidan rakiya ba,ta gwammace idan ta gama ayyukanta ta bar yaran a gida taje yawonta ta dawo ta samesu a gidan
_Bayan wani lokaci_
Tun zaman majalisar su ta jiya da sukayi a qofar gidan lariya suka ga isowar motar kayan jeran sabuwar amaryar da za'a kawo gidan dake can qarshen layinsu,duk namijin da zai wuce sai ya dubesu kafin ya kai ga wucewa,walau baqo ko dan unguwa,idan aka dace da mai irin halinsu ma ya tsaya ad'an caccafke hira sannan ya wuce,gida ne da tunda aka soma gininsa sai sunyi zancansa saboda tsaruwarsa da kud'in da ake narka masa"Ah zamu sha jere gobe,ai na leqa ashe ba 'yar garin nan bace yarinyar daga katsina aka kawota
amma fa gaskiya ba qarya an mata kayan d'aki,iyayenta da alama masu akwai ne" cewar rakiya shugabar mata,take kuwa hira ta b'arke kan gidan amarya,yayin da kowacce taci alwashin gobe da ita za'ayi jere don ta kashe qwarqwatar idanunta
Qwarai zataso zuwa kada ayi babu ita,hakan ya sanya ta koma gida akan kari,ta gama komai da wuri
Tunda ta dawo ta maida kanta kalar mara lpy har shigowar abban khairat,sai da suka zo kwanciya sannan ta dafe goshinta tace"Mtsweew,wallahi abban khairat bana jin dad'i yau tun safe,ina jin gobe zanje asibiti naga likita""Allah ya sawwaqe,Allah ya nuna mana goben", farinciki fal ranta ta kwanta,ko banza gobe zatayi fita mai lasisi,dawowarta ko sai baaba ta gani
Washe gari ta gama komai da wuri kaman mai shirin zuwa asibiti,yana fita ta sanya kayanta ta goye 'yarta ta dubi husna"ke husna,kada ku sake fita,ku zauna a gida idan na fita ku saka sakata ku kulle qofa,anjima kad'an zan dawo,ga abincin safenku nan" ta qarashe maganar tana kwashe maqudan kud'ad'en da abban khairat din ya shigo da su jiya daga kasuwa tana shigewa d'akinsa ta musu ajiya mai kyau"Mama zan biki don Allah" cewar khairat da tayi tsaye tana kallonta,harara ta waiwayo ta zabga mata,ko zata da kowa bata jin zata da yarinyar,tasan yau akwai b'arin zance,khairat kuwa irin yaran nan ne masu saurin gane abu da d'auke abu a kwanyarsu"Ki zauna ba inda zaki bini""Don Allah mama" ta fada tana shirin fara rigima,duka ta kai mata cikin takaici ta kuwa sameta a fuska,dukan ya shigeta sosai ta saki kuka tana zamewa tare da zama saman kujera"Saura wlh naga waninku a waje,ku zauna idan an kawo wuta ku kunna kallo kina jina ko?" Tace da husna,amsa mata tayi,bata tafi ba sai data tsaya taji husnar ta saka sakata sannan tayi gaba
Suna tsaye qofar gidan zubaida daura da gidan maman rahama suna jiran fitowar lariya su wuce gidan jeran da ba'a gayyacesu ba a daidaita sahu ta tsaya qofar gidan maman rahama,'yammata ne su biyar suke fitowa daga ciki,ba laifi suna da kyau bakin gwargwado,hakanan kowacce cikin shiga mai kyau take wadda duk hassadarka kasan cikin rufin asiri suka fito,yayin da kowacce ta bisu da kallo,kowa na son ganin gidan da suka zo
mrs muhammad ce

KUNDIN HASKE - Shafi na hudu - Page 2 - Wattpad
MUTUNCIN MACE
TARE DA ALQALAMIN
SAFIYYA ABDULLAHI MUSA HUGUMA
04
Kai tsaye 'yan matan qofar gidan maman rahama suka durfafa suka soma qwanqwasa,ba jimawa aka soma tambayar waye sannan qofar ta bud'e
Maman rahama ce ta bayyana,tayi kyau cikin yadi ruwan madara da akayi masa adon brown,bayanta yaranta ne biyu rahama da abdur rahman ke biye da ita dukkansu tsaf cikin qananun kaya,baki d'aya idanunsa na kanta kowa da abinda yake kallo a jikinta,yayin da ita sam bata ma lura da su ba hankalinta na gun 'yan uwanta da take yunqurin basu hanya su wuce fuskarta washe da fara'a,sai da suka gama shiga tana yunqurin maida qofar ta rufe zubaida tace"Haj maman rahma,ko magana babu?" Boyewa tayi a bayan qofar tana leqo da iya kanta bayan ta zare mayafin d'aya daga cikin 'yammatan ta lulluba saboda kada bisa kuskure wani yazo wucewa"Ah,ai ban ganku ba maman hamza,ina yininku mun tashi lpy", karb'a kowa yayi banda badariyya data d'auke kai cikin takaici,ganin irin kayan da abban khairat ya kawo mata su jiya cikin kayan sallarta a jikin maman rahaman,har yake gaya mata kud'insa ya kusa dubu goma,sak kala ce kawai ta banbanta,haushi ya cikata,taci aniyar yau zata sanya abban khairat ya canzo mata wanda yafishi kyau da tsada,ko bai sauya mata ba sai ta saida ta sayi wani,don ba zata yarda ta rigata sakawa ba sannan a ganshi a jikinta daga baya,sam maman rahama ba mace bace mai d'aukan kanta da zafi,hakanan bata iya gaba ko qullaci ba,bare ma tasan a zahiri babu abinda ya shiga tsakaninta da badariyyan saboda haka ranta da fuskarta sake suka gaisa da su ta koma gida ta maida qofarta ta rufe
"Qannenta ne fa wadan nan,wai ko suma masu arziqi ne?" Inji lariya tana duban badariyya wadda tasan sun d'an jima tare"Oho,burga ce kawai" ta fad'a wanda ita kanta tasan ba zata nunawa maman rahmar komai ba,koba komai ita d'in mai dogaro da kanta ce,ba cima zaune ba sai abinda aka samo aka bata,hakanan bata raina sana'a sabanin ita da take ganin tafi qarfin qaramar sana'a kamar d'inki da sauransu"Kunga mu wuce don Allah sa taho kawai tunda sunsan gidan" cewar badariyya,haka suka d'uru suka wuce,suna tafe suna hira,duk inda suka ratsa baka jin komai sai tashin hirarsu
A qofar gidan amaryar da aka kawo wancan watannin suka tsaya suka wuce tare,itama mijinta matafiyi ne baya wata a gari,duk da bata kaisu fice fice ba amma kusan kullum ita d'inma tana maqota,saidai ita saita gama komai take fita,kuma iyakarta duk inda akayi la'asar ta koma gida,a haka aka shiga aka d'ibga mata sata itama har kayan lefanta amma hakan baisa ta saduda ba,saita yiwa mijin nata qaryar cewa b'arayi ne suka shigo tana cikin gidan,a yanzu haka laulayi take amma wannan bai sanyata zama cikim gidanta ta samawa kanta salama ba
Sanda suka isa gidan amaryar sun tadda 'yan uwanta mata uku maza biyu suna karyawa,suka gabatar da kansu a matsayin maqotanta,hakan ya musu dad'i suna fatar 'yar uwarsu ta samu maqota na gari,suka yi musu tayin tea bread chipa da qwai da suke karin da shi,basuyi qasa a gwiwa ba kowacce ta saki ciki da baki ta soma loda,amarya shafa'atu ce kawai tace ta qoshi,badariyya batayi qasa a gwiwa ba ta kwanto goyonta ta soma ci haiqan,duk da cewa tabar duk irin wannan kayan a nata gidan,amma ganda ta hanata tsayawa ta girkawa cikinta da yaranta,hakanan saboda tsabar zumudin son ta fita dama bai barta ta karya da ruwan shayin da biredin data barwa yaranta ba
'Yan uwan amayar sun d'anyi mamaki,amma sai suka share ganin yadda suka hau tayasu aikin jere tuquru,saidai yadda suka ga komai suka gani sai sun tanka sai ya soma d'aure musu kai,qauyanci ne ko ko tsabar sanya ido ne?
Har kusan azahar ana abu d'aya,saidai me?,d'aya daga cikin 'yan uwan amaryan ne ta fito falon ta soma shelanta b'atan sarqa da d'an kunnen gwal na amaryar wanda ke cikin kayan lefanta,take kowa yayi tsuru tsuru aka koma kallon kallon,maganganu suka soma tashi da sallallami,sannan aka fara dube dube cikin gidan
Har tsahon awa d'aya shiru halan yahalaku,hakan ya sanya d'aya daga cikin matan 'yan uwan amaryar ta miqe tsaye riqe da qugu,kallo d'aya zaka mata kasan cikakkiyar gogaggiyar mace,kama qugunta tayi cikin tsananin b'acin rai tace"Kan kusu,mu za'a yiwa garin nan,muna katsinawan asali,to wallahi Allah ba zata sab'u ba,kai idris jeka rufe min gidan nan,ba macen da zata fita wallahi sai munyi mata sintir,daga abun arziqi sai azo mana da tsiya?""Haba baiwar Allah,mufa duk cikinmu babu barauniya,nan da kike ganinmu a haka mun jima tare amma bamu taba jin wata ta d'auki abun wata ba,sai yau daga shigowarmu?" Cewar rakiya cikin b'acin rai"Ke saurara min ba wannan na tambaya ba,gold ne dole a fito mana da shi,mu dai yarinua dolenmu ce cikinmu duk iyaye muje wajenta,nan babu wadda ba zata siya mata gold ba,da can kuma bamu rasa ba sai da kuka shigo,saboda haka dole mu tub'e kowacce mace""Muna matan auren zaki tubemu,tabdijan wallahi bazata sab'u ba" cewar badariyya cikin masifa
Wani kallo d'aya daga cikin matan tayi mata sannan tace"Idan kina ganin kinfi qarfin mu tubeki ai bakifi qarfin 'yan sanda su bincikeki tsaf ba,yayaa
naga alamar matan nan 'yan rainin hankaline,kawai police suyi mana gaba da su sayi bayani a can" take cikin kowaccensu ya d'uru ruwa,hankalin kowaccensu ya tashi,qwalla ta soma zubowa amarya shafa'atu sanda 'yar sandar mace ke shigowa cikin gidan tana had'a kansu zuwa cikin motar shiga ba biya fita da Allah ya isa"Wayyo Allah na shiga uku,don Allah don annabi kuyi haquri nidai wallahi bani na d'auka ba""To uban waye ya d'auka kijimin 'ya" inji lariya cikin jin haushin kalamanta,kukan tsoro ya kubce mata"Na shiga uku wallahi ban taba zuwa police station ba,ina zaman zamana a gida na kuka biyo min,gashi yau nasiru zai dawo na shiga uku" maganar tata ta tunzurasu,yayin da 'yar sandar ta tasa qeyarsu baki d'aya zuwa cikin motar ba tare data saurari kokensu ba
Sam badariyya ta mance da yaranta data bari a gida,sai da suka soma tafiya sannan tace"Na manta na bar yara a gida,don Allah ko zanje na fito da su na kaisu maqota?""Eh mu da yake bamu da yaran ke kad'ai kika iya haihuwa ko?" Cewar habiba tana hararar badariyya"Toh ina ruwanki,dake nake magana?,aikin banza" dariya habiba ta saka"Aikin banza ya wuce nako,banzar uwar da aka yiwa yari yarta fyad'e ba tare data sani ba" mummunar fad'uwa gabanta yayi,ta zaro idanu tana kallon habiba data d'auke kanta kamar ba ita ta fad'i maganar ba"Sharri zakimin kuma habiba?""Sharri?,bani na rakaki hanyar asibiti ba kika je a duba miki ita?""Ku mana shiru don Allah muji da abinda ya damemu,don ta khairat waye bai san zancan ba ku qyalemu muji da wadda ta tunkaro mu" hayaniya taso b'@'arkewa badariyya na maida martani cikin b'acin rai habiba na maidawa su rakiya na shiga tsakani,tsawa 'yar sandan ta saka tana cewa"Kuyi mana shiru mutanen banza mutanen wofi,zaku damemu da zancan yaranku,da can bakusan da su ba kuke fita gidan da babu dangin iya babu na baaba yi mata jere kaman an sakaku,ko 'yan uwanta ne suka ce ba zasu iya ba kuyi musu,kowacce jikinta sai ya gaya mata sai kun fito da abinda kuka d'auka" da haka ta rufe bakinsu,abun duniya ya taru ya yiqa badariyya yawa,wato tona mata asiri habiba tayi?,dama kowa kallonta da yaranta yake?
A cell aka sakasu aka rufe bayan sunje,nan fa cece kuce ya b'arke tsakaninsu,itadai shafa roqonsu take idan akwai wadda tasan ta d'auka ta fito dasu don Allah ta taimakesu,haushi ya kamasu kowacce ta hayayyaqo mata da masifa,suna nan zube har la'asar ana jaddada musu su fito da abinda suka d'auka saidai shiru wai malam yaci shirwa
Daga can b'angaren gidan badariyya kuwa bacci ne ya kwashe yaran ba dad'ewa da fitarta,basu tashi ba sai bayan azahar,yunwa ta addabesu baki d'aya,a lokacin suka ji ana buga qofar gidan,husna ce taje ta bud'e,matashi ne wanda bai wuce shekara talatin ba,dogo baq'i kakkaura,ya jima yana lura da shige da ficen matar gidan,bama ita ba duka matan layin,ya lura duk layin gida biyu ne suka fi kowanne wadata,da wannan gidan dana kusa da shi wato gidan mmn rahama,saidai gidan mmn rahamar ya lura yaran gidan basu fiya fita ba,idan zasu fita d'inma to tare da babansu ne ko babarsu,hakanan matar gidan bakowanne lokaci take fita ba,koda ta fita ba wani dogon zamani take d'auka ba take dawowa,wannan gidan ne ya fuskanci babu ranar da baza'a fita ba,cikin murmushi ya dubu husna"Husna ko?" Gyada kanta yari yar tayi"Babanku ne ya aiko ni yana can wajen mai d'inki,yace kayan sallarku daya kawo jiya?,ki d'auko minsu sannan kizo muje za'a gwadaki d'inkin naki sallar,mamarku ma tana wajen mai d'inkin tare zaku dawo da su" washe baki tayi cikin murna da zumud'i,saboda tun jiya da taga kayan take Allah Allah sallah tayi,saboda ita ta zabi abinda takeso saboda qwazon cin jarabawa data nuna a wannan zangon karatun,cikin murna ta juya ta koma cikin gidan,saidai ta kasa d'aukar kayan saboda yawansu tunda harda na babansu a ciki,dawowa tayi wajen mutumin dake tsaye ya zaqu tayi tayi ta kawo su tafi kada wani ya gifta ya gansu"Kayan suna da nauyi,kazo ka d'auka gasu a tsakar gida" ta fada tana nuna masa bayan ta zura hijabinta tana sanya silifas dinta,da azama ya danna kai ya d'auko ledar sannan ya kama hannunta suka fito,qofar ta janyo ta shiga jamlock wai ganin khairat na ciki kada taje ta fito kafin su dawo,cikin gaggawa yana janye da ita suka fice daga layin
Jin shiru shiru husnan bata dawo ba ya sanya khairat nufar kitchen dinsu,ashana ta lalubo saboda yadda yunwa take sakad'arta ta soma gwada kunna gas din da niyyar ko zata iya dafa wani abu kaman yadda taga ummansu nayi,balbalo gas din tayi sannan ta tsaya kunna ashanar,wanda tana qyastawa ya kama harda qararsa saboda yawan gas din daya fita,murna ta kama yarinyar harda tsallenta yau itama zatayi girki irin na ummansu,abinda bata sani ba wuta ta kama gefan rigarta,tana can tana yunqurin d'auko tukunya ta soma jin zafi a jikinta,sakin tukunyar tayi tana duba wajen,yayin da robar dake saman kantar ta fado kan gas din,jin wuta ya sanyata ta soma narkewa a jikinta,ai sai ta saki qara ta nufi bakin fanfo,tayita murd'awa amma yaqi kawo komai sakamakon sun riga da sun d'auke ruwan fanfon,sai ta wuce falo a guje da niyyar kwanciya saman kujera ko idan ta danne wutar zata mutu,ta bar gas din yana ci gaba da ci robar naci gaba da narkewa
Garin wucewa rigar tata ta lashi labulen falon falon take ya fara ci,ihu ta soma cikin d'akin ganin da gaske rigar ta soma cin jikinta,ga labulen falon da suka kama,kujerar data zauna tana birgima itama ta soma kamawa
Maman rahama dake kitchen ce ta soma jin qauri,da sauri ta soma dube dube ko wani abun ne ya kama a kitchen din nata,saidai ba abinda ta gani"Anty fa'iza girkinki ke qauri ne?" Cewar asma'u d'aya daga cikin qannenta nata tana fitowa daga falon maman rahaman"Nima qaurin nakeji asma'u amma na duba ba gidan nan bane,kuma kamar qara yawa yake" ta fad'i tana fitowa daga kitchen din,idanunta yakai saman rufin gidanta,take taga gagarumin hayaqin dake tashi kaman daga gidan badariyya"Asma'u,duba kaman daga maqota ne,sa mayafinki ki leqa don Allah" da hanzari asma'u ta ja mayafinta ta fice,sai gata da gudu ta shigo tana haki cikin firgici"Anty fa'iza,gidan maqociyarki ne,kuma gidan a rufe yake,kaman ma wuta ce wallahi keci""Innalillahi wa inna ilaihir raji'un,d'aukomin wayata da hijabina" ta fada a gaggauce
Baki d'ayansu suka fito qofar gidan suna duban gidan badariyya wanda suka fuskanci tabbas wuta ke ci,cikin sauri tayi kiran mai gidanta ta shaida masa,anyi sa'a yana kusa yace mata gashinan zuwa,amma kafin ya qaraso zai kira makarantar almajiran dake kusa dasu a turo garada su haura kosu b'alla gidan,ba jimawa sai gasu wajen su goma
Ruwa aka fara zubawa kafin a samu sararawar hayaqin da zafin wutar,d'aya daga cikinsu ya haura ya bud'e qofar gidan,hankalin mmn rahama idan yayi dubu ya tashi,fatanta d'aya Allah yasa babu kowa cikin gidan,don yau bata ga gilmawar husna ko khairat ba,wanda tasan indai bata jisu ba to suna qulle cikin gidan,taso ta yiwa maman khairat din magana kan dabi'ar barin yaran cikin gidan saidai bata bata damar hakan ba,saboda ta d'auketa kaman wata abokiyar gabarta wanda batasan dalilin hakan ba,ita ta soma rufa musu baya cikin gidan saboda ita tasan d'akunan gidan,kusan rabin gidan ya qone abinda bai qone d'in ba kad'an ne
Wata iriyar hajijiya ce taso fad'ar da ita sanda taga alamun mutum kwance sassanqame a saman qonanniyar kujera,bata gane fuskar wace ba amma data duba da kyau tsammaninta ya bata khairat ce,don husna tafi haka tsaho,kuka ne ya qwace mata ta dafe bangon cikin tashin hankali tana kiran sunan khairat din,sam bata da wani qwarin gwiwar isa inda take,asma'u dake bayanta itama ta sanya kuka saboda tsoro firgici da tausayi,dai dai sannan abban rahama ya shigo gidan afujajan,kai tsaye ya isa inda khairat din take yana furta "innalillahi wa'inna ilaihir raji'un,ba kuka zakiyi ba,koma gida ki d'auko min zani da bargo,da sauran ranta yi sauri mu miqata asibiti" da gudu gudu ta fito ta kawo abinda yace d'in,ya nannade khairat da ilahirin jikinta ke qone sai abinda ba'a rasa ba a ciki,cak ya d'auketa suka fice bayan ya barwa wani maqocin nasu kula da gidan,shi da mmn rahaman da asma'au suka wuce asibiti cikin motarshi,har sannan kuka maman rahama take cike da tashin hankalin halin da khairat din ke ciki,sai fidda numfashi take cikin wahala da azaba tana furta"Mama
mama" can qasan maqoshinta,a hanya ya dinga qoqarin kiran abban khairat saidai tana ta shiga amma bai d'aga ba
A dai dai lokacin yana can policestation sasanci kan case d'in badariyya,waya suka bawa kowaccensu ta kira wanda zai tsaya mata,wanda matan sun yarda a bada belinsu saboda darajar auren da suke da shi da kuma wasunsu dake da k'ananun yara,ranshi a matuqar b'ace yake sanya hannu kan wata takarda,jin zuciyarshi yake kaman zata kama da wuta,me ya kai badariyya gidan wasu?,ina asibitin da tace masa zata je?,shin ina ma ta bar masa yaranashi?,har ya kammala saka hannun sukayi musabaha da d'an sandan ya fice baiko kalli sashen da badariyyan take ba,inda ta tashi sumi sumi riqe da 'yarta ta biyo bayanshi cike da tsantsar fargabar da bata tab'a tsintar kanta cikin makamanciyarta ba irin yau
mrs muhammad ce

KUNDIN HASKE - Shafi na biyar - Page 2 - Wattpad
KUNDIN HASKE
AL'KALUMAN MARUBUTAN HASKE
HASKE WRITERS ASSOCIATION
BABI NA GOMA SHA BIYU 
MUTUNCIN MACE
TARE DA ALQALAMIN
SAFIYYA ABDULLAHI MUSA HUGUMA
05
Har suka isa bakin motarshi bai waiwayo ya dubeta ba,yayin da ita kuma take ci gaba da binshi,yana niyyar bud'e murfin motar wayarshi ta sake tsuwwa,ya fasa abinda yayi niyya ya saka hannunashi a aljihun gaban rigarsa ya fito da wayar yana duba mai kiran,karawa yayi a kunnensa bayan yayi sallama"Innalillahi wa inna ilaihir raji'un" kawai yake maimaitawa babu adadi,wanda ambatarta ya sanya gaban badariyya mummunar fad'uwa,cikin zafin nama ya bud'e motar ya shiga ya tadata,tana niyyar bud'ewa don itama ta shiga saidai tuni ya figeta ya fita daga harabar station d'i n
Baki ta saki galala tana bin motar da kallo,sai data gaji da tsaiwa don kanta sannan ta taka ta fice zuwa bakin titi,tana tunanin yadda zata kai kanta gida bayan bata dako qwandala,daga bisani ta yanke shawarar ta d'auki shata har qofar gida idan sun isa ta shiga ta biyashi kud'in,tun cikin adaidaitan tunani yaqi barinta,jinta take baki d'aya a muzance,da wannan tunanin suka isa gida
Da fari ta zaci ko qwaqwalwarta ce ko idanunta suja samu matsala,ganin cikin k'an k'anin lokaci gidan nata yana neman tashi daga sunan gida izuwa sunan kufai,ga mutane d'ai d'aiku tsaye gaban gidan da alama suna tattaunawa ne kan sauyin da gidan ya samu cikin lokaci q'anq'ani haka,sauka tayi daga adaidaitan cikin d'imuwa ta isa gaban gidan tana qare masa kallo kamar wata shashasha,ciki ta shige kai tsaye ba tare data tsaya sauraren maganar da mazan dake tsaye waje suka mata ba,mutum baifi uku ta tarar a ciki ba suna qarasa kashe inda baiji ruwa ba,ta kalli gabas da yamma kudu da arewa na gidan,sai kawai ta d'ora hannu akanta ta kurma ihu tana kiran"Wayyo Allah na shiga uku na,ina husna ina khairat,ya Allah ka taimakeni" ta ambata tana ci gaba da kururuwa wadda ita ta assasa soma shigowar mutane cikin gidan,soma bata baki wasu suka soma yi suna lallashinta,saidai sam bata jin me suke fad'a,a zauce ta miqe ta fice daga gidan ta fad'a gidan maman rahama,sam ta mance da batun wani mai adaidaita da kud'insa,shima ganin halin data tsinci gidanta sai ya gyad'a kai kawai ya burga babur d'insa ya bar layin yana fad'in"Allah ya kyauta,ya kiyaye gaba"
Sauran k'annenta ta taras a gidan cikin matuqar mutuwar jiki na halin da suka ga khairat a ciki,tambayarsu ta hauyi maman rahaman suka shaida mata sun tafi asibiti kai khairat ita da abban rahama,kuka ne ya b'arke mata"Me ya samu khairat d'in?,kaddai ace gobarar ta sameta?" Kai kawai suka iya d'aga mata"Na shiga uku na lalace khairat d'ina,wanne asibiti ne?" Nan suka shaida mata asibitin,sai ta kwasa zaya fice,dakatawa tayi saboda tunowa da tayi da husna"Husna fa?" Ta tambayesu"Bata cikin gidan gaskiya don bamu ganta ba" tsoro da fata suka had'u cikin ranta,fatan Allah yasa ita ta tsallake da kuma tsoron ina take?
Gida gida haka ta dinga bi neman husnan,saidai babu wanda ya ganta yau d'in baki d'aya,haka ta d'ebe lokaci mai tsaho tana nemanta layi bayan layi amma ba'a samu wanda ya ganta ba,daga k'arshe ta yanke shawarar tafiya asibiti wajen khairat
Tsaye yake gaban gadon tunda yazo asibitin,tuni idanunsa suka jina da sauya kala cikin d'imbin b'acin rai zalla baqinciki da kuma tausayin yarinyar dake kwance,baki d'aya jikinta lullube yake da bandaji,baka iya ganin kamai nata sai k'ofofin hanci dana idanuwanta,tunda yazo asibitin babu abinda ya iya yi,kafin isowar nashi abban rahama ya riga daya gama komai dama,bayan ya iso ya jajanta masa sannan suka koma gida shi da maman rahaman da niyyar taje tayi abinci ta kawo,ko sau d'aya bai d'aga kai ya dubi badariyya data shigo tana rusar kukar ba,ta jima zaune kusa da yarinyar tana rusar kuka wadda zuwa yanzu idanuwan khairat d'in a rufe yake numfashi kawai take fitarwa,bata ma san wainar da ake toyawa ba,bai k'aunar ganinta ko misk'ala zarratin,tsantsar tsanarta da haushinta kawai ke zagaya jiki da jininsa,yana jin kaman ya tashi ya shak'eta ko zai rage jin radad'i da ciwon da zuciyarsa ke masa
Tashin hankalin da bata tab'a jinsa ba a rayuwarta yau take ji cikin zuciya da jikinta,yau ko kallo bata ishi inna da malam ba,bare hasiya qanwarta,tana so tasan ina husna take a qalla ko zata samu 'yar nutsuwa ko yaya take,cikin tsananin tsoro da shakkar abban khairat d'in irin wadda bata tab'a jin makamanciyarta ba ta isa gabanshi kanta a qasa"Abban khairat husna fa?" Ta qarashe tambayar hawaye na silmiyo mata,wani abu ya tokare masa wuya,ba shakka ba don cikin asibiti suke ba sai ya zabga mata mari"Ki b'acen daga wuri tun kafin nakai ga aikata miki abinda zuciyata ke raya min,ki b'ace daga asibitin nan" kai ta d'aga a tsorace,duk da tasan zata fuskanci fiye da hakan ma daga yanayin da taga fuskarshi"Haba abban khairat ina kakeso naje,baka ganin halin da khairat ke ciki?" Baki d'aya ji yayi ma kaman zaginsa take da maganarta,cikin wata uwar tsawa yace mata"Kibar d'akin nan tun ban shak'eki ba,ki fice kije ki nemo min yarinyata duk inda take,wannan dai burinki ya gama cika a kanta,to kije ki nemo min yarinyata,na baki daga nan zuwa safiya idan ba haka ba wallahi summa tallahi saikin koma inda kika fito" daga haka yayi gaba zuwa bakin gadon khairat yaja kujera ya zauna gaban yarinyar dafe da kansa,yana yin kanshi kaman zai tarwatse,cikin zuciyarsa ya soma ambaton sunayen Allah ko zai samu sassauci
Cikin kuka da tashin hankali ta ja k'afafunta da suka yi mata sanyi qalau,jinsu take kaman ba'a jikinta ba"Dawo ki dire min 'yata" ya fad'a ba tare daya waiwayo ya dubeta ba,sake maimaitawa yayin cikin tsawa,hakan ya sanya ba shiri ta soma kwance goyon khairiyya ya sanya hannayensa biyu ya tallafi yarinyar ya koma inda yake ya zauna yana rungume da ita
Kasa tafiya tayi,saita tsaya bangon d'akin bayan ta fita,ta jingina da jikin bango kana daga bisani ta sulale qasa tana rushewa da kuka,bata damu da kallon da mutanen ke wucewa suke mata ba,wasu su wuce,wasu su tsaya har suna d'an bata baki ga zatonsu jikin marar lafiyarta ne ya tsananta
Usman k'aninsa ya kira yazo ya tafi da khairiyya gidansu,tana kallo ya wuce ta gabanta ya fita da yarinyar,bata da ikon karbarta hakan ya sanya ta sake rushewa da kuka,abu goma da ashirin,babu miji babu yara biyu ga d'aya cikin halin rai kwakwai mutu kwakwai,duk a sanadiyyar yawon maqota
Haka ta kwana a bakin k'ofar d'akin cikin tashin hankali,lokaci lokaci takan leqo ta window ta duba halin da khairat ke ciki,duk sanda zata leqo d'in ko idanun abban khairat din tangaran,idanunshi da dukkan kulawarsa na kan khairat din,gefe d'aya zuciyarsa na cunkushe da fargaba tsoro da danuwar ina husna ta shiga?,duk da tun daren ya sanya k'aninsa sagir ya kai report na b'atan yarinyar wajen 'yan sanda,ko sanda zaije kiran likita bayan khairat d'in ta motsa ya ganta baiko nuna damuwa ko jin d'ar ba,bugu da k'ari ma ba wannan ne a gabansa ba,yanayin da khairat d'in ta farka shi yafi d'aga masa hankali
Yanayin yadda jikin yarinyar yake ya d'aga hankalin shi kansa likitan da mahaifinta,wata iriyar girgiza dukka jikinta yake,duk dauriya irinta na d'a namiji kasa daurewa abban nata yayi,hawaye ne ya soma zirya cikin idanunsa,baxai iya ganin azabar da yarinyar take ciki ba saboda haka ya juya ya had'a kanshi da bango yana q'oq'arin tsaida hawayenshi,ya jima a haka likita yana nashi aikin,a kunnensa yaji yarinyar tayi shak'uwa mai k'arfi har sau uku wadda hatta badariyya dake wajen d'akin sai data ji,wanda ya haifar mata da wata mummunar fad'uwar gaba,a haukace ta bud'e window d'in d'akin tana leqan khairat din,a sannan jikin yarinyar ya saki baki d'aya wanda hakan ke nuna rai yayi halinshi,saidai sam bata fuskanci haka ba har sai da taga likita ya dafa usman dake fuskantar bango yana cewa"Sai haquri,Allah ya karb'i abarsa" sannan ya dawo bakin gawar khairat ya janyo qyallen dake saman kanta ya lullub'eta,bata san sanda ta banko dak'in ba ta nufi gawar khairat d'in dake lullube cikin gunjin kuka tana jijjigata tare da kiran sunanta
"Kiyi hak'uri khairat don Allah,kiyi hak'uri karki tafi ki barni,na daina fita na k'yaleku,wlh na daina,ki dawo don Allah khairat kada kimin haka,ina sonki wallahi ina k'aunarki" ire ire wad'an nan sumbatun ta dinga yi,a hankali abban khairat ya juya ya fice daga d'akin zuwa varender d'in dake bakin k'ofar d'akin ha zauna yana furta innalillahi wa inna ilaihir raji'un
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Gidansu usman aka kai gawar khairat aka yayyafa mata ruwa kasancewar fatarta ba zata d'auki wanka ba,aka had'ata aka kaita gidanta na gaskiya,duk wanda baisan me ya faru ba idan yaga badariyya sai ya tausaya mata,tashin hankali goma da ashirin,cikin 'yan uwanta da sukasan me ya faru babu wanda ya tausaya mata balle kuma usman da tunda akayi rasuwar bata sake sanyashi a idanunta ba,yanzu baki d'aya hankali kuma ya tattara wajen neman husna,ina ta shiga,sauk'inta d'aya hajiya babbar usman d'in tasa an maido mata da khairiyya
Sai da akayi sadakar uku har a sannan suna gidansu usman d'in,don gidan nashi ba k'aramin gyara yake buk'ata ba kafin ya samu zaunuwa,dukkanin kwanaki ukun nan maman rahama na tare da ita,nan take wuni,sannan da abincin sadaka take zuwa,sau tari ita d'aya ke allashin badariyyan idan ta tuna khairat,ba abinda ke mata yawo aka sai kukan da yarinyar ta dinga yi na"Mama zan biki" ta saka hannu ta bigeta harda zagi,'yan k'ungiyarta kuwa zuwansu d'ai d'ai daga nan basu dawo ba,ita dinma batason ganin kowa daga cikinsu,domin bak'insu take gani fiye da tunani,gani take komai ma ya faru da ahalinta sune sila,tana zaune cikin MUTUNCINTA wato d'akin mijinta suka jata zuwa mummunar al'ada suka hanata zama waje guda bare ta kula da haqqi da nauyin da Allah S W T ya d'ora mata na kula da gida da tarbiyyar yaranta,ta manta cewa ba janta sukayi ta k'arfin tsiya ba da k'afafunta ta sanya kanta
washegari randa ta cika kwana hud'u da b'ata sannan ya samu kira daga wajen wata bak'uwar lamba,inda aka shaida masa cewa husna na wajensu,su sukayi garkuwa da ita,matuqar kuma suna sonta a raye to su gaggauta kawo naira miliyan ashirin cikin satin nan,idan ba haka ba zasu tsinci gawarta a k'ofar gidansu,sabon tashin hankali ya sake samuwa,kuka da tumami haka badariyya ta dinga yi,har sai da tsananin b'acin rai ya saka malam ya tsinka mata mari,saboda yana ganin duk wani abu daya faru itace sila,taron gaggawa aka had'a a familyn nasu,wanda cikin ikon Allah aka samu aka had'a naira miliyan goma sha biyar,saidai da aka tuntub'esu sunce ba zasu rage ko ficika ba tilas a cika musu kud'in,kuma matuk'ar suka saka jami'an tsaro cikin lamarin to la shakka sun rasa 'yarsu kenan
"Innalillahi wa'inna ilaihir raji'un,Allahumma ajirni fi musubati wa akhlifni khairan minha" ita kawai usman ke maimaitawa fili da b'oye,tunda uwarshi ta kawoshi duniya bai tab'a fuskantar tashin hankali makamancin wannan da yake ciki ba,saidai yan rok'ar sauk'i da samun d'auki daga wajen ubangijinsa
mrs muhammad ce

KUNDIN HASKE - Shafi na shida - Page 2 - Wattpad
