HASKE WRITER'S ASSOCIATION ( _Home of expert and_ _perfect writer's_ )
BABI NA GOMA SHA BIYAR 
KWAD'AYIN WASU IYAYEN
_Tareda Alk'alamin_
Ayshat D'ansabo lemu  
08
Sati biyu kenan da saka ranan auren su Ruk'ayyah da Nadeeya wanda za'ayi alokaci guda hakan yasa dukkanin b'angarorin ke cikin shiri baji bagani , yayinda ummah ta dage da gyaran jikin yaranta da temakon qanwarta datazo daga sokoto wacce suke kira anty Talatu,dama ita harkantane gyaran jikin amare cikin lokaci guda ko Amaren suka fara canzawa musamman Nadeeya wacce take acike batasa wani damuwa arantaba inka d'auke na halin da qanwarta Ruk'ayyah ke ciki , domin Ruky tarame sosai sbd takasa cire soyayyan Ahmad aranta , Kaman yadda tsanan kamal Alqasim ke sake samun guri acikin zuciyanta , tun ranan daya kirata takashe wayanta bata sake kunna wayan ba Nadeeya tayi ban hakurin amma babu sauyi , koda Anty talatu ta iso babu irin hakury da rarrashin dabatayi wa Ruk'ayya ba amma abanza , duk da cewa itama d'in tana takaicin yadda kwad'ayi ya rufe idanun yayarta take kok'arin jefa kyakykyawar d'iyanta cikin wani hali nadaban, taji tausayin yadda aka raba Ruk'ayya da nagartaccen yaro kaman Ahmad , sai dai bakin alk'ami yabushe tunda har komi yai nisa basu da ikon hana iyayen su Ruk'ayya aiwatar da ikon su akan yaransu , kaman yadda dangin Abba suka zuba masa idanu hakana umman ma suka kawo idanu suka sa mata , fatansu bai wuce Allah yaraba yaran daga fuskantan wulak'anci a gdn auren nasu ba , 
Ranan daya rage saura sati biyu biki aka kawo lefen Ruk'ayyah , wanda ya girgiza zukatan family d'insu Ruky domin akwatuna ne aka zubesu set biyar nagani nafad'a bama ta akwatunan ake ba tamkar irin yadda aka narka dukiya gurin tsara kayan dake ciki wanda alqalamina bazai iya misalta tsada da yawan kayan dake cikin wad'annan akwatuna ba kud'in d'inki kanshi miliyan d'aya aka sako wanda aka cira naira budu d'ari biyar aka bada tukuicin kayan 
Washegary aka kawo na Nadeeya itama akwatuna set hud'u wanda aka zuba kaya masu asalin kyau da tsada , duk wanda yaga kayan da aka kawo na lefen su Ruk'ayyah yasan tabbas yaran gdn arzik'i zasu shiga ,k'awaye da dangi nata zuwa kallon kaya masu hassada nayi masu fatan alkhairy nayi haka dai shirin biki yaci gaba wakana , harkuma zuwa lokacin Kamal Alqasim baisamu dawowa ba k'asan, domin ayyukan dayaje gudanarwa bai gamaba kumashi mutum ne mai bada muhimmanci akan duk abnd yashafi harkokin business d'insa , musamman wannan zuwan daya zama sabon company ne zasu bud'e nayin takalman maza da mata hakan yasa bazai dawoba sai yayi settling komi daya dace 
Yau bikin yarage saura kwanaki goma kenan duk wani shirin biki natafiya yadda ake buk'ata amare nacigaba da samun kwakykyawan shiri da gyara daga anty Talatu , Nadeeya itake gabatar da duk wani shiri itada qawayenta domin ko kad'an Ruk'ayyah taba shiga duk wani sabga sai Zainab Zubairu da Aysha Sani ne kawai aminanta biyu da suka taso tare suke gabatar da shiri ta b'angaren Ruk'ayyah , sosai Kamal yasa umar yasakin musu kud'in dazasuyi duk wani harkoki , ta account d'in Aysha sani yaturo musu naira miliyan d'aya da rabi itadai Ruk'ayyah 'yar kallo ce domin duk yadda zasu zauna suna tsara abubuwansu baxaka tab'a jin bakinta aciki ba , kullum cikin kai kukanta ga Allah take akan yabata ikon yin dangana , haushi da wani ciwo takeji a kullum kwanan duniya idn ta tuna da wanine daban za'a d'aura mata aure bada masoyin ta Ahmad ba , wanda yayima garin kano k'aura domin zuciyansa bazata iya juran ganin bak'ar ranan da zaizo ya riskesa ba na auren Kamal da Ruk'ayyah
Misalin karfe takwas na dare Ruk'ayyah da Nadeeya ce zaune bisa katifarsu , can daga tsakiya Zee Zubairu ce ke shirya kayan Ruk'ayyah da aka kawo d'inkunan su daga kd , wanda Ashanty Sani ce takai can d'in sosai d'inkunan suka bada ma'ana domin telan yasan aikinsa , sai da tagama rufe akwatin ne ta dubi Ruky daketa zabga mata harara tana fad'in
"To Amaryan kamal gadai d'inkuna nan sunyi saura kawai Allah yakaimu ranan sakasu, niharna hango yadda zaki zama sauraniya ta gske ranan don Allah Ruky Turaki kisaki ranki kibar abnd yafaru amatsayin k'addara
"
Ta k'are mgn tana tsare Ruky da idanu wacce tai saurin kawar da fuskanta tanaji wasu hawaye nataruwa a idanunta , Nadeeya ce ta amshi mgn da fad'in
"Yauwa Zee tayani gayamata dai kullum ina mata fad'a akan ta d'auki komi amatsayin k'addara
, dukkanin mu makusantan ta munfi goyan bayan aurenta da Ahmad domin shiyafi dacewa da rayuwanta , amma tunda hakan yakasance meyasa Ruky bazaki amshi k'addara ba ? "
"Wannan ba k'addara bace sahihiya ya Nadee KWAD'AYIN IYAYEN mune dason zuciyansu kawai , shiyasa har yau zuciyata takasa yadda da wannan auren nakasa aminta bason zuciyan iyayena bane zai tarwatsa farin cikina
"
Ruky ta yanke mgn muryanta narawa tana k'ok'arin hana hawayen idanunta zubowa , dukkaninsu tausayinta ne yakarya zuciyansu cikin lallashi Zee ke fad'in
"Ruky kiyi hak'ury kada kibari zuciyanki ta kullaci iyayenki , kidinga sama ranki k'addara ce zata rabaki da Ahmad plxx Ruky kisawa zuciyanki hakury da dangana kinji
"
"Naji zee nakuma gode da duk irin rawan da kuke takawa akaina keda Ashanty , hak'ik'a ku qawaye ne nagari abn alfahary ngd Allah yabar zumunci tsakaninmu "
Ruk'ayyah takare mgn tana rungume Zee zubairu , hakanan Nadeeya taji qawayen biyu sun burgeta ita shaidace akan son da sukewa juna , sosai Zee ke taka rawa wajen kwantar ma k'anwan tata da hankali da kalamai masu dad'i 
Kiran wayan Zee da akayine yasasu sakin juna Zee na duba wayanta ganin driver d'in sune yazo yasata mik'ewa tana d'aukan mayafinta , tareda yima Nadeeya sallama akan sai kuma gobe in Allah yakaimusu rai , Ruky ce tasaka hijab domin yima Zee d'in rakiya har gurin mota sukai sallama tadawo cikin gd, zamanta bai wuci da mintina sha biyar ba Ummah tayi sallama d'akin nasu Nadeeya ce ta amsa sallaman kallon inda Ruk'ayyah ke kwance ummah tayi tana wurga mata harara take fad'in
"Maza tashi mara mutunci ashe Kamal yadawo yau yanzu yakirani yana sanarmin tunda ya tafi kika kashe wayanki sbd bakima k'aunar yin waya dashi , wlh Ruk'ayyah ki kiyayeni idn akai wannan auren kikaje kina yima yaron nan rashin mutunci haryayi fushi yasakoki kitabbatar badai wannan gdn zaki dawo kiyi zawarci ba , don na fuskanci take taken dakike kenan mara mutunci kawai wacce batasan inda kemata ciwo ba , kitashi maza kishirya kisameshi awaje yacemin gashican yazo
"
Ummah na gama mgn tayi waje fuuu
Cikeda b'acin rai yayinda Ruk'ayya tayi lamo tanaji zuciyanta nasake tsanan Kamal yadda yake anfani da izza da gadara yana had'ata da iyayenta don kawai yana tak'ama shi mai arziki ne su kuma iyayenta makwad'aita ne 
"Kiyi hak'ury Ruky kitashi kije kada yaita jira zuwa yanzu yakamata ki koyi danne zuciya kina abnd yadace , kada kice zaki cigaba da nuna masa tsanan dakike masa azahiri inba haka ba zaki wahala ahannunsa "
Nadeeya tayi mgn zuciyanta tab da tausayin qanwar tata , jiki asanyaye Ruk'ayyah ta mike ta d'aura bak'ar abaya akan kayan jikinta riga da wando marasa nauyi , gyalen abayar tayane kanta dashi batare datayi yinkurin shafa komi afuskanta ba , qamshi me matukar kama jiki da tufafi daya fara zama afatarsu ketashi ajikinta , bak'aramin kyau abayan tai mataba tasake fito da hasken fatarta wanda ya had'e da gyaran dasuke sha fatarta yayi wani irin santsi da sulb'i tamkar ta jarirai , ahankali ta zura flat takalminta tayi waje zuciyanta acinkushe 
Tunda ta fito fitillan kofar gdn nasu ya haske fuskanta hakan yasa Kamal dake kwance jikin seat ya zuba mata idanu , kirjinsa na wani irin bugawa yarasa meyasa aduk lokacin dazaiyi ido hud'u da Ruky yakeji tamkar zai rasa nutsuwansa ne , harta kariso tayi nocking Kamal bai d'auke idanunsa akanta ba 
Front seat ya bud'e mata babu musu ta shiga tazauna yayinda tasanya kafafunta ciki , karo nafarko datayi hakan shima sbd yadda ake d'an sanyi-sanyi ne agarin sakamakon ruwan sama da suka samu da rana , hakan datayi ne yaba kamal Alqasim daman kai hannu ya rofo kofar motar tareda danna Lock motar ta kulle baki d'aya , hakan yasa Ruk'ayyah d'aga manyan idanunta ta sauke akan fuskan sa wanda shima nasa idanun nakanta , wani irin banzan kallo ta watsa masa duk da cewa bemasan tanayi ba sbd babu wadatan haske acikin motar 
Hannu Kamal Alqasim yakai ya kunna fitilar motar haske ya gauraye cikin motar , yayinda ya zubama Ruk'ayyah idanunsa yana k'are mata kallo tundaga yatsun k'afarta har zuwa kan kyakykyawar fuskanta wanda ta dukar dakan nata k'asa ,hakan datayi saiya ba Kamal Alqasim daman kai hannusa guda domin d'ago da fuskan tata
Batare datai auneba taji lallausan hannun sa bisa fuskanta hakan yasa tayi saurin d'ago fuskan nata gabaki d'aya tana mai jifanshi da wata uwar harara , wanda yasake jefa zuciyan Kamal Alqasim cikin wani yanayi , gani yayi tamkar ansake ninka kyawunta ne sai dai ya hango raman datayi har afuskanta 
Baki tabud'e ahankali tana fad'in
Aysha D'ansabo ce

09
"Miye hakan kake kokarin yine? ka bud'emin mota infita inbaka da abn cewa
"
Ruk'ayyah tayi mgn tana sake tamke fuska , ko kad'an fuskanta babu annuri saima wani matsiyacin tsanan Kamal d'in dake sake kamata , har zuwa lokacin yak'i ya kashe fitilar motan ya tsurama bakin ta idanu yana ayyana yadda zaiji dad'in yin kiss ahankali yakai hannu yashafo lips d'in ta tayi saurin buge hannuwansa tana jan tsaki tareda watsa masa kallo mai cikeda d'inbin tsana da k'yamarsa 
Murmushi yayi yana me kashe hasken fitilar motar tareda jingina da jikin seat d'in , tamkar bazai sake cewa komi ba kafin ya bud'i baki yana fad'in
"Ruk'ayyah har zuwa yanzu tsanata nake hangowa cikin idanuwanki , kardai ince har yanzu wannan shashashan bai fita daga ranki ba? kinsan ni inada kishi akan abnd nakeso na mallaka , duk da cewa abinciken danasa akemin rahotanni sun nuna yabar garin ana gobe zan bar k'asar sannan kuma kafin yatafi anshaida min kunyi bankwana dashi a gdn qawarki , bansan wani irin ganawa kukaiba abnd ya tsayamin arai kenan harna bar k'asar nan sai dai bana fata wani yafara shiga gonar dazan shig
"
"Enough! Kamal me kake nufi ? Ko angayama Ahmad yana cikin sahun jahilan samari irin kane ? Ahmad natsatstsan mutum ne wanda bazai iya aikata abnd k'azamar zuciyanka ke raya makaba , Kamal na rok'eka ka fita arayuwata ka shaidama iyayena kafasa aure na wlh bana son ka sam baka dace da rayuwata b
"
Kukane yaci karfin Ruky harta kasa k'arisa abnd ke cikin zuciyanta , Kamal d'in ne ya haske fuskanta da hasken wayan sa yana kallon yadda hawaye ke gudu bisa fuskanta , wani kishine ya sokeshi yana ayyana akan wannan matsiyacin yaron ne take zubar da hawaye har haka , cikin tsawa da gadara yake fad'in
"Wlh Ruk'ayyah saina mallakeki koda ace hakan shine abu nak'arshe dazai ragemin arayuwata , ina sonki ina masifan sha'awan kasancewa dake nayi anfani da KWAD'AYIN IYAYEN kine domin incinma manufata na mallakanki kokina so ko bakyaso, kuma gashi nakusa cinma burina don haka kidaina rok'ona bazan tab'a janyewa akan abnd nakeda muradi ba "
Yakare mgn yana mai fisgota zuwa jikinsa da k'arfin tsiya , abazata rik'on yazo mata gashi babu ta yadda zata iya hanashi domin motar akulle take , hakan yasa ta fashe dawani irin kuka mai cin rai cikin muryan kukan take fad'in 
"Kasakeni Kamal don Allah kabud'emin intafi gd niba 'yar iska bace dazakamin irin wannan rik'on "
"Dole kizama 'yar iska Ruky tunda gashi zaki auri d'an iska , ayanzu zansake baki tabbacin ni d'an iskane manemin matane ni kifad'i da bubban murya "
Kamal yayi mgn yana mai anfani da k'arfin sa wajen cire abayan jikin Ruky, wanda ta cimimiyeshi da hannuwanta tamkar tasan abnd yake shirin yi , hannu yasa ya b'arke wuyan rigan tak'arfi tareda zamesa pink top d'in datasa ya bayyana wanda yafito da asirin kirjinta dasuke acike , wani irin wawan cizo takai masa alokacin dayake shirin kai hannunsa bisa kirjinta , duk da cewan yaji zafin cizon amma hakan baisa ya hak'ura ba saima bakinsa daya had'e danata bayan ya murd'e hannuwanta sunbada wani k'ara wanda yasa Ruky sakin k'aramin ihu domin taji zafi , wasu hawaye masu bala'in d'umi ne suka wanke fuskanta tanaji tana gani Kamal ya yamutsata son ransa , kirjinta da zuciyanta duka zafi suke tanaji tamkar zuciyanta zata fito wajene , wani mugun tsanansane yasake samun gurbi acikin zuciyanta 
Bata sake shiga cikin wani haliba saida taji hannuwansa nashirin kaiwa k'asanta , wani mahaukacin ihu tasaki wanda ya firfigita Kamal yayi saurin toshe bakinta kafin yakai bakinsa bisa kunnuwanta yana fad'in 
"Shiiiii! Wlh kika kumamin ihu sainayi abinda bakyaso acikin motannan zan iya keta mutuncinki , dama ai nagama siye iyayenki kuma ga sadakina a gdn ku so inada ikon yin yadda naso , ke zanma iya kauda budurcinki inkuma fasa aurenki babu kuma abnd zaifaru domin ko gadukkanin alamu iyayenki sunfi buk'atar kud'i akan mutuncinki , so kibarni nad'an rage zafi kafin akawominke inyi yadda naga dama dake "
Kamal ya k'are mgn yana wasa da kirjinta wanda sukai masifan tafiya da ruhinsa , wani fitinan sha'awanta kesake fisgansa hakan yasa da kyar yabarta tareda tureta daga jikinsa ,idanuwanta arufesuke suna tsiyayar hawaye masu zafi yaune rana tafarko da namiji yaci mutuncinta dacin zarafinta irin haka Riganta daya yar takai hannu tadauka tasa ,tareda tattaro abayanta daya yaga cikin dabara tarufe jikinta ko kad'an batason kallon fuskansa hakan yasa tayi mgn dak'yar 
"Kabud'emin mota infita tunda kayi abnd kakeso Kamal amma ba laifinka bane laifin iyayena da suka nuna arzikinku suke kwad'ayi , dama alokuta dayawa KWAD'AYIN WASU IYAYEN
kan jefa yaransu shiga cikin kowani irin yanayi , gashi ina gani akan kaina amma kasani wlh bazan yafe wannan wulak'ancin dakamin ba , kai dak'ik'in inane da aka gayama kawo sadaki shine aure ko shine kebada hallaccin tab'a jikin macen da ba'a shaida aurenka da itaba ,na tsaneka Kamal bazan tab'a daina sanar dakai baka dace danib
"
Takasa karisawa sbd yadda yakai hannu ya bige mata baki cikin izza yake fad'in 
"Babyna kidaina gayamin kintsaneni domin ni inasonki , kinada kayan more rayuwa da zan anfana dasu zakuma kisoni ne karki damu yanzu dai nasan nayi laifi sai dai kash
! Ba al'adata bane baiwa mace hakury ko lallashinta ba baby , yanzu dai kije gd ki kwanta kihuta kisanar da Abba d'inki zan turo da sak'o abashi na carr key"
Yakare mgn yana bud'e lock d'in hakan yasa Ruk'ayyah tafice tana me share hawaye , yayinda kamal ke bin bayanta da kallo yana sake jin sha'awanta nabin jininsa , wani irin dad'i da annashuwa yakeji nabin jikinsa wasannin dayayi da gangar jikinta kemasa yawo aka,haka yaja motar cikin farin ciki yanaci gaba da ayyana lamura dayawa acikin zuciyan sa
Ruky kuwa tana shiga d'akinsu ta fad'a jikin Nadee dake kwance tana waya da Aliyu , sam Rukyn batama kula waya takeba tafashe mata da wani irin kuka hakan yasa Nadeeya katse kiran ta rungume Ruky tana tambayan ta meya faru ? 
Cikin kuka Ruky kesanar da Nadeeya abnd yafaru hakury Nadeeya tashiga bata tana kwantar mata da hankali dacewa aida sauk'i tundama kwanaki kad'an yarage tazama mallakinsa gaba d'aya
Washegary Kamal da kansa yaba d'aya daga cikin direbobinsu mukullin sabuwar mota k'iran Range Rover bak'a me masifan kyau domin yakawo ma surukinsa ,sbd bazai iya cigaba da ganin sa acikin tsohuwar motar dayake hawaba 406 , rafers d'in kud'i na 200k acikin envelop yasake ba Bala yana sanar masa wannan na ummah ce 
Koda wannan kyautuka ya iso gurin ummah da Abba bak'aramin farin ciki sukayi ba , su qannin ummah anty Talatu dasauran ne keta bin ummah da kallo yadda a kullum take sake tabbatar musu da cewa zarginsu ne keshirin zama gsky Kwad'ayi ne ked'awainiya da zukatansu itada mijinta akan yaransu 
Shirin bikine ke cigaba daga kowani b'angare , Kamal tun randa suka rabu da Ruky baisake gigin zuwaba waya kuma tuni yake akashe koya kira baya samunta , tasake yamutsewa ta rame amma duk da hakan bai hana aga mugun kyawun da jikinta keyiba sbd gyaran dasuke samu 
Su Zee zubair sungama duk wani tsari dazaisa bikin yayi musu armashi duk da cewa aminiyan tasu taki bada goyan baya ko kamune ashirya , sai rantsatstsan walima dasuke so agabatar ranan yinin bikin itama Nadeeya saita hakura dayin kamun suka tsara waliman baki d'aya Kamal ne ya sanar ma Ashanty akwai dinner idn ankai masa amaryar tasa
Cikin hukuncin Allah lokaci yazo tareda cikar alqawarin me duka( Wato Allah) ranan asabar aka d'aura auren 'yan matan biyu da zaratan angwayensu wanda suka fito daga gdn arziki , auren Nadeeya da Aliyu aka fara shaidawa sannan saina Ruky da kamal, ranan garin kano tasan and'aura auren yaran gata domin misalta irin mutanan da suka taru da manyan b'akin da suka shigo daga sassa daban -daban b'ata lokacine , ga mnyan 'yan siyasa da jiga jigan gwamati duk sun halarci wannan aure 
Bayan angama d'aura auren ne biki yacigaba kaman yadda aka saba, xuwa yamma aka gabatar da walima wanda ya k'ayatar domin duk wanda ya halarci gurin yasan ankashe naira wajan wadatar da mutanan da suka halarci waliman da kayan ci dasha masu k'ayatarwa , ankuma gabatar da wa'azi me ratsa zukatan masu imani
Aranan kuma angwayen suka buk'aci akai musu amaren domin gudanar da gagaruman Dinner da aka shirya daga dukkanin b'angaren , hakan yasa byn fad'a da nasihohi masu ratsa zukata daga iyaye da sauran dangi aka mik'a Amaren zuwa gdn su 
Nadeeya aka fara kaiwa k'ayataccen gdn ta dake lamid'o road, gd ne sabo fil wanda aka kashe dukiya wajen shirya ababen more rayuwa acikinsa , babban benene mai d'auke da d'akuna birjik sama da k'asa wanda Aliyu shiya gyara kusan duka d'akunan sai d'akuna biyu kacal da akabar iyayen su Nadeeya su gyara kaman yadda dangin umman da Abba suka dage sbd gudun gory , babu wanda zai zagaye gdn nan ace yasamu abn kushewa sai dai hassada , ba'ajima da kaitaba aka fara shirin fita zuwa Dinner
Abangaren Ruk'ayya itama haka aka samu mik'ata gdn angon nata dake sir kaseem road, kayatacce kuma tank'asheshen gd ne daya lashe miliyoyin naira ,tamkar ba'a cikin 9ja kakeba haka zakaji idn kashiga cikinsa sbd yadda aka k'awata wannan gini tamkar baza'a mutu ba , tabbas masu kud'inmu nakashe dukiya ak'asa nidai duk yanda naso k'awata muku irin yadda gdn Kamal Alqasim ya k'awatu nakasa, nabar me karatu ya kiyasta ma zuciyansa 
Duk wanda sukaje gdn Nadeeya sannan suka shigo gdn Ruky to zasu san cewa gaba da gabanta ne, nan dangi da 'yan uwa suka shiga santi masu hassada ma suka sake ji kaman su had'iyi zuciya su mutu , ko cokali Kamal bai aminta akaiba yace ya yafe komi duk iya yadda akai magiya akan yabari agyara ko d'aki biyu ne kaman yadda akaima Nadeeya , amma fir yace bayida buk'ata domin interior's(wad'anda ake kira dominsu gyara gd su shirya komi sai dai ashiga kawai, hatta da kayan sakawa inkana buk'ata zasu tsara maka komi sai dai kawai kashiga gdn ka) sun rigada sungama sanya komi bisa tsarin daya zab'a 
Qawataccen Dinner party ne aka shiryashi a Taheer guest palace, Dinner ne daya tara manyan mata da manyan abokan ango wanda suka had'a harda fararen fata abokan kasuwancin sa , Ruky da Kamal sunyi kyau harsun gaji kowa kuma yabar gurin yana yaba irin dacewan dasukai da juna , hatta Momyn Kamal saida taji kaso hamsin cikin d'ari na rashin son auren tilon d'anta da Ruk'ayya yakau alokacin sbd yadda tahango natsuwa da dacewan dasukai da juna da Kamal d'in 
Lokacin da aka mayarda amarya d'akinta daga gurin Dinner dare yafara domin shabiyu saura ne na dare, amma duk da hakan babu wanda yayi yink'urin kwana kowa sai dai yai mata fatan samun zaman lfy ya fice , sukam aminan qawayen nata Zee da Ashanty tundaga gurin dinner suka sulale domin idn sukace zasu koma to za'a shafama kafin sufito daga gdn Ruky sbd yadda rabuwan nasu zaiyi , sai dai sun tafi suna mata fatan alkhairy da samun zaman lfy agdn Kamal d'in kafin akwana biyu sukoma anatse 
Tsit gdn da d'akin da Ruky ke ciki yad'auka bakajin motsin komi sai sautin kukan datakeyi ahankali , jikinta yad'auki wani mugun zafi haka ta silale ta kwanta a qawataccen gadonta daya gaji da had'uwa ko kayan jikinta batai yinkurin cirewa ba duk da irin yadda sukai mata nauyi ajiki
Karfe d'aya na dare Kamal Alqasim ya shigo gdn nasa batare daya buk'aci rakiyan aboki ko d'aya ba , dagashi sai tarin ledojin tarkacen su nama da kayan sha ya haura zuwa k'ayataccen falon dake up stair's , bisa center table ya aje ledojin tareda wucewa zuwa bedroom d'insa domin watsa ruwa 
Mintuna fiye da ashirin sai gashi ya fito cikin milk jallabiya sai azababban qamshin sa dake tashi , wanda yariga ya kama komi nasa hannunsa rik'eda wayansa ya nufi d'akin dayake da tabbacin nan aka aje masa amaryansa

Kofan ya bud'e tareda sanya kansa ciki sanyi da qamshi ne me matuk'ar kwantar da zuciya suka bugeshi , ahankali yake takawa har zuwa bakin gadon wanda Ruky ke gudundune tana rawan sanyi sakamakon zazzab'in daya rufeta lokaci guda 
Zama yayi tareda kai hannu ya d'agota baki d'aya zuwa jikinsa, zafin dayaji jikinta yayi saidaya tsoratashi har zuwa lokacin idanunta arufe yake duk da idanunta biyu ta kuma san babu mahalukin dazai shigo inba shid'in ba , hakan yasa wasu hawayen masu bala'in zafi suka gangaro 
Rigan jikinta yake k'ok'arin rabata dashi tana nok'ewa hakan yasa yayi mgn ahankali yana fad'in
"Keh! Kibari arabaki da wannan kayan kina nufin dasu zaki kwanta are u mad? "
Yakare mgn yana zuge zip din rigan tareda cireshi baki daya tadawo daga ita sai bra da underwear, kirjin ya tsurawa idanu zuciyansa na harbawa da sauri , jikinta yayi matukar d'aukan zafi gashi dare yayi hakan yasashi shinfid'eta ya nufi bathroom 
Cikin k'ananan towel's d'in dake jere a ma'ajiyunsu ya zare guda d'aya , tareda jik'oshi da ruwa ya fito yanufeta akaro na biyu domin rage mata zafin zazzab'in 
Duk abnd yakeyi idanun Ruky arufe suke bakuma tayi yinkurin hanashi ba , domin tasan kotayi hakan bazata tsiraba ga zafin zazzab'in da ke mukurkusanta ajikinta ita kanta tana buk'atan tasamu sauki , saida yaji zafin ya ragu sosai kafin yabarta yana me aje towel d'in bisa bedside drawer ya maidota gaba d'aya zuwa jikinsa , fuskansa ya sanya bisa kirjinta yana jan numfashi tareda sauke ajiyan zuciya da k'arfin gske 
Yana jin yadda bugun zuciyanta ya k'aru kirjinta na harbawa da sauri da sauri , murya can k'asan mak'oshi yayi mgn yana fad'in
"Babyna i luv u sorry kinji kidaina kuka kina tareda masoyinki ne ehem bari inkawo miki wani abu kici saimu kwanta ko "
Yak'are mgn yana shinfid'eta ya fice ledan fresh milk da nama ya d'akko yadawo , tananan dai akwance sai dai takoma ruf da cikine don tana cigaba da zubda hawaye 
Saida ya aje kafin ya sake d'aukanta tamkar baby ya sakko da ita bisa carpet, ajikinsa yai mata masauki yafara bata fresh milk d'in sai dai tak'i amsa saita kauda kanta gefe guda
Ganin hakan yasashi sake matseta tareda sata dole saidatasha kad'an ta kawar da fuska , bataci naman ko d'aya ba tafara yinkurin barin jikinsa hakan yasa ya d'auketa suka koma zuwa gado 
Wasanni ya shigayi da gangar jikinta son ransa, sai dai duk yadda yaso ya maida cikakkiyar mace bai iyaba sbd yanayin datake ciki ga uban kukan datake masa , hakan yasa yamatseta akirjinsa ahaka suka kwanta wanda shidai bacci ya d'aukesa sab'anin Ruk'ayyah da sai kusan asuba tasamu bacci 
Farkawa tayi tajita ajikinsa gari har yayi haske cikin rawan jiki tajanye jikinta tana kallon agogo karfe shida harda rabi , agaggauce tanufi toilet ta d'auro alwala tayi sallah , harta idar ko motsi Kamal baiyi ba yabata baccin sa hankalinsa kwance 
Kaman tasharesa sai kuma taga rashin dacewan hakan ta nufi bakin gadon tareda bubbugawa yadda zai tashi , da k'yar ya bud'e idanunsa ya sauke akanta tareda maidasu ya lumshe
"Katashi kai sallah sai faman bacci kake bakadamu daka tashi kagaida ubangijinka ba "
Ruk'ayyah tayi mgn tanajan k'aramin tsaki zuciyanta gaba d'aya ta tsaneshi ,mik'ewa yayi yabar d'akin baki d'aya batareda daya cemata uffan ba hakan yasata tab'e baki tareda komawa ta kwanta domin yadda kanta ke sarawa gawani bacci datakeji 
Aiko batajima da kwanciyaba wani bacci yai awon gaba da ita , shikuwa kamal yana komawa d'akin sa yasake fad'awa bisa bed yacigaba da baccinsa hankalinsa kwance , dominshi sallah badamuwansa bace saiya ga dama musamman na asuba dayake ganin takura kaine mutum na baccinsa me dad'i ya yankesa , garama sauran sallolin yakan yisu musamman inyana cikin jama'ane ko agd dad yatasashi sushiga masallaci tare 
Ruk'ayyah bata farkaba sai shabiyu na rana hakan yasa tayi wanka tashirya kanta cikin lace me shegen kyau dinkin gown ne dayai matuk'ar yimata kyau, batai wani kwalliya a fuskanta ba banda kwalli da powder data shafa kawai shima don taga yadda fuskanta yayi babu kyawun gani ne 
Yinwa takeji sai dai batajin zata iya fita koda falo ne sbd ciwan da kanta keyi, hakan yasata komawa ta kwanta shiru tana ji zuciyanta nacigaba d'aukan zafi tareda hasaso irin rayuwan da sukaci burin shinfid'awa da Ahmad idn sunyi aure , saigashi burinsu bai cikaba batasan lokacin data fashe da kukaba dai dai lokacin kamal yasanyo kansa cikin d'akin
Hannunsa rikeda mug na coffee sai tiriri ke tashi yana siffing ahankali harya k'ariso bakin gadon ya zauna idanunsa na kanta ,aje mug d'in yayi tareda kai hannu ya d'agota ta runtse idanu hawayen nasake zuba 
"Wai ke kuka baya isanki ne baby ? Gashi nan ai kinsama kanki ciwo , nikuma rarrashin mace ba d'abi'ata bane so zaifi kyau ki adana hawayenki kisan nan gdn Kamal kika shigo "
Kamal yayi mgn yana sakinta tasake zubewa agadon tanasakin k'aramin kuka, harya kusa fita yasake juyowa yana fad'in 
"Keh! Kitaso kifito kiyi breakfast kisha magani , namatsu infara more rayuwata dake kada kibari inyi jiranki na lokaci baki fitoba "
Ya juya tareda ficewa daga d'akin a falon nan sama ya samu kujera yazauna yana jiran fitowanta,an dauki mintuna kusan shabiyar kafin tafito tana tafiya ahankali kanta ak'asa , tasamu guri tazauna ko kad'an bata cikin natsuwan zuciya tundaga randa Kamal yashigo rayuwanta 
Hannu yayi anfani dashi yana nuna mata saman table da aka aje k'aton basket me d'auke da kulolin abnci , wanda aka aiko tana bacci sai kiranshi driver yayi ya fita ya amso musu daga gdn su momy tasa akashiryo
Ga kuma ledan magunguna dayasa akawo mata sbd zazzabin datake , hakan yasa taja jiki da kyar ta zuba iya abnd zata iya ci ta had'a ruwan tea ta d'auki plate da cup d'in da ledan maganin ta juya zata koma d'akin ta 
Wata uwar tsawa ya daka mata yana fad'in "hey! Waya baki izinin barin nan oya dawo kizauna kishanye d'akina zamuje inada buk'atan infara moran sadakina da dukiyata dana kashe akanki "
Ba musu tadawo tazauna da kyar tasha tea d'in yayinda maganganun Kamal suka cinkushe zuciyanta takasa cin abnd tazuba , zuciyanta namata matuk'ar zafi sai dai ko k'adan bata ganin laifinsa ayanzu saina iyayenta 
Domin KWAD'AYIN sune ya janyo mata hakan , mik'ewa yayi tareda mik'a mata hannu alamun ta taho nok'ewa tayi hakan yasa ya fisgeta da k'arfi 
Yana jan hannunta har zuwa bedrom d'insa abakin bed ya zaunar da ita yanufi , kayan jikinsa yacire sai boxer kawai daya bari ajikinsa yadawo ya zauna kan bed d'in yana kallon yadda ta rintse idanunta 
Murmushi yayi kad'an kafin yaciri murya yana fad'in
"Baby kitashi kicire kayan jikinki bansan ganin komi atare dake and don't trying to waste my time "
Ya k'are mgn cikin tsawa hakan yasa Ruk'ayyah fashewa da kuka mai ban tausayi , wannan wace irin rayuwace wani aure ne wannan tayi ? Abnd zuciyata keta tambaya kenan har lokacin komotsin kirki takasa yi 
Hakan yasa Kamal cikin ya fisgota ta fad'o jikinsa bai wata wataba ya shiga rabata da kayan jikinta , ya kwantar da ita bisa d'in yana kallon yadda jikinta rawa hawaye nabin idanunta 
Batareda tausayi ko rarrashiba yafara yin duk abnd yaso , cikeda gadara dakuma kwarewa akan harkan haka yatafi da Ruk'ayyah harya rabata da abn da duk macen kwarai take tinkaho takawo gdn aure wato budurcinta 
Taci matukar wahala ahannunsa domin saida yaji ya gamsu yadda yakeso sannan yabarta, batareda yayi tunanin ita d'in sabon shigabace tun tana kuka da murya harta koma ajiyan zuciya kawai 
Tsallaketa yayi yashige bathroom batareda tsayawa rarrashi ba , duk kuwa da yadda yaji ta gigita zuciyansa da dadin dabai taba kawo zaiji akantaba , yana wanka ne yana ayyana yadda zaita more rayuwansa da ita batareda tada gunduresa ba 
Koda yafito tana kwance yadda yabarta sai alokacin yaji tausayin yadda yai mata , hakan yasashi daukanta yai bathroom d'in da ita yai mata duk yadda zata zanji sauki sannan yabarta ya fito 
Wanka takeyi tana kukan bak'in ciki da takaici , zuciyanta nasake jin matuk'ar tsanansa marar misaltuwa ahaka tasamu tagasa jikinta ta fito d'aureda k'aton towel , kanta ak'asa haka tanufi kofa ta fice domin bata son ganin fuskansa 
Kamal dake kwance bisa resting chair dake cikin d'akin yabita da kallo yana tab'e baki , kallon gadon yayi kafin yatashi yacire bedsheet d'in ya sauya wani kayanta dayayi watsi dasu ya d'auka yana kaiwa hancinsa ya shak'i qamshinta tareda lumshe idanu wani azaban sha'awanta nasake kama zuciyansa 
Ruk'ayyah kuwa tana shiga d'akin ta ta kulle tareda fashewa da kuka , da k'yar ta sanya doguwar riga tabi lafiyan gado wani sabon zazzabi ne yarufeta ga azaban yunwa datakeji 
Ayshat D'ansabo ce

11

"Baby! Baby! Cwthrt kibud'e kofar nan kici abnci kisha magani "

B'angaren Nadeeya kuwa ita tun daren ranan Aliyu ya angwance cikin tsananin tattali da kulawa yabi da ita , harya kawar da kwad'ayin sa dayake d'awainiya dashi , wanda dama jigon auren kenan da yayi domin sha'awan kasancewa da surarta ne yarinjayi zuciyansa dakuma kwad'ayin iyayensa nason yayi aure , amma bawani mugun sone yakewa Nadeeya daya taka kara yakarya ba 
Ya mori sadakinsa matuk'a yadda yakeso yayinda yadinga dilmiyar da zuciyar Nadeeya da kalamai masu matuk'ar tsada da sace zuciya , kanta yai girma harta faraji dama Aliyu nasonta har haka bawai zallan sha'awanta ne datafi hangowa a idanunsa ba ? har zuwa washegary haka amaren suka tashi da shauk'in juna Aliyu ko kad'an bayason jirgawa daga gareta 
Sai dai zuciyan Nadeeya na mak'ale da tunanin k'anwarta Ruk'ayyah , koya daren nata yakasance da Kamal Alqasim d'in? Yadda take hango tsanansa a idanun Ruky tasan da wuya abnd take tsammani ya shiga tsakaninsu ta dad'in rai , harta d'aga waya domin takira saita ji wayan akashe hakan yasa ta hak'ura da kira tana ma 'yar uwan nata fatan Allah yabata dangana da wannan aure yakumasa Kamal din ya riketa da amana 
Sati d'aya dayin auren su Ruk'ayya kenan acikin kwanakin sosai Kamal ke anfani da karfin iko da izzarsa yana yadda yaso da gangar jikinta , domin zuciyar Rukyn dai cike yake tab da tsanan sa ta yadda bataji zata iya sonsa domin akwanaki bakwai kawai datayi tareda Kamal zata iya irga saunawa taga yayi sallah , inma zaiyin kana ganin yanayin sallan kasan baitsaya ya karanci addini yadda yakamata ba , harkar holewan rayuwansa kawai yasa agaba, shine chart da mata kala-kala da matan banzan sa , 'yan uwansa dama nata sunata zuwa ganin gd duk wanda yazo yana mata fatan samun zaman lfy tareda yimata KWAD'AYIN zama nahar abada acikin wannan gd wanda dayawan mutane ke kiransa da aljannar duniya domin tsaruwansa
Sab'anin Ruky dake cikinsa tanaji zuciyanta cikeda kunci da tsanan gd tareda mamallakinsa, domin ita aganinta ta rayu da masoyinta Ahmad koda a d'aki d'aya ne mara yalwa da kyau yafimata wannan rayuwan datakeyi da Kamal cikin kuncin zuciya tareda k'yamatar halayensa, rashin tsaida addininsa yafi mata komi ciwo 
Sam bashida lokacin rarrashinta inzata kwana tana kukane badamuwansa bace , duk lokacin dazai kwanta da ita zaiyi yadda yasone da ita cikin kwarewansa tareda tirsasata yimasa yadda yakeso shima, ya maidata tamkar wata engine da duk lokacin dayaso zaihau Yayi abnd yaga dama

Wani uban tsaki Ruk'ayyah taja tana fad'in "Wlh Zee karkija na miki zagin rashin mutunci , wani amarci ni banma sanshi ba yanzu dama zaku iya kawoni gdn mak'iyina kubarni har tsawan kwanaki baku waiwayoni ba Zee ? "
Ruky tak'are mgn muryan na rawa da alamun mgn tundaga k'asan zuciyanta yafito, hakan yasa Zainab zama serious tana fad'in "Sorry qawata wlh kina ranmu jiya Aysha tazo gdn mu harmunyi niyyan zuwa saimuka kira wayanki akashe , umman mu tace mu hakura kada muje mutakuraku ,Ruky kinsan yanzu kinzama babbar mace kinshiga gdn girma irin wanda ba any time ne zaka kwaso k'afa kazoba , especially at dis time da boss d'in yake angonci so kigafarcemu Ruky "
Fashema Zee kawai da kuka Ruky tayi tana fad'in"Zee bazaki gane bane bakisan halinda zuciyata ke cikiba, Zee kamal bai dace niba duk halayyansa da ake fad'i wlh sunfi haka muni nidai kawai kuzo ko hira mukayi naji sanyi araina plxx"
"Karki damu qawata zanyi tafiya gobe dasu Abba zuwa Lagos , dazaran mun dawo zaki ganni amma yanzu ki kira Aysha tasan kin kunna waya, kiyita hakury Ruky ki rungumi aurenki amatsayin kaddara kisauke nauyin mujinki kidinga masa addua ne idn kinganshi cikin mugun dabi'a nasan me kikeji aranki but kiyi hakury kiyi hakury
"
Zee takare mgn tana tausayin qawarta sosai aranta , tarasa meyasa KWAD'AYIN WASU IYAYEN
kejama yaransu shiga halin kunci na rayuwa a gdn aure , gadai abnd yafaru da Ruky ankawota fantameman gdn ga arzikin ga komi amma takasa samun farin ciki bare natsuwan zuciya , tayi imani dasun barta ta auri masoyinta da kesonta da zuciya d'aya da yanzu tana cikin farin cikine mara musaltuwa
"Shikenan Zee Zubair ngd Allah yadawo daku lfy kigaida umma "
Mgn Ruky ne yakatse Zeee daga zancen zucin datakeyi tama manta tana rikeda wayane , sallama sukayi Ruky tayi kiran Aysha byn tsokana irin nasu na aminan juna suka gaisa byn tagama da Aysha saitayi kiran yayarta Nadeeya 
Yanayin da sukai waya da Nadeeya ya tabbatar ma Ruky da cewa yayan nata ita tana enjoying amarcinta da Aliyun tane cikeda farin ciki 
Sab'anin ita da sam takasa samun farin ciki domin tayi ma kamal wani mugun tsanane 
Byn tagama da Nadeeya saita kira umma suka gaisa tana sake jaddada mata tabi mijinta kada tasake yakawo karan taimasa wani mugun hali , tana dai ganin yadda kowa ke santin irin daulan data shiga to yadage dayi masa duk abnd yakeso koya dinga sakin mata manyan kudi su samu suma, abnd umma keta gayawa Ruky kenan 
Tana amsa mata dato kawai yayinda kasan zuciyanta ke mata tsananin ciwo , wato ma ita umma batadamu tasan wani irin hali take ciki ba itakawai burinta tayima kamal biyayya ita tadauwama cikin kunci duniya naci gaba da ganin tana cikin daula alhali ita tana cikin kuncin zuciya da rashin samun farin ciki
Abnd Ruky keta ayyanawa aranta kenan, koda takira Abba shima gaisawa kawaisukayi ta kashe kiran 
Kwanaki goma kenan dayin aurensu yau kamal ya umurceta data shirya zai kaita gurin mummy d'in sa Shiryawa tayi ta sakko down stair's tana jiran sakkowanshi rigada skat tasaka na wani atamfar super dinkin yadace da atamfar sosan gske , duk da cewa tayi rama sosai amma hakan bai hanata yin mugun kyau ba mayafin datayi anfani dashi babbane saita fito cikakkiyar matar aure me kamala, cikin shigan k'ananan kaya daya saba dasu ya sakko idanunsa akanta tayi masa mugun kyau duk da cewa fuskanta ahad'e yake , tunda ya aureta bai taba ganin dariyanta ba kullum sabon kiyayyansa yake hangowa tun abun baya damunsa harya farajin wani irin masifan kishi domin yasan duk akan yaron datakeso ne aka rabasu ya aure ta shiya janyo masa tsana me zafi , amma ya d'auka idn tashigo taga irin daulan daya shirya mata zata risina , baisan cewa Rukayya bata cikin mata da abn duniya kesaurin saye zuciyansu ba saida yaga har kawo yanzu yaga bata risina da irin tsanan datake masa ba , saiya sake tabbatar ma kansa da cewa iyayenta ne
kaawai sune makwad'aitan ba itaba 
Yana gaba tana binsa abaya har suka fito karo nafarko data fara fitowa katon harabar compound d'in tun bayan kawota , sama-sama take k'arewa gurare da dama kallo tabbas gd ne na alfarma tashigo cikin sa sai dai daga megidan har gdn basune abnd zuciyanta ke kallo ba 
Tafiyan mintina ashirin ya kawosu anguwan su Kamal d'in ,tunda ya Parker ta fito ma'aikata keta kwasan gaisuwa cikin sakin fuska take amsasu , wannan karon ma tana biye dashi har babban main parlor na gdn wanda tsit yake babu motsin kowa 
Anan taja burki zata zauna yayi mata nuni da up stair's hakan yasata binsa suka haura sama , a parlor suka tadda mumy d'in da wasu qawayen ta mata biyu sunyi ale ale ana kwasan hira gabansu cike yake da kayan cima na alfarma
Da hanzari ya isa yayi hugging mumy ta shafa kansa tana masa barka da zuwa , yayinda Ruk'ayya ta zuba tafara gaida qawayen mumy kafin takarisa kuda mumy ta zuba tana gaidata 
Cikin sakin fuska tagaidata kafin tasamu guri tazauna , qawar mumy guda nata yaba nutsuwa da kyawunta , Hajiya Malliya ce kawai keta jifan Ruk'ayya da wani irin kallo me cikeda rainin arziki 
Aysha D'ansabo ce

_Tareda_ _Alk'alamin_ 
Ayshat D'ansabo Lemu 
12
Yini guda tayi a gdn su Kamal d'in sai dai sam babu wata sakewa datasamu , sbd momy bata nuna mata sakin fuska da kulawan dazataji ajikinta lallai tana murna da shigowanta rayuwan d'an nata ba , abnd yasake dugunzuma zuciyan Ruk'ayya tana tunanin wani irin rayuwa zatayi kenan acikin familyn su Kamal ga dukkan alamu momy tana cikin sahun matan masu arziki da sukafi sha'awan had'a zuriya da mutane irin su , sai gashi ita k'addara da KWAD'AYIN iyayenta ya shigo da ita cikin su 
Sai dare yazo d'aukan ta suka koma gdn,tana shiga ciki sama ta haura kaitsaye zuwa bedroom d'inta , wanka tayi tafito d'aure da alwala tai shafa'i da wuturi rigan bacci tasaka masu kaury tahaye bisa bed domin batajin yinwa bare tanemi komi 
Chart takeyi da frnds d'in ta Zee da Aysha suna sake kwantar mata da hankali domin bata iya boye musu damuwanta , sunriga sun zame mata aminan kwarai dake bata shawaran arziki akan damuwanta ,sam bataji shigowansa ba illah jikawai tayi anfisge wayan hannunta tareda jifa dashi can karshen gadon, kiris yarage wayan tayi k'asa ta tarwatse
Baijira komiba ya d'auketa zuwa bedroom d'insa , kobai mata mgn ba tasan kwanan zancen hakan yasa hawaye suka fara wanke fuskanta na bak'in ciki da tsanan sa shikenan ita bazata samu irin soyayya da tarairaya daga mijin aureba sai dai duk sanda yaga dama zaiyi kwanciyan aure da ita yanuna mata gadara yayi yadda yaso , tun tanamasa gardama taga ita Kecin wuya har tazabi bada kai cikin lumana , wassanni yafarayi da ita yadda yakeso tareda bata umurnin maida masa martani kaman yadda yake buk'ata , sosai yake bida ita cikeda kwarewa gaba d'aya ya gama rud'a lissafin Ruky, nidai bansake jin d'uriyan komiba domin cikin sauri na rufo musu kofar ina zare idanu domin lamarin azimun ne lol
Bayan wata d'aya 
Ruk'ayya ce durkushe acikin toilet d'in d'akin Kamal tana kwara amai tamkar zata amayar da kayan cikinta, tayi biji-biji tafita hayyacinta , gogan nadaga bakin kofar toilet d'in ya hard'e hannunsa akirji tareda tsura mata idanunsa , harta gama ta wanke fuskanta da bakin tazo tarab'e ta gefensa ta fice daga d'akin baki d'aya , kafin yataka yakoma bakin bed d'in yazauna yana dafe kansa tareda tunanin mekuma kedamunta ? Wani firgicine ya ziyarci ransa alokacin da zuciyansa yaraya masa kardai Ruky ciki tasamu tun baigama lale amarcinsa ba
Koda takoma d'akinta kwanciya tayi tareda sakin marayan kuka tana addu'a Allah yasa ba cikine da itaba , domin bata fatan had'a zuriya da Kamal Alqasim sosai hankalinta yake atashe 
Turo kofa da shigowansa ne yasata sake rintse idanunta , tareda kai hannu ta toshe hancinta domin bata son jin qamshinsa ko kad'an , abakin gadon ya zauna tareda had'e face tamkar baitab'a sanin miye dariya ba 
Kafin cikin dakiya yayi mgn yana fad'in "keh! Tashi zaune mgn zamuyi "
Ko motsi Ruky batayiba hakan yasashi fisgota da karfi ta fad'o kirjinsa , wani kuka tasaki tana sa hannu bisa hancinta sbd yadda kanta kesarawa turarensa na hawa bisa kanta , zuciyanta ne yashiga hautsinawa wani aman nataso mata da kyar tayi mgn 
"Kamal kasakeni don Allah kafita bani k'aunar ganinka bare jin qamshinka "
Ruky tayi mgn tana kwace jikinta tasake komawa ta kwanta , binta da kallo yayi yatashi yabar d'akin waya yayi yakira family Doctor d'insu yasanar dashi address na gdn sa , tareda bashi lokaci kalilan yazo ya duba masa meke damun Ruk'ayya ,ba'a rufa cikakkun 40minutes ba Dr
Rayyan yazo gdn afalon k'asa yai masauki Kamal d'in ne suka sakko tareda Ruky wacce tasanya hijab asaman kayan jikinta , duk wasu tambayoyi daya kama Dr
Rayyan yai mata yayi takuma bashi amsa daga karshe ya buk'aci fitsari tareda jan jininta domin yin gwaji
Awanni biyu da barinsa gdn yakira wayan Kamal tareda masa albishir d'in cewa matarsa nad'auke da ciki na tsawan sati hud'u,albishir din daya b'ata ran kamal , ciki ko gama cin amarcinsa baiyi ba kai bazaima yiwu ba dole acire cikin nan kotanaso ko bataso abnd yaketa ayyanawa azuciyansa kenan lokacin daya kashe wayansa
D'akin ta ya nufa yasameta akwance har lokacin domin batajin k'arfin jikinta sam ,zama yayi abakin gadon yana fad'in 
"Keh! Tashi maza hospital zamu acire cikin jikinki domin bana buk'atansa, bangama more rayuwata ba kawai sai kiyi ciki ohh dama shiyasa kika fara wannan k'azantan ? To ba agd naba ciki ayanzu ban shirya fara jinkukan baby a gd na ba oya kiyi maza kisameni amota , banson b'ata lokaci "
Yak'are mgn yana ficewa daga d'akin cikeda b'acin rai , Ruk'ayya ce tasaki kuka jikinta babu inda baya rawa, cire ciki kuma itakam tana tsoro tabbas batason cikin itama domin Kamal baidace dazama uba ba, inkuma harya zama d'in to bazai zama uba nagary da yaransa zasuyi alfahary da kasancewansa uba agaresu ba mutumin dako addininsa bai tsaida ba duniya da holewan rayuwa kawai yasa agabansa
Bazata iya yadda ta zubda ciki ba haka kawai ,sosai hankalinta yatashi tadinga kuka tama manta cewa yanacan yana jiranta sbd tashin hankalin datake ciki , wata irin rayuwace wannan? tayi imani da masoyinta ta aura dayanzu suna cikin farin ciki dasamun wannan cikin , sai gashi shi kamal yana fad'in acire cikin sbd dama babu soyayyan gsky azuciyansa jikinta kawai yakeso , sosai zuciyanta ke tsananin kuna da zafi bugo kofan da yayi da karfi ne yasa ta saurin d'ago da fuskan ta tana dubansa, 
Baijira komiba kawai jitayi ya fincikota hijab d'inta dake bisa gadon ya zura mata , tareda d'aukan ta cak yafice da ita ko ajikinsa baidamu da yadda ma'aikatan gdn kebinsu da kallo ba ya sanyata amota suka bar gdn 
Suna bisa hanya yakira Dr
Rayyan cewa gashinan zuwa da Rukyn , koda suka isa hannunta yaja har office d'in Dr
Rayyan d'in cikin rawan jiki Dr
Rayyan ya tarbesu yana mik'awa Kamal hannu suyi musabaha , tareda duban Ruk'ayyah wacce tai k'asa da kanta hawaye na zuba yana fad'in
"Ranki shidad'e kiyi hakury bawani matsala bace magani kawai zan baki cikin yafita , bleeding ne kawai tunda cikin bawai yayi kwari bane so calm down karki samu damuwa"
Ruk'ayyah ta d'ago fuska ta dubeshi haushin sa yakamata , wato sudai mutane basuda tsoran Allah indai me kud'i yazoda buk'atarsa ko marar kyau ne rawan jiki ake ayi masa abnd yakeso 
Magani yabata tasha tareda dasa ta kwanta awani gado dake cikin office d'in , mintuna da basu shige ashirin ba Ruk'ayyah tafara tsintan kanta cikin wani yanayi , cikinta na kullewa maranta nawani irin d'aurewa addu'a kawai take da salati asarari wanda ya janyo hankalin Kamal dake zaune ya d'aura kafa d'aya kan d'aya yana danna wayansa batareda da wani damuwa afuskan sa ba, wani irin d'umi taji a k'asanta hakan yasa tasaki wani sabon kukan , Dr
Rayyan ne ya iso gareta yana duba yanayin datake ciki 
Kamal ne ya mike yayi tafiyar sa yana shaidawa Dr
Rayyan zai dawo nan da awanni biyu ya d'auke ta , bai taka koda bakin gadon datake ba bare yayi mata sannu yayi ficewarsa abnd ya tab'a zuciyan Dr
Rayyan haryaji tausayin Ruk'ayyah ya kama zuciyansa, ko bai tambayaba yasan kamal auren sha'awa kawai yayi da yarinyar don tana da kyau ,sosai Allah yataimaki Ruk'ayyah komi yazoda sauki , sbd rashin kwarin jikinta yasa Dr
Rayyan samata drip , 
Koda kamal ya dawo angama komi tana zaune jingine da bed , idanunta sun kumbura sbd kukan datasha fuskanta yayi fayau , sosai tarame har ana ganin k'ashin wuyanta muraran 
Kallo d'aya yai mata yaji dan tausayinta yakamashi hakan yasa ya isa gabanta yana fad'in "Hey! Babe kiyi sorry ba angama komi cikin yafita ba , kema kanki kinyi k'arama da haihuwa gara kibari ingama More rayuwata ehem"
Kauda kai Ruky tayi tanaji sabhin hawayen takaicin suna sake wanke fuskanta , tareda jin sabon tsanansa haka suka tattara suka bar asibitin byn ya amshi magungunan da aka bata 
Koda suka isa gd yana parking ta fice abinta zuwa cikin gdn kai tsaye sama ta haura , bathroom tayi kaitsaye domin yin wanka kozataji k'arfin jikinta , sosai tayi wanka da ruwa mezafin gakse ta kintsa kanta ta fito 
Abakin gadon ta tasameshi yana waya ga ledan magungunan ta ya aje kusa dashi , d'auke kai tayi tamkar batasan dashi adakinba ta nufi wardrop ta fiddo kaya marasa nauyi tasaka 
Aje wayan yayi byn ya kammala yana bin duk wani motsinta da kallo , harta gama tazo zata fice tabar masa d'akin ko kad'an batama son ganin inuwarsa a inda take 
Harta kama handle kofan zata fice ya kira sunanta "Ruk'ayyah! " karo nafarko dataji ya fad'i hakan , cak ta tsaya batareda tajiyo ba hakan yasashi isa gareta 
"Keh! Wai me kika d'auki kanki ne iyye? to bari kiji matuk'ar zakiyi ciki nikuma sainasa anzubdashi domin ban shirya haihuwa ayanzu ba , abu d'aya zai ceceki shine daga yanzu zanfara baki maganin hana d'aukan ciki zaki farasha lokacin dazan kwanta dake inkuma bakisha ba kanki, ciki na bayyana zansa acireshi kaman yadda aka cire wannan "
Yakare mgn yana janyeta tareda ficewa abnsa , Ruk'ayyah anan ta durkushe tasaki sabon kuka na tausayin kanta , tunda kamal yashigo rayuwanta tayi sallama da farin ciki wannan shine rayuwan da IYAYEN ta suka zabi tayi na rashin 'yanci sbd KWAD'AYIN su 
Gata cikin k'aton gd na alfarma gakomi najin dadin rayuwa amma tarasa soyayya na gsky , tarasa farin ciki irin wacce kowace mace keda burin samu agdn auren ta , tarasa kwanciyan hankali sosai takeji zuciyanta nawani irin zafi da k'una
Yinin ranan Ruk'ayyah takareshine ad'aki cikin bak'in ciki , sai dai masuyi mata hidima sukawo mata komi nan d'akin ta kama daga abnci zuwa duk abnd zata buk'ata 
Ruwan tea kawai take iya sawa acikin ta yadda aka aje abnci haka zasuzo su kwashe bataci ba , shiko gogan baima da tym d'in rarrashinta
Awashegarin ranan ne kuma kamal ya d'auke ta sukaje aka mata passport , domin nema mata Visa yanaso tai masa rakiya zuwa Paris
Cikin kwanaki uku visa d'in ya fito ana gobe zasu tafi ya d'auke ta yakaita gdn su domin tayi musu sallama
Awaje ya sauketa tashige batareda tunanin ya shiga yagaisa da ummanta ba , ya juya abnsa itakuma ta shige gdn da gudu domin tayi kewan ganin ummansu 
Sallama tadingayi da k'arfi tundaga tsakar gd ummah da bak'uwar datayi ne suka had'a baki wajen fad'in"Kaman muryan Ruk'ayyah ko "
Basu ida rufe bakiba ko tashigo d'akin ta rungume ummah tareda sakin kuka , itadai babah hajjo qawar ummah sakin baki tayi tana ganin ikon Allah

"Lfy miye hakan kuma ? Daga zuwa zaki rungumeni kisaki kuka Ruk'ayyatu "
Ummah tayi mgn tana rabata da jikinta tareda k'arewa Ruky kallo ,tana mamakin yadda tasake lalacewa tarame sai fatan jikinta kawai daya nuna alamun hutu yai fresh
"Maraba da Auta duk kewan umman ce yahanaki ganin kowa anshigo anata kukan shagwab'a "
Babah Hajjo tayi mgn tana ma Ruk'ayya kallon kurillah ,sai alokacin Ruky takula da babah Hajjo ta wadata fuskanta da murmushi tana fad'in
"Wayyo babah Hajjo yi hakury ina yini "
Ruky tagaidata tana mkewa ta nufi bedroom d'in umman yayinda babah Hajjo ke fad'in 
"Lfy lau auta ya Amarci dafatan komi lfy naga duk kin sake zubewa ne, aita hakury zaman aure sai da hakury kidaina saka damuwa aranki komi ahankali ake sabo dashi "
Daga can bedroom d'in da Ruky ke jiyo mgn babah ta amsa mata da "Toh babah insha Allah ngd "
Bata wani jimaba tayi sallama da ummah da Ruky ta tafi, sai dai zuciyanta tab yake da mamakin yadda taga Ruky tayi tsammanin yadda suka kaita gdn hutu ganin farko dazata mata taganta shar tayi kiba , sai gashi kallo d'aya zaka ma Ruky kasan da mgn ko irin cikan d'aki da amare keyi bataga wannan ba 
Ummah ce ta sanya kai cikin bedroom d'in nata , Ruk'ayya tayi d'ai-d'ai akwance tana danna wayanta , chart take da Zee tana sanar mata tafiyan da zasuyi da Kamal d'in 
"Keh! Tashi maza kizauna muyi mgn wannan raman na lfy ne ? Meke damunki ? Kada kicemin haryanzu baki fitar da Ahmad aranki kin rungumi mijinki ba "
Ummah tayi mgn tana zama abakin bed d'in , yayin da Ruky ta tashi tazauna tana aje wayan hannunta , duban ummah tayi tana kokaryn fara share hawayen dasuka fara wanke mata fuska umman ce tasake mgn akaro na biyu tana fad'in
"Ina jinki wannan raman namiye ne keko irin cikar d'akin nan bakiyiba yadda Nadeeya tayi shar abn sha'awa da ita amma ke dubeki yadda kika sake lalacewa kaman ba gdn girma aka kaikiba , sbd kinsama zuciyanki bak'in hali ko "
    1
Takare mgn cikeda takaici tamkar takai hannu ta make Ruk'ayya haka takeyi , wannan ma ai abn kunya ne aga Ruky haka yadda take alfahary takaita gdn girma da wadata
    1
"Ummah bakisan irin zaman danake da Kamal bane , ummah nasha gaya muku wlh Kamal bai dace dani ba , Kamal bani yakeso ba ummah jikina kawai yakeso wlh umm
"
    2
Tsawan da ummah tadaka matane yahanata karisa abnd take niyyan karisawa, umman na fad'in
"Yimin shiru shegiyan yarinya me shegen taurin kan tsiya , arziki kullum yana binki kina kauda kai , bayasonki zai aureki ne ? Kawai kin d'auki karan tsana kinsa masa to bari kiji garama ki kwantar da hankalinki kici daulan dake gabanki Ahmad dake kulafuci akansa yai miki nisa , satin daya wuce akayi bikinsa da yarinyar yayan me waina uwarsa , don haka bansan jin kowani korafi akan Kamal , ki kwantar da hankali kiyi biyayya kowa namun murna kinsamu shiga cikin arziki wanda sai mace me sa'a kesamun auren yaran attajirai irinsu kamal , amma ke kinsamesa kullum cikin kushesa kike kina fad'in bakuda ce ba "
    1
Tunda ummah tafara mgn Ruky ke kuka jin mgn auren Ahmad yasake karya zuciyanta tabbas yayi mata nisa , wani zafi taji zuciyanta yasake d'auka itakam batasan ta yadda zataso Kamal ba ta tsanesa ta tsani halayyan sa kakaf

"

    1

Koda tasanar da Nadeeya cikin hanzarinta ta sanya mayafi akanta ta nufi falon Abba Mahmud , zama tayi ak'asa nesa dashi kad'an tana fad'in "Abba gani"
Ya amsa da fad'in "Ina sauraranki Nadeeya sanar dani miye matsalan daya kawoki? "

"Subhanallah a'uxubillah! Sune kalmomin da Abba ke fad'i cikeda kad'uwa , sosai hankalinsa yayi masifan tashi wannan babban al'amarine me matuk'ar muni ai "

kan jefa yaransu cikin halaka, ni tun farko duka auren yaran nan bai kwantamin araiba "

dake zama silar cutar da rayuwan yaransu wanda gashi ta tsinta kanta aciki KWAD'AYIN iyayensu yaja mata zama bazawara , dawani ido zata kalli mutanan gari aure wata 2 har ansakota tazama bazawara

    2

Haka rayuwansu yakasance har tsayin kwanaki 7, aranan ne kuma sabuwar karuwansa zakiyyah ta diro k'asar , wani hotel d'in yakama mata nadaban haka zai fita tunsafe yabar Ruky sai dai akawo mata abnci taci idn tagaji dazaman d'akin takan fito haraban hotel d'in taita kallon yadda mutane ke gudanar da rayuwansu 
Sai dare ya raba yake dawowa sukwana tare, sai da zakiyyah tayi 5 day's suna zagaye guraren hutawa , suna hole rayuwansu kafin tawuce Dubai , kwanaki biyu da tafiyanta yafara musu shirin dawowa 9ja , Ruky tayi kyau tayi fresh naban mamaki inka d'auke raman dake wuyanta har lokacin ,koda wasa baitaba tambayannta ko tana sha'awan gaisawa da iyayenta da frnd's d'in taba , saidai taji yana waya danashi iyayen haryakan bata sugaisa da mommy d'insa , ana gobe zasu dawo ne yafita da ita domin yin siyayya sosai tazage takwashi kaya wanda yawanci turaruka ne 'yan gske domin Sunzo mak'ara mgn ne aharkan designer's na perfume's , sai dogayen riguna da had'addun English wear's data siyawa Nadeeya ko kad'an batasan wainan da ake toywa a 9ja narabuwan Aliyu da ya Nadeeyan ba ,

Karfe 10am Abba Mahmud ne da Abban su Nadeeya zaune afalon Abban su Nadeeya d'in , byn Abban Nadeeya sun gama gaisawa da yayan nashi ne ya d'ora da tambayan sa 
"Dafatan dai lfy yaya mamuda ? "
"Lfy ba lfy ba Turaki , domin ashekaran jiya Nadeeya tazo gd na dawata muhimmiyan matsala wacce duk yarinya tagari me ilimin addini dole ta k'yamaci lamarin da tazomin dashi "
Ahankali ya zayyane ma qanin nasa abnd yafaru sai dai bai rigada ya sanar masa da mgn sakiba domin yanaso yaga iya gudun ruwansa
    1

"To kaga illan KWAD'AYI da rashin bincike da biyema son zuciya ko Turaki , babu abnd ban sanarma ba akan ka tsaurara bincike yawancin yaran masu arzikin nan namu bawani mutunci ne dasuba , kaida Habeeba kukai kunnin uwar shegu kuna ganin tamkar ba'ason su dasu shiga gdn arzikine , yanzu wagari ya waya ? "To Ameen Turaki addua zakai ta mata domin ka aikatamata son zuciya , karabata da nagartaccen yaro dasuka dae da juna kabata wanda bataso kayi kuskure Turaki "
Abba Mahmud yayi mgn yana tuno lokacin da Ruk'ayya ke kuka tana masa magiyan kada a aurama kamal ita basu dace da juna , amma ina KWAD'AYI ya rufe idanun iyayenta 
Koda lbryn sakin Nadeeya yaje kunnin ummah kuka tasama Abban nasu tana tsinewa Aliyu harda jamasa Allah ya isa , take nadama da danasani suka cika zuciyanta tareda tsoran surutun da mutane zasuyi musu , tasani wasuma harda shewa zasuyi wani bacin rai ne yasake lullub'e zuciyan ta , saukin ta guda hukuncin da Abba mahmud d'in ya yanke nazaman Nadeeya a gdn sa yayi mata dadi matuk'ar gaske
A bangaren Ruky kuwa gdn su kamal ta yini , anan tasake ganin Salmah sai alokacin kuma tasan dangantakan dake tsakanin ta da kamal ashe cousine d'insane yayar mommy ce ta haifeta 
Agabanta Salmah ta rugo ta rungume Kamal tareda had'e bakunan su guri guda , shikuma yabiye mata sun jima manne da juna batareda kunyan idon Ruky ba wacce tsananin tsanan Kamal da k'yamar halayen 'yan matan zamani da suka maida kansu tamkar jakuna yacika zuciyanta 
K'aran takalman momy dake sakkowa daga upstairs yasasu sakin juna , Salmah ta sanya idanunta cikin na Ruky tana jifanta da harara ta haura sama abnta , wani k'aramin tsaki Ruky tasaki batare dakowa yasan tayiba , ta shiga gaida momy cikeda girmamawa ita kuma ta amsa da sakin fuska babu laifi , tana musu barka da dawowa
K'aton kwali me d'auke da had'addun turaruka Ruky ta dire agaban momy , matsayin tsaraban datai mata byn sa akwai wasu materials masu azaban kyau kala uku , sosai tsaraban akayi sa'a ya burge momy harta fad'ad'a murmushinta tanama Ruky godia 
Shima dady turaruka taimasa tsaraba masu matuk'ar tsada , basu bar gdn ba sai la'asar suna kan hanyane ta dubesa tana fad'in
"Inason zuwa gdn sistr na inba damuwa tunda karaboni da gd ban tab'a zuwaba "
Tak'are mgn tana d'auke kai ganin yadda yake mata wani kallo, murmushin gefan baki yasaki yana mamaki Rukyn yadda take masa mgn adake abn ta 
"Bazaki ba tunda baki rok'a alfarma tun a gd ba , kuma ni kinga ba driver dinki ba bare kibani umurni kai tsaye , saiki bari gobe inhad'aki da driver kufita kije har can gdn old man d'in naku gaba d'aya , ammafa idn kibani had'in kai namoreki da kyau kin kumayi min abnd nake so , ina buk'atan ki tunda muka dawo ban moreki ba sai wasu keta moran miki miji "
    1
Yayi mgn ko ajikinsa tamkar ya fad'i abn arziki , sam Kamal ta kula baida ilimi baimasan darajan aure ba to mutumin da addininsa ma bai tsayar ba baya sallah saiya ga dama , bare age batun wasu sanin hakkokin dasuka rataya awuyansa 
Batasake tankashi ba har suka isa gd , yana parking ta fice abnta kai tsaye sama ta haura zuwa room d'inta , wayan ta taciro dake silent tana kokarin kiran ya Nadeeya akaro na kusan bakwai kenan tanajin wayan arufe 
Yanzuma still arufen yake hakan yasata kiran ummah tasanar mata sundawo tareda albishir d'in zuwanta gobe , bugu biyu ummah ta d'auka suka gaisa jin muryan umma da alamun damuwa yasa Ruk'ayyah tambayan
"Ummah ta lfy naji muryanki yayi sanyi haka? "
"Lfy lau auta kedai kuna zaune lfy ko babu dai wani matsala tsakanin ki da Kamal d'in ko ? "

"Lfy lau ummah sai dai nazo goben, amma meyasamu wayan ya Nadeeya? inata kira ince mata nadawo naji arufe "
"Lfy lau Ruky inaga dai kota rufe wayan ne kawai batason damu sai dai kinzo goben "
Ummah takare mgn tana yanke wayan abnd yasake jefa zuciyan Ruky cikin zargin lallai akwai wani abu da ummah ke boye mata , hakanan taji hankalinta yayi gd kaman ta rufe ido taga goben tayi haka tadingaji 
Aiko washegary 10am harta gama shiri tsaf ta had'a tsarabansu guri guda awani madaidaicin jaka me kyau , Kamal ya fita tun 9am hakan yasata fita kai tsaye haraban adana motoci tuni driver ya fidda motar dazasu fita aciki 
Ruk'ayyah gdn su tanufa kai tsaye sbd tasake gwada line Nadeeya amma akashe , Abba na shirin fita kasuwa kenan tayi sallama cikeda murna ta karisa gareshi ta rungumeshi 
Yana dariya yake fad'in "oyoyo ga auta saukan yaushe ? "
"Shekaran jiya Abba "
Ruky tabashi amsa suna komawa zuwa d'akin Abba d'in , gaidashi tayi yana tambayanta lfy ta sanar masa lfyn su lau , ummah ce tashigo tana fad'in 
"Auta sammako aka doko haka kai masha Allah kinko ga yadda kikai kyau , sai dai wannan rama naki taki tafiya Rukayyatu wai meke damunki ne ? "
"Babu komi Abba "
Ruk'ayyah ta bata amsa Abba ya mike zai fita suka masa adawo lfy ya tafi su kuma suka koma dakin ummah
"Ummah waime yasamu wayan ya Nadeeya ne ? Har yaufa na kira amma ansa guda ake bani akashe"
Ruky tayi mgn tana zama bisa kujera byn ta ake mayafi da hand bag d'in ta , umma da itama ta zauna ta amsa mata da fad'in
"Auta Nadeeya tana gdn Abba Mahmud , kwanaki biyu kenan da mutuwan aurenta "
"Hasbunallahu wani'imalwakil! "
Shine abnd Ruky ta furta da karfi tana me dafe kirji tareda zaro ido waje, Aliyu yasaki ya Nadeeya? Cikin tsantsan al'ajabi take fad'in
"Ummah meyafaru haka yanzu duka da bikinmu wata 2 nefa , ummah kinga illan irin wannan aurenko , dukkaninsu bamu sukeso jikinmu sukeso "
Ruky tayi mgn hawaye nabiyo fuskanta , sosai taji b'acin rai na lullub'e zuciyanta tausayin yayarta yakamata, mgn ummah ne ya yakatse tunaninta tana fad'in
"Ruk'ayyah hakika munbi son zuciya duk da cewa komi rubutacce ne , amma wani abn harda laifin mu da bamu biyema KWAD'AYIN abn duniya ba kila da hakan baikasance ba , mune silan kore mata samarinta masu mutunci da nagarta nayi nadama auta "
Ummah tayi mgn asanyaye domin tana jin ciwon halin da Nadeeya ta tsinci kanta na zawarci da karancin shekaru, hakika dole abn akwai ciwo acikinsa 
"Ummah bari kigani inkira driver muje can gdn Abba Mahmud d'in , nakosa inganta bazan iya sukuni ba anan zan dawo kafin inkoma can gdn "
"To auta kedai babu wani matsala ko ? "
Ummah tajefama Ruky tambayan tana tsareta da ido , Ruky na kok'arin kiran driver take bata amsa da fad'in 
"Ummah idn nace miki babu matsala azamana da Kamal nayi k'arya, ummah ke uwace babu anfanin inboye miki damuwata , wlh ummah tunda nashiga gdn Kamal ban tab'a farin cikin kasancewa acikiba , kamal baidace dani ba ummah, baya sallah sam bai tsaida addini ba , ga neman mata ummah wanda saima abnd yakaru , bashida lokacina sai zai biya buk'atarsa dazaran yagama nida banza duk d'ayane ,ummah wlh natsaneshi na tsani halayyarsa , mahaifiyansa kanta bawani sona takeba , Kamal jikina yakeso bani ba ummah, taya zanso sa har inyi sha'awan inkare rayuwan aurena da fasik'i manemin mata wanda baisan darajan addininsaba ummah? Bazan tab'a son kamal ba matuk'ar ina gdn sa babu yadda za'ai inkasa zama cikin kuncin zuciya da damuwa , tarin dukiya da zama ababban gd bashi ke nuna mace tayi sa'an aureba ummah , farin ciki da kwanciyan hankali tareda zama da mutumin dayasan darajanka da addininsa yafi komi "
Ruky tak'are mgn tanajin zafi azuciyanta , yayinda jikin ummah yai mugun sanyi mgn Ruky sosai ya ratsata , tabbas KWAD'AYIN su yasa sun shiga hakkinta sun rabata da nagartaccen yaro irin Ahmad , sai gashi shima ayanzu hanya ta bud'emai sosai yake tasamun cigaban rayuwa da wadata, cikin sanyin murya take fad'in
"Ruk'ayyatu kiyi hakury kici gaba da hakury da zama dashi , domin bazamuyi fata kudawo kuzauna mana amatsayin zawarawa ba, kita masa addua ne Allah ya shiryar dashi , ki danne zuciya kidinga yimasa tunatarwa akan muhimmancin tsaida addini , idn darabo saikiga yana gyarawa ""Shikenan ummah Allah yabani iko"

Ruky ta fad'i tana tashi tareda yafa mayafinta, domin driver d'in harya dawo kaman yadda ta buk'ata, saita dawo taima umman tana ficewa byn ta d'auki hand bag d'inta 
Tundaga tsakar gd Ruky ke kwala sallama da kiran "Ya Nadee! Ya Nadee! "
Lokacin Nadeeya na kwance a bedroom d'in ummah Mariya,a hankali tajiyo murya kaman na Ruky hakan yasata fitowa da sauri , afalo sukaci karo da Ruky tana faman sallama taji shiru dayake ummah mariyan ta fita saitabar Nadeeya ita kadai 
Rungume juna sukayi sosai Nadeeya na fad'in "Mutanan Paris kaga autan ummah dai yadda kika sake wani fresh , sai dai kinrame dayawa Ruky "Nadeeya ta k'are mgn tana shafa wuyan Ruky da k'ashin wuya ya fito muraran, zama sukayi anan falon Ruky na tambayan ina ummah Nadeeya tashaida mata tafuto unguwa nan kusa dasu ana wani cikin sunane taleka musu 
A hankali Nadeeya ta zayyanema Ruky abnd yafaru , da irin zaman da sukai da Aliyu harkawo rabuwan auren nasu takare mgn da fad'in
"Ruky dafarko Aliyu ya nunamin kulawa da gata harnakejin sona yake da gske bawai sha'awata kawai yakeba, ahankali lamura suka fara sauyawa yafara fitomin da asalin kalansa , ni a yadda wata mak'ociyan ummah Mariya data shigo jiya cewa tayi ana rad'e fad'in har luwad'i yake domin yana tareda wani wai Alhaji sarki , kuma bakiga yadda yake jida Aliyu ba , tabbas Nina yarda sbd gashi yafara nunamin halinsu tunda yafara kusantata ta haramtacciyar hanya,"
"To Allah shi kyauta ya Nadee yasa hakan shine mafi alkhairy, nikuma danake cikin nawa jarabawan Allah ya dubeni , wlh ya Nadeeya nakasa samun kwanciyan hankali a gdn Kamal, bansan taya zan amshesa azuciyata ba domin yarasa duk wasu halaye masu kyau dazai iya tank'wara zuciyata ta amsheshi , rashin tsaida ibadan shi yafi komi damuna ya Nadee, uwa uba sam kamal bani yakeso ba illah jikina da kyawun da Allah yaimin kawai yakeso "
Ruky tak'are mgn cikin rawan murya itakad'ai tasan yadda takeyi azuciyanta , Nadeeya ce tadubeta da kulawa tana fad'in 
"Ruky kiyi hakury kicigaba da addua da gaywa Allah komi , shine kawai mafita domin aikin gama ya gama KWAD'AYIN iyayenmu shine silan duk wani bak'in ciki da damuwn da muka samu kanmu aciki"
Haka dai 'yan uwan biyu sukaita tattauna damuwansu , hatta lbryn zubda cikin data samu da kamal yasa ayi Ruky tasanar da Nadee , da yadda yake bata magani don karta d'auki wani cikin duk bata boye mata komiba 
Bata kira driver domin tafiyaba saida tajira dawowan Abba Mahmud suka gaisa, har waje ummah Mariya da Nadeeya suka rakota 
Suka juya Nadeeya na jinjina duk mgn da suka yi da Ruky,tausayinta nasake kamata gadaishi anzo d'aukan ta ak'atuwan mota ta alfarma , wanda duk wanda yaganta ciki zaiyimata hamshakiya wacce tasamu duniya, ba asan zuciya babu kwanciyan hankali aciki ba 
Koda ta biya gdnsu bawani jimawa tayiba driver najiranta , tsaraban ummah dana Abba ta ware musu had'ida na Nadeeya , sai ummah Mariya tacirema turaruka cikin nasu Zee data fito da niyyan zuwa har wajensu , amma bataji zata iya zuwa ayau d'in sai dai tasake saka lokaci 
A hankali labarin mutuwan auren Nadeeya keta zaga dangi , sannu -sannu harya fara zagaye anguwa kankace me kowa lbry ya isa kunnuwansa, masu Allah kyauta nayi masu dariya da Allah shik'ara sune suka fi yawa, ace wansu KWAD'AYIN su ummah ne yajanyo mata dama KWAD'AYIN wasu IYAYEN kankai su yabaro daga k'arshe afad'a kogin nadaman da bata da anfani 
Nadeeya zamanta a gdn ummah Mariya zamane najin fad'i da kwanciyar hankali, babu matsi bare takura sosai duk abnd tanema Abba Mahmud namata shi , sai dai jefi-jefi take fita inya kama sbd Sam bata sha'awan zuwa konan da can 
Ahaka kwanakin iddanta sukaita raguwa , itakuma Ruky haka itama rayuwa kecigaba da gara mata cikin kuncin zuciya da rashin son wanda take zaune dominsa ,
Kamal sam bashida lokacin ta sai randa yake buk'atan kasancewa da ita , idn yafita baya shigowa sai dare tuni Ruky tagama karantan yadda yake mu'amala da mata kala daban , don har agaban ta yasha ansa call na 'yan mata suyita hiran banza sai dai ita tabashi guri , hakan kullum kesake tunzura tsanannsa a zuciyansa , tasha masa mgn cikin lumana akan rashin tsaida addini amma haryau abn baicanza zani ba , sallan asuba sai yaga daman tashi sadda yagama shaman baccinsa sannan zaiyi

_Tareda Alk'alamin_ 
Ayshat D'ansabo lemu
16
Yak'are mgn cikin fusata yayinda Ruk'ayyah ta d'ago idanunta dake tsiyayan hawaye , cikeda tsanansa da matsanancin fushi take fad'in
"Cikin jikina na zab'a kamal amma yakamata kasanar dani manufanka abayyane, domin insamu shaidan kaiwa iyayena , suka sakamakon KWAD'AYIN su daya jefani cikin wannan masifan danake ciki "
Kukane yaci k'arfinta tanaji badon tsoran Allah da gudun sabama saba data zubda cikin kodan tsanan datakema wanda yazama silan samuwan sa, sai dai zuciyanta na tsoran aikata hakan batasani ba ko iyakan rabonta ne wannan d'in 
"Ina nufin idn bazaki yadda azubda cikin ba kije dashi gdn ku kiraineshi acan , na sakeki saki biyu bana bukatan ganinki da d'auke da abnd ban shirya amsan saba "
Kamal yayi mgn tareda ficewa cikin fishi tamkar zai tashi sama, a falon k'asa yasamu Dr
Rayyan zaune batare daya kalleshiba ya wucesa yai waje , ganin hakan yasa yarufama kamal d'in baya wanda harya kunna motarsa , yaja aguje kaman zai tashi sama megadi ya bud'e mai gate yafice ,Dr
Rayyan ma motarsa yashiga yabar gdn yana Allah wadai da halin kamal tareda tausayin Ruky shikenan ya cuci yarinyan mutane yasaketa da k'aramin ciki ga k'arancin shekaru
Ruk'ayyah kuwa anan falon ta zube tana kuka , zuciyanta zafi yake tamakar tacireshi tahuta haka takeji , bataji harta koma ga Allah bazata tab'a tsanan wata halitta kaman yadda ta tsani kamal Alqasim ba , ahankali ta mike jiri na d'ibanta da taimakon dafa bango da kujerun falon takai kanta d'akin ta , wayan ta ta d'auka takira Nadeeya
Bugu biyu ana uku Nadeeya ta d'aga wayan da sallama
"Ya Nadeeya kitaimaka kizo kutafi dani nima yau nawa auren yak'are , kuzo ina cikin halin dabazan iya kawo kaina gd ba "
Ruky tayi mgn tana kuka tareda datse layin tabar Nadeeya da d'aukan salati wanda harya janyo hankalin ummah Mariya dake can nesa da ita tana gyaran farce ta waiwayo tana tambayanta 
"Lfy Nadeeya irin wannan salati haka meya faru ne? "
"Ummah Ruky ce takirani wai tana cikin wani hali aje ataho da ita , nihar jinayi ma tana fad'in itama ko aurenta yak'are
"
"Innalillahi wainnailaihirraju'un"
Abnd ummah Mariya ta furta kenan tana cigaba da fad'in " subhanallah ni Mariya me kuma yafaru ? Bari kigani insanar da Abban naku ya kariso da wuri muje mugani, karkiyi saurin kiran Habeeba don Allah "
"To ummah "Nadeeya ta fad'i jikinta na matuk'ar rawa hankalinta yatashi dajin yadda muryan Ruk'ayyah yake burinta kawai su isa taga halin da take ciki 
Koda aka kira Abba Mahmud cikin sa'a yana dabda karisowa gd ma hakan yasa ko shigo da motarsa baiyiba yakirasu awaya su fito kawai su wuce 
Har rige-rigen shiga gdn suke tsakanin Nadeeya da ummah Mariya ake byn sun kariso, jin shiru afalon k'asan yasasu haurawa sama karo nafarko da Nadeeya tasoma tako gdn Ruk'ayyah kenan, tsananin bata cikin nutsuwanta baima sa tabi takan tak'arewa komi kallo ba 
Sheshshek'ar kukan dasuke jiyowane yasa suka nufi kofan dasuke zaton nan ne Ruk'ayyah ke ciki , a durkushe suka sameta tayi amai takasa ma motsawa daga wajen idanunta sun kunbura sbd kuka , gaba d'aya tasake zabgewa tayi wani irin fari tamkar babu jini ajikinta 
Aguje Nadeeya ta k'arisa tana mata sannu , ummah Mariya ma sannu tai mata suka kamata zuwa toilet ta wanke bakinta , tareda had'a mata ruwa me d'an zafi domin tayi wanka kozata samu sauk'i
Nadeeya ce ta gyara gurin kafin su zauna abakin gadon suna jiran fitowan Ruk'ayyah, d'akin kawai Nadeeya ke k'arewa kallo yanayin ginin kawai kanshi abn akalla asakene , tabbas Ruk'ayyah nacikin d'auka amma wanda bashida anfani tunda tarasa kwanciyan hankali da farin cikin rayuwa
Sai da kintsane suka fuskanceta da tambayoyin dake bakinsu , ahankali ta zayyane musu abnd yafaru tareda sanar dasu yasaketa saki biyu ya kuma tabbatar mata bayason cikin jikinta domin baya buk'atansa
Wani sabon Salatin suka saka alokaci guda , wani tausayin Ruk'ayyah ya rufesu Nadeeya ce ta mik'e ta shiga had'awa Ruk'ayyah kaya cikin babban akwati yayinda ummah Mariya ta kama Ruk'ayyah suka sauka k'asa sbd yadda jikinta yayi weak ga jiri datake gani 
Tana rik'eda ita har zuwa mota tasanyata a seat d'in baya , tareda zama itama tana fara korowa Abba Mahmud abnd yafaru , ransa yai matuk'ar b'aci yana sake jin zafin yadda rayuwan yara k'anana ya shiga garari irin haka 
Megadine yataimaka ya janyo akwatin da Nadeeya ta lafto kayan Ruky aciki yasa abayan mota , itakuma tana rike da wani jakan da sauran tarkacen datasan 'yar uwanta zata buk'ata kafin azo akwashe kayan 
Ta shiga gaba tazauna Abba yatashi motan ummah Mariya na sanar dashi sufara kai Ruky asibiti domin jikinta na buk'atan asamata ruwa kozata samu kwarin jiki sbd aman datakeyi 
Hakan ko akayi suna wani private hospital akaba Ruk'ayyah gado tareda bata duk wasu kulawa daya dace , nan aka bar Nadeeya su kuma ummah suka tafi akan zasuje sudawo zuwa dare 
Tunda sukazo akasa mata drip aka mata allura bacci takeyi, yayinda Nadeeya ta zuba mata idanu sosai Ruk'ayyah tarame ta fita hayyacinta ,tausayinta sosai ke ratsa zuciyanta , yanzu ya ummah da Abba zasuji idn sukaji wannan mummunan lbryn? Wannan sune tambayoyin da Nadeeya ketayi ma kanta 
Misalin k'arfe 9pm ruwan yak'are Nadeeya ce tajita nurse tacire , aka kuma sanya wani da alamu dai kwana yakamasu a asibitin kenan
Ruky ce ta motsa tareda bud'e idanunta ta sauke ganinta akan Nadeeya, take wasu hawayen suka b'alle mata Nadeeya ce tayi saurin taran numfashinta da fad'in
    1
"Ruky ba kuka yakamace ba ayanzu illah addua da kwanciyan hankali, kinga bake kad'ai bace kina d'auke da ciki wanda sanya damuwa zai iya janyo miki wani matsalan nadaban, Allah nasane da komi dayake faruwa damu kiyi fatan hakan yazama silan yayewan damuwanmu baki d'aya Allah yasa rabuwan shine mafi alkhairy "
"Ameen ya Nadee"
Ruky ta fad'i cikin sanyin murya tareda maida idanunta ta kulle , sosai zuciyanta ke mata zafi bawai don ta rabu da kamal takejin ciwoba illah irin yadda kalmar data tsana aduniya na zawarci daya risketa da k'arancin shekaru harda tagomashin ciki , wasu hawaye ne masu mugun zafi suka sake wanke fuskanta 
Turo kofa da sallamn Abba Mahmud dana Abban sune yasata sake rintse idanunta , bakin gadon suka k'ariso dai-dai kuma lokacin ummah Mariya da ummansu suka shigo , ummah mariya na rik'eda basket me d'auke da kulolin abnci zuwa plate dasu ruwa 
"Sannu Ruk'ayyah ya jikina naki ? "
Abba Mahmud yayi mgn yana dubanta cikeda tausayi ganin hawaye na gudu a fuskanta 
Ahankali ta bud'e idanunta tana kallon su kafin ta amsa da "Da sauki Abba"
"To Allah karo afuwa Turaki matsa mana kaduba jikin nata "
Abba Mahmud yayi mgn yana ba Abba guri jikinsa asanyaye ya matsa gareta , hannu yasa yashafi kanta yana fad'in " Ruk'ayyatuna sannu kinji Allah yabaki lfy hakik'a yau ina cikin nadama akan biyewa KWAD'AYI dason zuciya irin tamu nida ummanku ,yanzu miye riban damuka samu ? Babu sai d'in bin takaici da danasanin dabazai tab'a mana anfani ba "
Abba yayi mgn fuskan sa na nuna matuk'ar damuwan dake cikin zuciyansa, yayinda ummansu Nadeeya tazo tazauna tareda kama hannun Ruk'ayyah tana fad'in 
"Kaicon KWAD'AYI da biyewa son duniya , Allah ya tsinewa wannan yaro albarka daya sakoki harda ciki , sannan kuma yake ikirarin baruwansa da cikin baya buk'ata , nidama kinbarsa anxubda cikin ne koma rage takai
"
"Kul! Habeeba bana son sakejin zancen zubda ciki anan, kaman yadda Ruk'ayyah tace bata aminta ba wlh babu me zubda cikin nan sai dai ikon Allah , bazamu tab'a ma Allah butulci ba ni ayanzu dakomi dana mallaka zai k'are matukar zan samu haihuwa wlh zan aminta inrasa komi , don haka inshi hahili ne mu masu ilimi ne ni inason abnd daza'a haifa inshi baya buk'ata , don haka Ruk'ayya zata raini ciki takuma haifeshi inyaso idn ankai masa d'an yace bayaso nizan amsa inrike"
Abba Mahmud yayi mgn yana duban ummah datayi shiru tana saurarensa, ummah Mariya ta amsa zancen da fad'in
"Tabbas mgn ka megida tayi inbayaso mu muna nema ido rufe ,Allah yabi mata hakkinta "
Da Ameen duka suka amsa suna cigaba da tattauna batn , har sai karfe 10pm suka bar asibitin aka bar Nadeeya ta kwana da Ruky
Mgn sakin Ruk'ayya da komawanta gdn Abba Mahmud ne yazagaya dangi , kowa na al'ajabi tareda jakan tawa yayin da mak'ota zuwa 'yan anguwan su Ruky keta yamad'id'i da zancen masu Allah yakara nayi masu tausayin Ruky tareda Allah wadai da KWAD'AYIN iyayensu Ruky nayi ,
Abba Mahmud ne dakanshi yaje har gdn Alhaji Alqasim sharehu yasanar masa abnd tilon d'an nasa ya aikata, tareda sanar dashi cikin dake jikin Ruk'ayya wanda kamal yace baya buk'ata, sosai dattijon attajirin ya nuna b'acin ransa tareda sanarma Abba kada yadamu dazaran tahaihu lfy su zasu amsa abnd tahaifa sunada muradinsa, yakuma k'ara da albishir d'in shizai cigaba d'aukan dawainiyan cikin harta haihu lfy , abnd yasanyaya zuciyan Abba Mahmud kenan yakuma sake aminta da irin yadda mutane suke shaidan halin mutunci da sanin mutunci da darajan d'an adam da Alhaji Alqasim d'in yayi 
Nadama da danasani babu irin wacce ummah da Abba basu shigaba , ayanzu sun gama d'aukan izina akan illan KWAD'AYIN abn duniya , wanda shine silan jefa rayuwan yaransu biyu tak da suka mallaka a cikin bak'in cikin rayuwa
Dukkaninsu sunfi tausayin Ruky idn suka tuna yadda suka rabata damesonta da gsky suka biyewa KWAD'AYIN arziki , suka aura mata kamal duk irin yadda take nusar dasu baidace da ita sun kasa yimata uxury saigashi daga karshe abnd yabiyo baya 
Kwanaki sun cigaba da garawa cikin hukuncin me duka , inda Ruky da Nadeeya xamansu ya koma kark'ashin Abba Mahmud bisa yadda ya buk'ata, sosai suke samun gata kulawa daga wajensa 
Cikin Ruky nada watanni 5 Nadeeya tagama idda , Abba Mahmud yasa mata computer skull tana zuwa kafin afara siyarda form d'in jamb tacika, 
Sosai hakan ya birge Nadeeya da Ruky, wacce itama tasa rigiman tanaso ya yanko mata form d'in tafara zuwa, hakan akayi itama yai mata komi suka fara zuwa tare sosai ta kwantar da hankalinta tana kula da cikin jikina 
Tun surutun da mutane keyi cikin dangi nadamun Ruky harta cirema zuciyanta , ta fuskanci abnd rayuwa tazo mata dashi , fatanta kawai Allah yasauketa lfy , abnd yasameta kuma yazama ixinah ga IYAYEN masu KWAD'AYIN abn duniya da burin lallai sai yaransu mata sunyi aure a gdn arziki 
Tabbas su sunga darasi sun kuma aminta da cewa KWAD'AYIN wasu IYAYEN dayawa kan zama silan jefa yaransu mata acikin wani yanayi na rayuwa
To masu karatu anan nakawo k'arshen wannan lbry me suna KWAD'AYIN WASU IYAYEN
Dafatan zaku anfana da sakon dake ciki , kuskuran danayi Allah ya yafemin sai kunjini asabon littafina me zuwa da ikon me duka 
Aysha D'ansabo ke muku fatan alkhairy , ina yinku masoya na Allah yabar kauna

"Rahma kiyi sauri mu tafi, kaina ciwo yake jarabawar yau ta caza mun brain", Cewar matashiyar budurwa sanye da uniform na makaranta, " Sister ina zuwa zan karb'i sak'o wurin Amina", Ta yatsina fuska alamar gajiya, Kallo d'aya zaka mata ka fuskanci tana da sanyi, sam bata son rigima da hayaniya
Kusan minti 5 tana tsaye, ta koma zaune kan dutsen dake bakin gate na makaranta, "Yi hak'uri na b'ata miki lokaci, kayan da zan saka birthday Sophy na aro", " Ke wai bakya gajiya da aron kaya ki saka wanda Allah ya baki, party ma bai kamata kije ba", "Ni bana son haka, ba ruwanki dani", Taja bakinta tayi shiru, tana mamakin hali na Rahma da shegen son k'arya
Suna tsaye bakin titi suna taron Napep, wata mota mai azabar kyau k'irar Benz tayi parking saitin su, Rahma tace " Wow Benz ", Sameerah ta kawar da kai gefe, Ya saukar da glass, Matashin saurayi ne mai kyau Dan' gayu, yana sanye da English wears, " Yan mata ina zaku?", Da sakin fuska Rahma tace "Unguwar Liman cikin City", " Ku shigo na rage muku hanya", Tana washe baki tace "Toh"
"Sister zo mu tafi", " Ki tafi ni zan hau napep", Bata tsaya wata magana ta bud'e gaban mota ta shige, dama bata so ya ganta, Yace yana so, sau da yawa Sameerah ake cewa ana so, abun na mata ciwo
"Nan zaki bar yar'uwar taki", " Barta ta cika mugun hali", Yayi murmushi, yaja kan mota, ya hau titi yana ba motar wuta, sautin kid'a na tashi, Rahma nata jijjiga kai tana bin wak'ar, Ya kalleta yace "Ashe kin iya", " Sosai ma", "Ko na kashe ne ki mana", Tayi dariya tace " A'ah"
Rahma nata satar kallon sa ya tafi da dukkan tunanin ta har suka kawo k'ofar gidansu, ita ta mishi kwatance, 
"Ya Sunan Mallamar?", " Rahma", "Suna mai dad'i, Am Lukman", " Sunan ka mai dad'i", Yayi murmushi yace "Ko zaki bani number wayarki?", Babu musu ta karb'i wayarsa k'irar IPhone 11pro max ta saka masa, " Sai na kira ki", Ya fad'a yana kashe mata ido, Fuska d'auke da murna tace "Tohm nagode", Ta bud'e murfin motar ta fita,
Ta shiga gidansu cike da farin cikin ta samu irin saurayin da take so, Dan' gayu, mai kyau da kud'i
Sameerah ta tari Napep, ta shiga cike da takaicin halin Rahma
B'angarensu ta nufa, bakin murhu ta tarar da mahaifiyarta na hura wuta, " Gwaggo ina wuni?", "Lafiya lau, an dawo", " Eh Gwaggo nazo miki da labari mai dad'i", "Haba ina sauraren ki", " Na had'u da saurayi mai kud'i, kinga motar sa da wayar sa", Ta ajiye icen data d'auka tace "Da gaske", " Wallahi Allah", "Allah yasa mijin auren ki ne ko ma huta da talauci", " Amin Gwaggona", "Da nayi rawa da juyi", " Ai shine ma mijin", Ta fad'a tana shigewa ciki
Sameerah ta shigo gida, lokacin tuni Rahma ta manta da ta kawo, Ta kalleta ta kwashe da dariya, Bata lura da ita ba, Ta wuce b'angaren su
Gwaggo tace "Lafiyar ki?", " Sameerah ta bani dariya, wai fah k'in shiga mota tayi ita ustaziya", "Gulma dai, ustaziya a ina, ki fita batun ta, ga dukkan alamu yarinyar bata da k'ashin arzik'i, ki duba yaron da take kulawa", " Gwaggo ai tana bani mamaki, ni wallahi ko a k'afa aka d'aura mun shi sai na k'wance", "Ke kinyi gadon arzik'i ai", Haka suka cigaba da kushen Sameerah,
Kwance kan ledar dake tsakiyar falo ta tarar da Mahaifiyar ta, " Umma lafiya kika kwanta k'asa", "Kwanciyar k'asan naji tana mun dad'i", Tace " Sannu ya zaman gida?", "Lafiya lau", " Ina su Khadija", "Sun tafi islamiyya", " Yau bazan iya zuwa ba na gaji sosai", "Ai kun kusa gamawa, yaushe zakuyi ta k'arshe?", " Gobe ", " Allah ya bada nasara", "Amin"
K'uryar d'aki ta shiga, ta tub'e kayanta, Ta fito da d'aurin gaba da hijab, saboda samarin gidan, Ta d'auki bucket, ta d'ibi ruwa a rijiyar gidan, Ta nufi bandak'i dake tsakar gida, Wanka tayi,
Mai da turare kad'ai ta shafa, ta saka doguwar riga, Ta kwanta kan katifa, Bacci ya d'auketa
Atiku Mai goro dattijan mutum ne, mutumin arzik'i, Yana da rufin asiri dan ba za'a kira sa mai kud'i ba, Matansa Biyu Hansatu da Lami, Yaransa 7, Hansatu nada 4 Jabir, Lawal, Safara'u da Ummul khairi, Lami nada uku Sabi'u, Yahuza da Safiyya
Jabir, Lawal, Sabi'u da Yahuza duka sunyi aure, Atiku a cikin gidan sa, yama kowanne b'angaren sa, Safara'u, Safiyya da Ummul khairi suma sunyi aure anan cikin garin Zaria
Gidan ya zama babban gidan(Family house), Ya cika da yara da jikoki, Sabi'u shine mahaifin Sameerah itace yar'sa ta farko da k'annenta biyar, Shekararta 17 tana matakin k'arshe a sakandire, Rahma yar' Lawal ce itace ta uku a wurin iyayenta Tana da yayye biyu maza, Sa'anni ne da Sameerah
Kunsan duk inda akace gidan yawa, ba'a raba sa da tsegumi, hassada da gulma, Toh hakan take a gidan mai goro(Kamar yadda ake kiran gidan), Burin kowacce taga tafi d'aya, ko yaranta sunfi, Yayen Hansatu da Lami suna kishin yan'ubanci, Matansu duk da kasancewar su ba kishiyoyi ba suna kishin sauri
Mahaifiyar Sameerah Allah ya zuba mata hak'uri da kawar da kai, Ita Sameerah ta gado, Taba yaranta kyakkyawan tarbiya, Basu taso da halin k'in Yan uwansu ba, kowa da zuciya d'aya suke d'aukar sa, Duk da halin k'iyayya da wasu mutanen gidan ke nuna musu
Mahaifiyar Rahma tafi dukansu bak'in hali da nuna tafi kowa da son k'arya, Ta d'aura yaranta kan son abun duniya da tara dukiya, Gata da ganin k'yashi, Tafi kishi da A'i (Mahaifiyar Sameerah) kasancewar tafi duka matan gidan kyau da rufin asiri, Mijinta na matuk'ar sonta yana mata hidima sosai, wannan ya k'ara sa take jin haushin ta
Wannan kenan
